Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Dried Leaf Crown
desc: Handle with care or you're gonna end up with potpourri instead of the Heralded Crown Of Autumn.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Musical Gong
desc: If somebody bangs this while you are performing, it means your act is bad and you should feel bad. On the other hand, it plays a nifty tune!
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Highly Combustible Box
desc: This box is made of gasoline-soaked balsa wood. It's a really bad design. If it gets lit on fire, it will burn up instantly. A few selected items can be tempered by fire though. Perhaps you could store them inside and see what happens when it burns?
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Skeletal Shark
desc: This is what happens when you don't feed your fish.

name: Ghost Fish
desc: There’s nothing spooky about this fish, it’s just the kind where you see through it a bit. Kinda weird though.

name: Demon Angler
desc: This is a demonic fish, not a fish that angles for demons. I figured the teeth and eyes made that obvious.

name: Otherworldly Bait
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. This bait actually travels through a wormhole into a dark dimension and catches things there, instead of in the water. Bad things.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Cursed Fishing Rod
desc: Equip this and then use bait on water next to you to go fishing! All you have to do is wait for a bite, and then punch the fish before it escapes! If you miss, your bait is wasted, so punch fast. You will suffer mysterious effects when catching fish with this rod. Beware the curse!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Eldritch Flame
desc: The seething fires of the underworld are at your command! Throw this in somebody's world to start a bunch of fires and really annoy them.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Flaming Cape

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: This cape burns eternally with eldritch fire. It's also lined with asbestos, so you're all good. Probably.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ghost Costume
desc: Nothing spookier than a bedsheet with two holes cut in it!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Chainsaw Hand
desc: If you ever get a possessed hand and have to lop it off at the wrist, here's a handy replacement for it! Also good for ice sculpture.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Cape Tatters
desc: This bit of cloth is black on one side and blood-red on the other. If you had 25 of these, you might be able to make a really spooky cape!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Inside-Out Vampire Cape

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You accidentally made your cape inside-out!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Black Aura

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: I'm pretty sure it's a bad sign when your aura is this color.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Hellgate
desc: It seems like the destination of this portal is obvious, but actually you can choose any place you like with your wrench.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Riding Demon Dog
desc: It's just like a horse... except PURE EVIL.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Teeny Devil Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Even as tiny as they are, these wings allow you to jump in mid-air!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Teeny Wing Fragment
desc: This is about an eighth of a Teeny Devil Wing. So if you had 16 of these, you could make a pair of Teeny Devil Wings!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Soul Orb

func.add: Suck the souls of innocent blocks!

desc: This orb devours the soul of anything it touches - Growtopians, Blocks Trees, whatever!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Dark Magic Barrier
desc: This demonic energy field only lets the right people through.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Combusted Box
desc: This box done combusted.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Stethoscope
desc: Congratulations on winning the Doctor's Duel Daily Challenge! With this Stethoscope on, you are half as likely to make mistakes in surgery!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Super Logo - Crown
desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume since you won the Card Clash Daily Challenge! With this logo on, you get +2 health during card battles!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Wolf Spirit

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Congratulations on winning the War of Wolves Daily Challenge! With this spirit equipped (it is a back item, by the way), you can double jump, and the guidance of the Wolf Spirit will improve your Wolfworld rewards (usually).
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Wolfy Block
desc: This is the wolfiest block available with current technology.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Challenge Crown
desc: Congratulations! You were #1 in a Daily Challenge! Show off with a shiny crown.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ring Of Savings
desc: Congratulations on winning the Carnie Contest Daily Challenge! With this ring equipped, you save 10% on Golden Ticket prices (pay 90 rarity per ticket, or get 33 per World Lock).
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Challenge Board
desc: Wrench this board to see the situation with the Daily Challenge!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Cosmic Cape

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: This cape sparkles and very very rarely finds leftover Comet Dust in blocks you break when it's not The Night Of The Comet!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Rainbow Crystal Block
desc: Congratulations on winning the Crystal Crusher Daily Challenge! Enjoy this rainbowlicious block. Don't you just wanna lick it? Also, if you smash a Harmonic Crystal that is sitting on this block, there's a 20% chance of getting back one of the crystals you put into it.
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Cosmic Power - Comet Strike
desc: This is a Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic Cards aren't used, they just have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: 25% chance of doing 1 extra damage whenever your card counters the opponent's.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Cosmic Power - Star Burst
desc: This is a Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic Cards aren’t used, they just have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: When you are hit for more than 1 damage at once, the opponent is blasted for 1 damage.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Cosmic Power - Lunar Barrier
desc: This is a Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic cards aren't used, they just have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: When you are at or below 25% life, there's a chance to deflect damage done to you.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Cosmic Power - Nebula Gas
desc: This is a Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic Cards aren't used, they just have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: When you cards are countered, there's a 25% chance that your card works anyways.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Transdimensional Vaporizer Ray
desc: This is a highly advanced alien device with one purpose: it can fire right through solid matter to vaporize background without doing any harm to the foreground blocks. It uses alien batteries which we can't replace, so each Vaporizer can only be used once.
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Carnival Pinwheel
desc: Enjoy the beauty of this spinny pinwheel!
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Sword And Shield
desc: This is a classic warrior's combo - a nice cutlass for your main hand, and a shield in the other. This shield makes you harder to knock back!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Twin Swords
desc: Why waste time with a shield? Just get two swords!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Preppy Blonde Hair
desc: I think you've got just enough gel in there to go to the sock hop with Buffy!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Pet Slime
desc: Nothing cuter than a sentient ball of slime that follows you around!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Strawberry Slime
desc: So much tastier than mucus flavor!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Angry Unicorn Block
desc: This block is angry, and prominently features a unicorn.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Legal Briefs
desc: Not only are these comfortable undergarments for everyday use, they also have a legal use: put them on when you are in trouble for Malpractice, and you'll be freed from your punishment! This uses up the Briefs.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ring Of Smithing
desc: To be honest, this ring doesn't really do anything. Well, that is unless you want to smith something. Then you're definitely gonna need to wear this!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Anvil
desc: You can forge astounding weapons on this, if it's next to a Forge that's been heated to 1,000 degrees, and you have Smithing Tools, and wear a Ring of Smithing and a Blacksmith's Apron. Oh, and have some item you want to smith. If you've got all that, go ahead and use the item on the anvil!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Blacksmith's Apron
desc: This apron is made of heavy leather, making it very effective for protecting you from stray sparks when forging things.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Crystal Smithing Tools
desc: These tools are so gentle they break after 1 use! Use them wisely!

name: Blade Fragment
desc: This is a broken piece of a sword blade. It's of a low-quality steel and could stand to be tempered.

name: Shield Fragment
desc: This is a broken piece of a shield. If you had enough of these, you could probably forge them into a new shield!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Tempered Steel Fragment
desc: This is a beautiful steel fragment of a sword blade. If you had enough of these, you could probably forge them into a new sword blade!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Sword Pommel
desc: This is a lovingly crafted sword pommel. If only there were a blade to attach it to!

name: Sword Blade
desc: This is a lovingly crafted sword blade. If only there were a pommel to attach it to!

name: Warrior's Shield
desc: This is a loving crafted shield. But you can't punch block with a shield. Maybe you can combine this with a weapon to make a complete set?

name: Forge
desc: You can use this to forge astounding weapons, if you have an Anvil next to it. You'll also need to fuel it with something really hot.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Nuclear Fuel
desc: You can feel your cells mutating just being near this lump of radioactive garbage. About the only thing this is good for is firing up a forge to ridiculous levels of heat.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Gift of the Unicorn
desc: The unicorn has gifted you great wisdom! The wisdom is thus: If you stick this wisdom, 2 Sword Pommels, and 2 Sword Blades, into a Laboratory and SCIENCE them... well, let's just say it'll be super cool.

name: Giving Tree
desc: "Borrowed" from the Growch's private reserve, this magnificent tree will give you a gift every 4 hours for the duration of Winterfest!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Giving Tree Stump
desc: This will regrow into a Giving Tree in a while.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Tree Decorations
desc: All sorts of baubles and gewgaws to adorn your Giving Tree in true Winterfest style! One decoration won't do much, but you can toss up to 100 decorations on each tree! More decorations will logically result in better gifts, but taking the gift will remove all the decorations with it!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Lumber Axe
desc: This axe is precisely balanced to chop down trees in just a single hit! Now, you might not be impressed since you can do that with your bare hands already. But wait - this axe can chop down the GROWCH'S trees! Of course, doing that will shatter it. They're very special trees.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Axe Fragment
desc: This is a broken piece of an axe blade. It's not very high quality, perhaps it could be tempered.

name: Icy Heart Of Winter
desc: You've found the Growch's icy heart! No wonder he's so mean - it's not even in his body! That's a major medical problem that would upset anyone.

name: Icy Heart Pickup
desc: Players pick up an Icy Heart of Winter by touching this.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Axe Of Winter
desc: Mittens are recommended when wielding this icy monstrosity, which does extra damage to blocks.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Moose Cap
desc: This beautifully styled hat, suitable for all formal occasions, has the unique property of attracting wild meese to follow you around.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Candy Cane Bait
desc: This is a bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. This is the only bait that is its own hook! It catches unique seasonal fish that other bait doesn't appeal to.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Neon Squid
desc: This squid glows in neon colors! What a fine holiday gift it would make.

name: Antarctic Icefish
desc: These fish have the ability to survive in Antarctic waters because they actually have antifreeze in their blood! Its science, google it.

name: Gingerbread Fish
desc: You know how you can dunk cookies in milk? This one was dunked in the ocean. Kinda gross.

name: Swedish Fish
desc: This breed of fish is unique to the waters of Sweden, and it has a surprisingly sweet taste when eaten raw. Don't eat yours though, it's a pet.

name: Snowcone
desc: Yum, fruit flavors poured into ice! At least it's yum until all the flavoring gets sucked out.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Toboggan
desc: This sled was called "Onion Bulb" by its original owner, but you can call it whatever you want. It comes with a free purple blanket to keep your legs warm!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Winter Wind
desc: Place this anywhere you want the wind to come ripping through and push players around! The wind blows in the direction that you would blow air when placing it, so you can place it either way.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Snowflake Block
desc: Just one exceptionally large snowflake, perfectly preserved in lucite. I don't know how they did it, but it's nice and slippery!
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Winter Robe
desc: Be the King of Winter in this luxurious satiny robe! Note: this is a "chest item", like a necklace, so you can wear any shirts and back items you want underneath it.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Magical Carrot

func.add: A snowman seems to be following you.

desc: With just a touch of winter magic, it's really not that hard to bring a snowman to life. I don't know why more people don't do it!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Hot Chocolate
desc: Mmm, sweet and toasty, with marshmallows! This not only warms your insides, but it also contains a massive dose of delicious iodine to clear out any radiation you're currently suffering from. Inexplicably it also charges up Geiger Counters when consumed. I can't explain that one.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Tempered Axe Fragment
desc: This is a broken piece of an axe blade, tempered to polished steel! With enough of these, and a suitable source of enraged winter fury, you could forge an amazing Icy Axe Blade.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Icy Axe Blade
desc: This blade is enchanted with winter magic! You could build an awesome weapon with a pair of these and a handle... well, it'd be awesome if you could hold it. Maybe you need something to protect your hands when holding it.

name: Steel Axe Handle
desc: This thing has a nice heft, and handy notches for inserting up to two axe blades. The only real downside is that it's made entirely of metal, so if you were to place, say, magical ice blades in it, the cold would be transmitted right to your hand, and you wouldn't be able to hold it.

name: Grip Tape
desc: This is handy for wrapping around the handle of a weapon or tool. It can improve your grip, as well as protect you from cold metal handles.

name: Riding Winter Wolf
desc: It's just like a horse... except soft and fuzzy!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Weather Machine - Snowy Night
desc: Man, the weather outside is frightful! And dark!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Elf Stockings
desc: This is just really long underwear. You probably should wear pants over them, but hey, Growtopia doesn't support that, so you'll just have to be cold!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Sock On The Wall
desc: You'll need to wash your socks. This one stuck to the wall!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Gear
desc: This is a cog in a vast steam machine. Or can it be, if you build one, with this in it! This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Tubes
desc: Tubes for directing steam power. This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. Steam flows straight when possible, otherwise it turns right (and turns left if it can't do that!)
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 6 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Piston
desc: Steam power makes it go whump whump whump. This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Lifter Piston
desc: Steam power makes it go whump whump whump up and down. This links up to other steam blocks and can conduct steam power.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Bellows
desc: Steam power makes it go eenk-oonk-eenk (pardon the technical terminology). This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Riser Bellows
desc: Steam power makes it go eenk-oonk-eenk up and down (pardon the technical terminology). This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Stomper
desc: Jump on this to shoot steam below it! Use the other Steam Blocks to direct the steam when you need it.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Growtopia Fan Shirt
desc: This amazing psychic shirt can actually display your thought with spectacular new morphing Ink technology. Note: Yeah, it just says the one thing, but you know you're thinking it.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: T-Shirt Cannon
desc: Powered by a Fuel Pack on your back, this gun can launch free T-shirts at your fellow Growtopians! Don't waste shots at anything else, it still burns fuel!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ghost Fan Shirt
desc: You like ghosts? No? Sure looks like you do.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Pineapple Fan Shirt
desc: Who doesn’t pineapple GT?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Valve
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. If steam enters this block from the top or bottom, it will go out the bigger side, and the valve will flip for the next time.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Organ
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. When steam passes through this block, it plays a beautiful music! Use your wrench to adjust what note comes out.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Vent
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. When steam passes through this block, it vents some out with intense heat! Do not touch this for 3 seconds after steam has been through.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Door
desc: Punch it to open it or shut it. But even if you don't have access to do that, you can still open and shut it with steam power!
Hardness: 15 Hits 12 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Steampunk Corset
desc: Tired of always choosing the survival of your internal organs over looking skinny? The corset is the thing for you!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Steampunk Skirt
desc: Multiple layers of petticoats keep you warm!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Steampunk Top Hat
desc: Keep an extra pair of googles up there. You never know when you'll need them.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Steampunk Waistcoat
desc: This perfect garment for housing a pocketwatch, monocle, and perhaps taxidermy needles. Definitely some weird stuff in those pockets.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Steampunk Leggings
desc: Works equally well for a steampunk or a pirate! Or maybe a dancer from the 80’s.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Steampunk Trenchcoat
desc: Keep warm on those frosty London evenings in this stylish piece by Grow Couture! Note: this is a “Chest item”, like a necklace so you can wear any shirts and back items you want underneath it.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Party Blaster
desc: Take the party with you everywhere you go!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Tempered Party Tunes
desc: This is a highly polished bit of music. So shiny! Enough of these might be able to forge a relic' from ancient times past...
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: 80's Tape Deck
desc: Wow, this is some seriously old technology. It's no good without a suitable power source and some speakers to rock out of.

name: D Battery
desc: A portable source of a tiny amount of power.

name: ERROR!
desc: Please contact support to fix this item!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Steampunk Sprocket
desc: There's not a lot of difference between a sprocket and a gear. But this is a sprocket.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steampunk Gearbox
desc: It's a box full of sprockets and gears and whatnots! It's probably part of an awesome steampunk creation.

name: Stretched Canvas
desc: It's not the prettiest decoration for your world, but it's probably got some other good uses.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Silkworm
desc: A cute little pet for you to feed and care for! They'll eat almost anything, but don't forget to give them water too. Use your wrench to change your pet's name.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Silk Bolt - Red
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Silk Turban
desc: Cover up that hair!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Patchwork Mess
desc: An experiment in sewing gone horribly wrong. This is just a bunch of silk stitched together in random directions.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Silk Vest - Red
desc: A snappy vest suitable for all occasion.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Silk Vest - Green
desc: A snappy vest suitable for any occasion.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

desc: A snappy vest suitable for any occasion.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Catch-of-the-Day Bait

This bait won't catch anything but the Catch of the Day, which changes each day. Fish have a chance to escape, though! Bonus: Fish caught this way can be larger than the normal maximum size!

name: Seahorse

name: Mutant Fish
desc: Looks like the comet's radiation has caused unfortunate mutations in the wildlife. You gotta wonder what it's doing to you...

Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Engine

desc: This is not a tasty potato chip. With this cutting-edge genetic technology, you can splice Battle Pets of different elements together! One CRISPR is used up for each cross-element splice you perform.

name: Genetic Resequencer
desc: Wrench a Battle Pet Cage with a pet inside, and you can use this to resequence their DNA. It will rotate the order of their 3 powers, so that their 1st gene-spliced ability becomes their natural ability, and thus their appearance.

name: Pet Trainer Medal
desc: Congratulations! You have been awarded a medal for defeating a Pet Trainer!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Whale Block
desc: Whale whale whale, you'll really have to wail on this block to smash it. But you'll have a whale of a time doing it! And what a tail to tell it will be. I'm way ill from all of these puns, I'm gonna start blubbering. ORCA.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Pet Trainer Whistle
desc: You know how to battle a Pet Trainer, right? You just put your lips together, and blow this whistle. You might want to have a fully stocked Battle Leash first though, because Pet Trainers won't stay around waiting to fight you forever!
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Thinking Cap
desc: They say two heads are better than one. We can't arrange that, but we can get you two of what's inside your head!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Phlogiston
desc: This fantastic substance contains the very essence of living flame.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Lock-Bot
desc: This robot works for Locke. He'll trade you fabulous items for locks! He'll only stick around in your world for 24 hours before he's needed elsewhere, though.
Hardness: 20 Hits 15 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Lock-Bot Remote
desc: This handy remote will call Lock-Bot to your world at the location you specify. It only works once, so choose wisely! Lock-Bot will leave after 24 hours.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Toy Lock-Bot

func.add: Clearly you have too many world locks.

desc: It's just like Lock-Bot, only tiny! And he doesn't trade locks, he SHOOTS them.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Burnt Leather
desc: If this was a piece of a pig, you'd call a pork rind. But it's a cow rind. Strong material for crafting!

name: Buckle Design
desc: This paper details a method for forging a buckle out of Deep Iron. If you forge 100 Deep Iron Ingots with this design in hand, you'll make an Iron Buckle instead of a Pick Blade.

name: Iron Buckle
desc: This buckle would be good for holding straps together, if you need for such things!

name: Weather Machine - Heatwave
desc: This amazing new weather machine emits a vortex of howling flame, but if you wrench it, you’ll find adjustable settings to control the color of the flames! You can only have one of these per world.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Riding Phoenix
desc: Whoa, you're really sitting on the ride now. There are only 500 of these in existence, so don't lose yours!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Red Flip Flops
desc: Bright rubber to protect your feet from pointy shells on the beach!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Green Flip Flops
desc: Bright rubber to protect your feet from pointy shells on the beach!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Blue Flip Flops
desc: Bright rubber to protect your feet from pointy shells on the beach!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Paper Airplane
desc: Toss it and see where it goes! It'll smash if it hits any blocks, so aim carefully. Tap the direction you want to throw it. The further from yourself you tap, the harder you throw.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: B.O.O. Shirt
desc: The official uniform of the B.O.O. - Battlers of the Otherworldly. Join today!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: B.O.O. Pants
desc: The official uniform of the B.O.O. - Battlers of the Otherworldly. Join today!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Spectral Goggles
desc: The spectrally polarized lenses of these goggles allow you to actually see paranormal activity. Be warned: it is very spooky! But it's there whether you can see it or not... wouldn't you rather know?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: B.O.O. Helmet
desc: The trouble with poltergeists is that they’re always pushing things off of shelves (side note: cats pose same problem). That’s where the helmet comes in. Protect yourself from falling books and antiques!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Neutron Pack
desc: This backpack contains a portable nuclear reactor. I know that sounds a bit unsafe, but... well, it is. It's a terrible idea. It has blinky lights, though. You'll need to wear a Neutron Pack to power a Neutron Gun.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Neutron Gun

func.add: You fire Neutron Beams (requires Neutron Pack to work)

desc: This energy blaster looks impressive, but actually has no impact on our world. Rather, it creates a stream of neutrons that attracts spirits. Ghosts can't escape the beam. Which reminds me: Don't ever cross your beam with somebody else's! That would be bad.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Rubber Boots
desc: These are tight-fitting boots made of a natural rubber that protects from slime while still allowing your feet to breathe.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ghost Jar
desc: Place this jar down and it will suck in a ghost that's above it. You will probably need some friends with Neutron Guns to keep the ghost contained or it will escape! A jar takes 2 seconds to activate, and then only collects spirits for 5 seconds, so time it carefully.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Ghost-In-A-Jar
desc: Spooky! This jar contains a ghost! You can throw it to break the jar and unleash the ghost, or instead Drop it gently in front of a Spirit Storage Unit where you can keep the ghost for good.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Spirit Storage Unit
desc: This incredible machine was invented a hundred years ago, and still runs on Steam power! Drop Ghosts-In-A-Jar in front of it, then provide it with Steam power to store the ghosts. Warning: If you overload the device, it may explode!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Destroyed Spirit Storage Unit
desc: An SSU that exploded. No good for anything now.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Ectoplasm Sample
desc: This is an important scientific discovery that could change our understanding of life itself! But you know what'd be fun? Throwing it at somebody.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Crystallized Ghost
desc: This ghost underwent some kind of reaction during a Spirit Storage explosion, and now it's been crystallized inside a solid block. Maybe one day scientists will extract its DNA and make a theme park of ghosts. Probably not, since ghosts don't have DNA.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Warning Block
desc: When something is so dangerous there's no time for words, just throw down some yellow and black stripes!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Warning Background
desc: When something is so dangerous there’s no time for words, just throw down some yellow and black stripes!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Demon Control Cap
desc: With this helmet, which is not a colander at all, you can control a demon dog from another dimension!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Haunted Pants
desc: What's that eerie noise coming from in there? These pants must be haunted!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Root Beer
desc: Ah, a cold frosty mug root beer. The only downside is that all that carbonation is sure to make you burp a tiny bit...
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Spray Tan
desc: If you don't want to get cancer from the sun, spray this on your skin to get an ultra-realistic bronze tone! Warning: Causes lots and lots of cancer. Lots.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Shark-Tooth Necklace
desc: I don't know if this is a tooth from every shark you've killed, or each one that's bitten you, but either way it's impressive.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Firefin
desc: It’s not too tough to figure out where this fish gets it’s name. During the winter, they stay in warmer waters, but for the week of Summerfest, these can be found in their old spawning grounds right here in Growtopia!

name: Bone Spikes
desc: Someone has stacked a bunch of bones here and sharpened the ends. I know that's dangerous in itself, but aren't you a little more concerned about exactly who did it and where they are now?
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Ghost Charm
desc: When activated (punch to activate), this horrific face terrifies even ghosts, preventing new ghosts from appearing in your world. Ghosts that are already in your world still need to be captured by B.O.O. professionals, however. The poor ghosts are trapped on this earthly plane!
Hardness: 30 Hits 23 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Funnel
desc: The links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. Steam can enter this Funnel from 3 sides, but can only exit from one side. You figure out which!
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Funnel - Up
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. Steam can enter this Funnel from 3 sides, but can only exit from one side. You figure out which!
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Funnel - Down
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and conduct steam power. Steam can enter this funnel from 3 sides, but can only exit from one side. You figure out which!
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: B.O.O. Sign
desc: Advertise your ghost-hunting services with this handy sign! You're a proud member of B.O.O., so let everybody know. Use your wrench to set the message.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Data Bedrock
desc: No info.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Shark Tooth
desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back to the shark dentist...
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Atomic Fireball
desc: For when lava isn't hot enough!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Crossover
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. It's actually 2 unconnected pipes - one runs from left to down, and the other runs from up to right. Use this to keep steam from going places you don't want!
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Crank
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. When punched, this pipe rotates between horizontal and vertical. Use your wrench to decide whether to allow the public to adjust it.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Lamp
desc: This crystal lamp is powered by steam! It burns for 10 seconds each time it gets charged. It can only be powered from below. The Steam Code prohibits more than 100 steam-powered items in a world.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Steam Spikes
desc: Steam forces razor-shape spikes from the ground in this dastardly trap! It can only be powered from below. Power it again to lower the spikes.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: No-Face
desc: Embarassed? Feel like hiding your face? How about just removing it instead?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Purple Djellaba
desc: This long robe is suitable for male or female Growtopians, provided they want to look snazzy and colorful!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Yellow Djellaba
desc: This long robe is suitable for male or female Growtopians, provided they want to look snazzy and colorful!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

desc: This long robe is suitable for male or female Growtopians, provided they want to look snazzy and colorful!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Mini Blocks

name: Teeny Blocks
desc: These blocks are only 1/4 the size of Mini Blocks! To make up for that, they come in sets of sixteen.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Jigsaw Wallpaper
desc: Well, that was easy... It's a picture of a jigsaw puzzle!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Riding Broomstick
desc: What magic makes this fly? Witch magic makes this fly!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Techno Visor
desc: This is handy technology for people who are overwhelmed with modern life - it blocks one of your ears from hearing things, and one of your eyes from seeing things. Just relax and enjoy the left half of the world.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Glowstick
desc: This plastic tube of lethal radioactive elements is the perfect thing to swing around at a party! It also provides light.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: One-Way Block
desc: This block can only be moved through in the direction the arrow is pointing. From the other direction, it might as well be a wall!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: VIP Entrance
desc: The fanciest door in town! The only people getting through this door are the ones who are on The List. Wrench the door to add people to The List. Or remove them, if they have offended you in some way.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Rhino Horn
desc: Aw, it thinks you're its mama.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Globe
desc: Add a little class to your office with a globe! You can also wrench it to check the current top worlds.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Challenge Timer
desc: Players can punch this to begin a challenge: get from the Challenge Start Flag to the Challenge End Flag before time runs out! Wrench the timer to set up your challenge and insert prizes.
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Challenge Start Flag
desc: Use this with a Challenge Timer. Wrench it to set an ID, so it knows which Challenge Timer to work with.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Challenge End Flag
desc: Use this with a Challenge Timer. Wrench it to set an ID, so it knows which Challenge Timer to work with.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Fish Wall Mount

Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Octopus Head
desc: This is why aquariums have rules.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Stonefish
desc: This is one of the most poisonous fish in the world! It's also made of rock, which is weird.

name: Tamago Sushi
desc: Wait, this sushi doesn’t even have fish in it!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Portrait

Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Orca
desc: You could put this in a fish tank, but then people would probably make documentaries about you. Not flattering ones.

name: Red Hair Dye
desc: Pour this gunk on your head if you want your hair to be red! It may require multiple applications to achieve the desired color, or mixing with other dyes. The dye interacts with your natural hair color, so some colors may simply be impossible to achieve.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Weather Machine - Stuff

Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Beehive
desc: I feel like this warning is unnecessary, but I'll say it anyway: don't punch a beehive.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Honey
desc: The sweet nectar of bee spit! Bees also craft plastic bear shapes to store it in. Nobody knows why.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Sorcerer Stone
desc: There's mystical gem embedded in this rock. Heck, there's probably a few in there. Smash it open and see!
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Villain Portrait - The Harvester
desc: Just before knocking him unconscious, you snapped a lovely photo of The Harvester for posterity. Put it up on the wall, show off your achievement!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Cosmic Power - Life Harvest
desc: This is a Rare Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic Cards aren't used, they have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: Heal 1 life every time you inflict more than 1 damage.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Super Shirt - Autumn
desc: Fight crime in this mighty leafy leotard!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Muscle Shirt - Autumn
desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty leafy leotard!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Heroic Tights - Autumn
desc: To be a leafy superhero, you really need to wear tights of some sort.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Super Tights - Autumn
desc: To be a leafy superhero, you really need to wear tights of some sort.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

desc: These boots add nothing to your crimefighting skills except to protect you from stray Legos.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Superhero Mask - Autumn
desc: Protect your secret identity!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Crimefighter Mask - Autumn

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

desc: You're no heroman, but it's still pretty swell.

name: Superheroine Top - Autumn
desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty leafy leotard!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Super Logo - Leaf
desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume to fight crime as... Leaf Lord? Lady Leaf? The Fallen Avenger? It's up to you!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

desc: Normally this mask is only worn during the most profane of dark rituals, beneath a blood red moon. But you can wear it for shopping, parties, whatever!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Harvest Horn
desc: Don't blow this horn. Never blow this horn. It is evil.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Ancestor Mooncake
desc: This pastry is filled with a sweet bean paste. An image of your ancestor is imprinted on the top. Mix this with other Mooncakes in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to create special Harvest Festival items.

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Sheep
desc: Baaaaaaa. You can shear a sheep once every few days!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Wool
desc: This is just a blob of wool. Not too useful. Get 100 of these to weave a bolt together!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Wool Bolt

name: Fossil Rock
desc: This rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Maybe you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!

Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Fossilroid
desc: This rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Maybe you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Alien Fossil Rock
desc: This Rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Mabye you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Igneous Fossil Rock
desc: This rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Maybe you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Igneous Rock
desc: Igneous rock is formed through the cooling and solidification of magma or lava.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Rock Hammer

func.add: This tool must be used with care.

desc: A precision instrument for chipping fossils out of rocks. If you find a fossil, equip this hammer and start tapping, - but do it *carefully!* If the fossil comes loose and you hit it again, you'll break it!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Rock Chisel

func.add: This tool must be used with care.

desc: So you've extracted a fossil from a rock, but the rock is still in your way. That's where the chisel comes in! It lets you chip away the rock without damaging the fossil.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Fossil
desc: A corpse from millions of years ago, turned to stone. It's still covered with a lot of stone, so we're not sure what it is just yet. Try cleaning it off in a Fossil Prep Station.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Fossil Prep Station
desc: Put a fossil in this tank where special solvents and bacterial agents will slowly dissolve any remaining rock and reveal exactly what you've found. The time required varies anywhere from an hour to a day depending on how much needs dissolving. The light turns green when it's ready, so punch to collect!
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Ammonite Block
desc: A huge beautiful ammonite fossil has been extracted! It'd make a lovely coffee table.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Dino Ribcage
desc: It's a bit grisly, but these enormous bones make kind of a fun set of monkey bars...
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Dinosaur Mask
desc: This is how you would look if a dinosaur snuck up behind you and swallowed you, but you got stuck in his throat. It's really a bad situation for everyone involved.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ancient Plant Seed
desc: This seed from the ancient past is completely intact - there may still be some DNA inside! Plant DNA, but still that`s exciting, right?

name: Amber Block
desc: This ancient tree sap has hardened into a beautiful crystal. Who knows, there might even be a mosquito inside holding dinosaur DNA! That's pretty standard for amber.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: T-Rex Skull
desc: This would make an impressive display in your museum! Even more impressive in your haunted house.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

desc: You've brought a dinosaur back to life with genetic engineering! There's no way that this could go badly!
