name: DNA Processor
desc: This advanced device from Growtech can take in strands of ancient DNA and combine them to create real living creatures. It has terrifying ethical implications.
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Dino DNA Strand A-273
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a dinosaur. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesn't seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Dino DNA Strand C-904
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a dinosaur. Perhaps there’s a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesn’t seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Dino DNA Strand G-137
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a dinosaur. Perhaps there’s a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesn’t seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Dino DNA Strand T-658
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a dinosaur. Perhaps there’s a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesn’t seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Plant DNA Strand X-277
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a plant. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That actually sounds pretty safe, since it's a plant.

name: Plant DNA Strand Y-985
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a plant. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That actually sounds pretty safe, since it's a plant.

name: Prehistoric Flowering Fern
desc: Welcome... to Jurassic Botanical Garden.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Prehistoric Red Fern
desc: It's sad to think where this grows.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Prehistoric Fern
desc: Nature always finds a way.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Purple Devourer Plant
desc: This is what happens when you give a prehistoric flower a taste for magic bacon!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Blue Devourer Plant
desc: This is what happens when you give a prehistoric flower a taste for magic bacon!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Prehistoric Vines
desc: You can hide from rampaging dinosaurs in these vines.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Prehistoric Candy Vines
desc: You can try to hide from rampaging dinosaurs in these vines, but you'll probably get eaten because the vines themselves taste like candy.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Seussian Tree
desc: These particular trees, near the Jurassic seas, produced quite a crunchety fruit. Though scientists say that it tasted okay, we can't pollinate so it's moot.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Flowersaurus Rex
desc: You monster, what fresh horror have you wrought?!!? Has science gone too far?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Blue Riding Raptor
desc: I know, they're supposed to have feathers and stuff nowadays... Well, this is an old-school raptor!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Brown Riding Raptor
desc: I know, they're supposed to have feathers and stuff nowadays... Well, this is an old-school raptor!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Red Riding Raptor
desc: I know, they're supposed to have feathers and stuff nowadays... Well, this is an old-school raptor!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Golden Riding Raptor
desc: I think this raptor has more World Locks than you do.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Raptor DNA Strand Alpha
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. It appears to be the beginning of a velociraptor DNA sequence. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesn't seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Raptor DNA Strand Omega
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. It appears to be the tail end of a velociraptor DNA sequence. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesn't seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: DNA Extractor
desc: This experimental device can extract prehistoric DNA from objects which contain even small traces. To give it a try, just use an item on it and see what you find! This is very new technology, so results are unpredictable, and rarely successful.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Stone Spear

func.add: You got a spear, so toss it.

desc: In ancient times, sticks and stones were about as good as it got. The upside is it's a magic stone - this spear will teleport back into your hand once thrown!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Blue Hardhat
desc: Head protection is required in construction areas, and at some dig sites.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Outback Hat
desc: G'day! Barbie! Shrimp! That's not a knife, it's a hat! These hats are popular among paleontologists and other desert dwellers.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Fossil Brush
desc: You can use this to gently brush a fossil before you pick it up, improving its quality. A Fossil Brush will be destroyed upon use (fossils are very rough until you brush them!). If you pick up a fossil, your finger oils will make a Fossil Brush useless, so be sure you brush before collecting!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Polished Fossil
desc: This fossil has been carefully polished, so it's sure to yield something good when run through a Fossil Prep Station!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Heatbow
desc: This bow shoots flaming arrows!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Doompunk Corset
desc: Internal organs rotted away? The corset should fit you fine!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Doompunk Skirt
desc: Multiple layers of petticoats keep you warm when stalking your prey!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Doompunk Top Hat
desc: Keep an extra pair of goggles up there. You never know when you'll need them for evil.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Doompunk Waistcoat
desc: The perfect garment for housing a pocketwatch, monocle, and perhaps poison needles. Definitely some evil stuff in those pockets.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Doompunk Leggings
desc: Works equally well for a doompunk or a pirate! Or maybe a serial killer from the 80's.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Doompunk Trenchcoat
desc: Keep warm while stalking people on those frosty London evenings in this stylish piece of Grow Couture! Note: this is a "chest item", like a necklace so you can wear any shirts and back items you want underneath it.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Eye Of Growganoth

func.add: Your pet is like, way cosmic, man.

desc: This accursed necklace binds one of the eternal and innumerable Eyes of Growganoth to your service. Just make sure you don’t take “your” eye of it - at the first sign of weakness, it will devour your soul!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Apocalypse Steed
desc: The four horsemen have updated to more modern steeds. They're probably gonna be pretty mad when they find out you have swiped one.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Jack o' Lantern Mask
desc: Luckily this is just latex and not actually a gooey carved-out pumpkin.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Devil Tail
desc: Why you little devil...
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Buzzsaw
desc: This is how your shop teacher lost those fingers.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Rickety Wallpaper
desc: So this is what the inside of a haunted house looks like!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Rickety Window
desc: So this is what the inside of a haunted house looks like! Plus, you can see outside of it from here.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Rickety Door
desc: Finally, your chance to escape this haunted house! Wrench the door to set the destination.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Death's Scythe

func.add: You wield the blade of death.

desc: Careful where you swing that thing.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Demon Chariot
desc: This thing goes pretty fast for a vehicle with only 2 horsepower.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Logarithmic Wheel
desc: You know what a really good weapon is? A wagon wheel. Yeah, I mean... yeah.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Demonic Skull
desc: Just the thing for showing your appreciation of the darker musicks.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Death Metal Block
desc: Throw up the horns! METAL!!!!!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Steel Spike
desc: Hey, these things have a million uses! I can’t think of any right now, but they totally do. Just don’t leave them inside surgical patients, please.

name: Tempered Steel Spike
desc: This spike is so much shinier now! Classy enough to wear to the Halloween Ball.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Spiked Collar
desc: Ah yeah, you look tough, like a junkyard dog.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Malevolent Hair
desc: What are you up to under that mop-top? Seems like something a little sneaky..
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Riding Raven

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Only dark magic could breed a raven so massive. It`s so powerful it allows you to double-jump!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Haunted Darkness
desc: It’s pitch-black inside this haunted house! Players can only see what’s on this tile if it’s in their line of sight, or they have special tools.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Haunted Window
desc: It’s so dark in here, only the window provides any relief! Players can only see what’s on this tile if it’s in their line of sight, or they have special tools.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Haunted Door
desc: Finally, your chance to escape this haunted house! Wrench the door to set up a creepy question player must answer to go through.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Sheet Music: Spooky
desc: If you aren’t in range of a boombox, this will play a spooky sound for you. There are 14 different sounds, depending where you place it vertically. Try them all!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Stone Pagoda
desc: There's no better place for a Grand Tournament than in a pagoda!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Master Peng Stonework
desc: Isn't Master Peng awesome? This stonework blends in with Stone Pagoda blocks.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Paper Wall
desc: This wallpaper is a paper wall.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Stone Pagoda Roof Element
desc: Stick this at the ends of your pagoda roofs.It doesn't serve any functional purpose, but it does sure nice. Just make sure you put it the right way or it'll be floating in midair.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Decorative Roof Dragon
desc: Just for looks. Make your pagoda roofs spikey with dragons! Not so spikey they hurt, though.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Grand Jade Platform
desc: Something stylish to stand on. Try decorating it with Decorative Roof Dragons!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Stone Pagoda Base
desc: This is a special piece - it looks like the bottom row of a Stone Pagoda, and it even tiles properly with Stone Pagoda blocks. The trick is, it won't tile with the ones below it. Use it to put a roof in the middle of your pagoda! Kind of a key feature of pagodas, right? It will also tile with Decorative Roof Dragons.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Demonic Horns
desc: MAHHTIN looks like Tim Curry.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Master Peng
desc: Master Peng runs The Grand Tournament. Don't mess with him. But punching is how he likes to be greeted, so one punch is cool.
Hardness: 20 Hits 15 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Tourney Token
desc: Your reward for victory in The Grand Tournament. Put it in the Prize Ladder to win fabulous prizes!

name: Wooden Pagoda Wall
desc: For a warmer look to your pagoda, try wood. Also, you can walk in front of it, which stone is less forgiving about.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Wooden Pagoda Window
desc: See what's outside your pagoda!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Wooden Pagoda Door
desc: Like any door, you can wrench it to set the destination.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Wooden Pagoda Roof
desc: This is a roof for your wooden pagoda. Unlike the Wooden Pagoda Wall, this is solid, so it's safe to stand on.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Prize Ladder
desc: Players can put Tourney Tokens in here to push their luck in winning prizes.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Tournament Ticket
desc: This ticket allows you entry into one Grand Tournament. Visit Master Peng in the world TOURNAMENT to enter the tournament. You can battle as many times as you wish in the current tournament, but when it ends, your ticket will self-destruct.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Punched Tournament Ticket
desc: Your ticket has been punched! You can battle in the current Tournament as many times as you like. The ticket will self-destruct when the tournament ends. Don't lose it, or you can't battle anymore!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Snack Fu
desc: Master Ping, Master Peng's brother, runs Snack Fu, providing delicious and exotic treats to everybody watching the tournament!
Hardness: 20 Hits 15 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Ramune
desc: This fizzy lemon-lime drink is sure to result in some major burps.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Pow Stones
desc: This carbonated candy crackles and pops in your mouth. Don't worry, it's probably not made from real rocks. Warning: DO NOT COMBINE WITH SODA. Super duper true urban legends verify that this is dangerous.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Extractium Ore
desc: This mysterious element has strange properties which seem to make DNA extraction more successful!

name: Extractium Shard
desc: This mysterious element seems to be present in small quantities in ancient fossils. Maybe you can combine these shards into a piece large enough to have a measurable effect on something!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Tournament Banner
desc: Wrench this to find out key info about the Grand Tournament!
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Jade Portcullis
desc: Lock out the ruffians with this decorative gateway.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Weather Machine - Pagoda
desc: Wow, it's pagoda season already? They're sprouting up everywhere! This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Non La
desc: This conical straw hat is useful for full sun protection, as well as carrying stuff!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Minor Otherworldly Bait
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. This bait actually travels through a wormhole into a dark dimension and catches things there, instead of in the water. Minorly bad things.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Lesser Otherworldly Bait
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. This bait actually travels through a wormhole into a dark dimension and catches things there, instead of in the water. Lesser bad things.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Penguin Mask
desc: Wanna be as COOL as Master Peng? Not gonna happen. But you can wear this mask and look like a dork.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Mini-Peng
desc: Master Peng is so swift, he can appear to be in multiple at once. But in the extra places, he looks very small.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Pet Fox
desc: THE CUTENESS IS KILLING ME.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Popcorn
desc: Uh oh, drama! Somebody bust out the popcorn.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Wasabi Peas
desc: Yowza, those are some spicy peas!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Present Goblin Disguise
desc: Disguises you as a Present Goblin, bringer of joy.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Toy Train
desc: Chugga chugga CHOO CHOO!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Stuff-4-Toys Box
desc: Drop stuff in here, and we'll donate toys to needy Growtopians!
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Letter Block - Zerp
desc: This is a letter block, like you played when you were a kid! This particular one has the letter Zerp on it. But I don't need to tell you that, you can just read it.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Letter Block - Forg
desc: This is a letter block, like you played when you were a kid! This particular one has the letter Forg on it. But I don't need to tell you that, you can just read it.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Letter Block - Wump
desc: This is a letter block, like you played when you were a kid! This particular one has the letter Wump on it. But I don't need to tell you that, you can just read it.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Letter Block - Doozle
desc: This is a letter block, like you played when you were a kid! This particular one has the letter Doozle on it. But I don't need to tell you that, you can just read it.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Hideous Holiday Sweater
desc: Your grandma thinks you look adorable in this.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Winter Turtleneck
desc: Celebrate Winterfest in cozy style, with no worries of chin-freeze.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Yo-Yo
desc: It's a disk on a string. Try smacking stuff with it!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Meh, Bunny Mask
desc: MrMehMeh likes carrots.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Meh, Bunny Suit
desc: MrMehMeh stores the carrots he eats here.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Rubber Band Airplane
desc: Toss it and see where it goes! It'll smash if it hits any blocks, so aim carefully. Tap the direction you want to throw it. The further from yourself you tap, the harder you throw.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Stuff-4-Toys Shirt
desc: Stuff-4-Toys is offering these stylish t-shirts to all Silver level donators!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Present Goblin Home Edition
desc: Dress up as a Present Goblin for fun! You won't automatically drop presents, but it's festive year-round! This costume overrides all other clothing, but if you don't like tossing tennis balls, try equipping other sportsballs with it!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Solsascarf
desc: Solsagann is tossing out yesterday's baguettes! They are quite stale.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Stuff-4-Toys Tote Bag
desc: Tote around your shopping with our fabulous tote bag. It lets everybody know you are serious about donating Stuff for Toys.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Betty Bluetooth Doll
desc: This high-tech doll is the big craze this Winterfest! Everybody wants a remote-controlled doll that fires deadly lightning bolts!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Surg-E
desc: This robot is an amazingly accurate human analog (just look at it!), capable of simulating a wide range of disease and trauma conditions. Place it anywhere and wrench it to perform surgery just like on a human being. Since you have to cut into it, it's only usable once, win or lose.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Caduceus
desc: This symbol is your reward for saving someone with surgery. You can trade them for rare surgical prizes by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785. Double-tap this in your inventory to combine 100 of them into a Golden Caduceus.

name: Golden Caduceus
desc: This is worth 100 Caducei (that's the plural of Caduceus, I looked it up!). Double-tap this in your inventory to break one back into 100 Caducei. You can trade these for rare surgical prizes by calling Sales-Man on your telephone at 53785.

name: Golden Dragon Statue
desc: Congratulations, you won the Grand Tournament!
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Silver Dragon Statue
desc: Congratulations, you placed in the top 3 of the Grand Tournament!
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Jade Dragon Statue
desc: Congratulations, you placed in the top 10 of the Grand Tournament!
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Surgical Pins
desc: Used only in surgery. When a bone is absolutely shattered,you need to use pins to put it back together. A [[Surgical Splint]] won't do it! Can only be used once you've opened an incision, of course.

name: Surgical Transfusion
desc: Used only in surgery. If a patient's blood supply gets dangerously low, this will fill 'er up!

name: Surgical Defibrillator
desc: Used only in surgery. If a patient's heart stops (which can happen when they are anesthetized), zap them with this to fire it up again.

name: Surgical Clamp
desc: Used only in surgery. This can reduce a patient's bleeding significantly, but without closing up their incisions, like [[Surgical Stitches]] will do. You can only use this when you have open incisions.

name: Surgical Ultrasound
desc: Used only in surgery. This detailed scan can inform you of any broken bones, tumors, or other physical issues within the patient's body. Use this right away to diagnose the problem!

name: Surgical Lab Kit
desc: Used only in surgery. This kit will identify different microbes that could be present in the patient. Use it right away to diagnose any bacterial or viral issues. You cannot use Surgical Antibiotics until you've used a Lab Kit to identify the bacteria you're fighting.

name: Empty Surgery Tray
desc: Not a real item, just used for an icon.

name: Autoclave
desc: Wrench this device to clean your surgical instruments. And by "clean", we mean exchange 20 of one instrument for 1 of every other instrument.
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Biotronic Brain Enhancer

func.rem: You're getting dumber by the second.

desc: This advanced cybernetic technology will increase your mental capacity, granting you 50% more XP (on average) for half an hour.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Plague Doctor Mask
desc: There was a time when actual medical professionals would go out on the streets wearing this. It was a creepy, creepy time.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Plague Doctor Hat
desc: Rumpled and trumpy, really showing your dedication to your craft.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Plague Doctor Robe
desc: This robe is intended to protect you from pestilence. Sadly it was invented in pre-scientific times, so all it really protects you from is cold weather.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Living Dead Remote
desc: You just couldn't accept your patients' deaths. And now you've created an abomination, haven't you? What has your foul science wrought?!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Spare Body Part
desc: Oh, nobody's even gonna notice this is missing, I'm sure. They had at least two of these when they came in.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Spare Body
desc: Wow, you had all the right parts to make a spare body! You never know when this might come in handy.

name: Limb Connector
desc: This horrible twisted spikey thing could surely jam some limbs together if you needed to do that. For some reason.

name: Water Spirit Necklace
desc: Zfert's got spirit!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Massive Fang
desc: Imagine the size of the wolf this came from!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Howler
desc: This seemingly harmless statue actually launches deadly sonic blasts. Wrench it to set the rate of fire! You can place as many Howlers as you like, but only 10 blasts can exist at a time, so if you have a lot, most of them will just sit there.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Fuzzy Pants
desc: Ah, classic fuzzy pants.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Gemmin' Juice

func.add: Chance of bonus gems from breaking blocks!

desc: Got your mind on your gems and your gems on your mind? Start sippin' on Gemmin' Juice! It gives you a 10% chance of getting double gems from any blocks you break for 30 minutes. Consumed when used.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Wolf Skull Shoulders
desc: Three heads are better than one, even if two of them are empty and skinless.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Wolf Gate
desc: Punch it to open or shut it! Anybody unlucky enough to be caught inside when it closes gets wolfed down.
Hardness: 15 Hits 12 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Wolf Ticket
desc: This ticket is your reward for completing Wolfworld. You can trade them for rare Wolfworld prizes by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785. Double-tap this in your inventory to combine 100 of them into an Enchanted Wolf Ticket.

name: Enchanted Wolf Ticket
desc: This is worth 100 Wolf Tickets. Double-tap this in your inventory to break one back into 100 Wolf Tickets. You can trade this for rare Wolfworld prizes by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785.

name: Sales-Man Standee
desc: The perfect way to advertise your wares - with a cardboard cut-out of Sales-Man himself! Scientifically proven to drive conversions and increase ROI.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Sales Shades
desc: Cover your eyes, the savings are simply too glorious to behold!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ghost Wolf Monocle
desc: This monocle is haunted by the spirit of an ancient wolf! That's more common than you'd expect among monocles.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Challenge of Fenrir
desc: Your progress in the Wolfworld has caused Fenrir himself to challenge you! Use this summons on All Howl's Eve to enter the halls of Valhowla. Once inside, you'll have only 3 minutes to search for the 4 treasures. Also don't forget Climbing Boots and a light source!
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Party Screamer
desc: Blow this horn to let everybody know where the party is! It’s like a super broadcast, only you can’t control what you say, because this party be OFF THE CHIZZY!!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Valhowla Treasure
desc: Treasures for players to collect in Valhowla.
Hardness: 12 Hits 9 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Party Popper
desc: Get the party started with a blast of streamers!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Party Bunting
desc: Dress the place up a little for our anniversary party!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Party Fowl
desc: Whoa dude, major party fowl. You earned this for playing Growtopia for THREE YEARS, and over 300 hours, and reaching level 50! Wow, that's dedication.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: IIII Block
desc: It's Growtopia's fourth anniversary! Celebrate with this classic pewter-plated design reminiscent of the Roman numeral 4. Yes you can write 4 as IIII instead of IV, that's a real thing!
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Party Cake
desc: This tastes so good it just makes you want to dance!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Head Bangin' Steel Wolf
desc: This robotic wolf rocks hard. Punch to activate, wrench to adjust settings.
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Pink Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely pink fabric.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Blue Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely blue fabric.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: White Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely white fabric.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Green Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely green fabric.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Yellow Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely yellow fabric.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Red & White Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: Green & Yellow Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: Blue Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Black Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Heart Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Pink Cat As A Hat Seed
Blue Cat As A Hat Seed
Grey Cat As A Hat Seed
Orange Cat As A Hat Seed
Gruel
desc: This bland flavorless mush is not delicious. The only nice thing about it is that you can feed it to a Silkworm without changing its color!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Pegasus

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: If you were a pegasus, you'd spend all your time flying too. Why walk on those teeny legs? These mighty wings allow you both to double jump too.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Golden Pegasus

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: If you were a pegasus, you'd spend all your time flying too. Why walk on those teeny legs? Those mighty wings allow you both to double jump too.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Heart Glasses
desc: The world just looks like a lovelier place through these rose-colored glasses.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Loveseat
desc: Legs getting tired? Have a seat!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Golden Heart Glasses
desc: The world just looks like a more expensive place through these gold-tinted glasses.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Chocolate Heart
desc: Chocolate heals all wounds. Emotional wounds that is. It is pretty useless for broken bones. And really it doesn't do much for emotional problems either, it just tastes good.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Valentine Dress
desc: Dress for the occasion!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ruby Shard
desc: Watch out, this is a really sharp fragment of Ruby. It seems strangely magnetically attracted to other shards like it. Maybe if you got 200 of them together, they'd fuse into something! Yeah, that's how reality works!
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Ruby Lock
desc: Locks an entire world. And looks lovely doing it. There's a 1% chance each day that a rock in the world will become Heartstone! More rocks do not increase the chance.
Hardness: 42 Hits 32 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Chemsynth Processor
desc: Place a row of 10 Chemsynth Tanks to the right of this machine, and then wrench it to use GrowTech's new synthetic chemical creation technology! Patent pending.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Chemsynth Tank
desc: You'll need to attach this to the right side of a Chemsynth Processor to get any use out of it. You'll need 10 attached to a Chemsynth Processor, in fact.
Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Chemsynth Centrifuge
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to rotate chemicals around it. Rotates as many from the right as it can to match how many are to the left of the selected Tank.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Chemsynth Replicator
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to duplicate its contents, pushing all chemicals to the right to make room.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Chemsynth Catalyst
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to shift its color upward on the spectrum (Red, Yellow, Green, Blue, Pink, Red). This also affects all touching tanks of the same color.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Chemsynth Solvent
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to dissolve it, shifting chemicals left to fill in the gap. A random chemical is added to the rightmost tank.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Chemsynth Stirrer
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to swap the chemicals on either side of it with each other. The selected tank is unaffected.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Synthetic Chemical
desc: This chemical was created in a lab. Its properties are virtually untested!

name: Gruesome Marker
desc: Use these sort of like Doors – They have IDs, so Doors can lead to them, though you can’t travel from them. Use your Wrench to set their ID.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Skeletal Throne
desc: Looks like you’re the new king of the zombies! Or somebody with four legs died here.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: Zombie Brain
desc: Ew, this is a brain that popped out of a zombie’s head! Maybe sales-man wants it, You sure don’t. Double-tap this in your inventory to combine 100 of them into a Pile Of Zombie Brains!

name: Pile of Zombie Brains
desc: Ew, this is a brain that popped out of a zombie's head! Maybe Sales-Man wants it. You sure don't. Double-tap this in your inventory to split it up into 100 Zombie Brains.

name: Mutated Seed Core
desc: This is an immature mutated seed. It’ll mature into a mutated seed if you log out and back in!

name: Zombie Defense Force Helmet
desc: This helmet covers your vital brain region from zombie attack. Unfortunately, zombies only need to punch you to infect you, so it's not terribly useful.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Zombie Defense Force Uniform
desc: This is the official uniform of the Zombie Defense Force! It has lots of pockets for your lip balm, candy, paper clips, and other key zombie-fighting tools.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Zombie Defense Force Pants
desc: You could just wear any green pants and you probably won't get in trouble, but these have a cool Z logo sewn into the inside waistband.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Camouflage Facepaint
desc: They'll never see you coming. Unless they look anywhere other than your face. At least you might freak them out - "Ah, it's a guy with no face!!"
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: AK-8087

func.add: You shoot bullets instead of punching!

desc: The ultimate zombie-slaying weapon. Or pumpkin-slaying.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Barricaded Door
desc: This door has been barricaded, so zombies can't get through it, only normal Growtopians! Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Infected Door
desc: Yuck, this door has horrible zombie slime on it. Nobody but a zombie would dare enter it. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Zombie Sign
desc: This sign is written in Zombiese, so humans can't read it. only zombies!

desc: Laced with unobtanium, this floating rock comes complete with lovely cinematic waterfalls! The perfect touch to elevate a zen garden, or at least make your neighbours jealous.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Earth Asteroid
desc: You might think most asteroids are made of earth already, but this one have EXTRA earth for the dirtiest, most magnificently rocky experience to be found in a floating piece of the heavens.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Wind Asteroid
desc: The howling winds that came down with this asteroid have become a permanent part of it! Now it will float forever, whispering the secrets of space to you as it does. (NOTE: Secret of space may not actually be secret. Or audible.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Inferno Gate
desc: These blazing magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination. Ow hot!
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Tidal Gate
desc: These rippling magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination. Ah, refreshing!
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Typhoon Gate
desc: These whispering magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia.
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Verdant Gate
desc: These lush magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination. Wow, tropical!
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Ancient Hinge
desc: Creaking with legendary power, this must be the piece of something far greater. And doorlike. Maybe.

name: Ancient Pin
desc: Eons have not dulled the point of this pointy treasure. Careful! It's supernaturally pokey!

name: Ancient Bracket
desc: Superb craftmanship has kept this pristine across the ages. Once part of some grand design, it can be again... if you can figure out what it will make!

name: Ancient Lens
desc: Forged with long-lost sorceries, this glass remains unscratched after untold centuries! What could it reflect? Peer through it and into a time long past...

name: Crystallized Reality
desc: A raw chunk of reality itself! The pure magic surrounding it could certainly be used for something spectacular... or set on a shelf to look pretty!
Hardness: 9 Hits 7 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Crystallized Wealth
desc: A pure piece of prosperity! The solidified richness surrounding it could certainly be used for something spectacular... or set on a shelf to look pretty.
Hardness: 9 Hits 7 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Crystallized Brilliance
desc: Thought given form! The tangible intelligence surrounding it could certainly be used for something spectacular... or set on a shelf to look pretty!
Hardness: 9 Hits 7 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Crystallized Nature
desc: A fragment of Gaia's beating heart! The unstoppable life force surrounding it could certainly used for something spectacular... or set on a shelf to look pretty!
Hardness: 9 Hits 7 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Ancestral Totem of Wisdom
desc: Incredible forces of willpower and mental strength have been combined with the building blocks of creation to forge this totem. Equip it and ancient knowledge will be yours...

name: Ancestral Tesseract of Dimensions
desc: Astonishing whirls of space and time have been combined with the building blocks of creation to forge this tesseract. Equip it and watch your hoard grow..

name: Ancestral Seed of Life
desc: Fantastic powers of verdant night have been combined with the building blocks of creation to forge this seed. Equip it and the bloom of life will bend to your will...

name: Ancestral Lens of Riches
desc: Unrelenting luck and luxury have been combined with the building blocks of creation to forge this lens. Equip it and unstoppable fortune will be yours... but do be careful. Power tends to corrupt, after all.

name: Ancient Altar
desc: A celestial seat of crafting power - use this to make your artifact even better. Who knew you could improve on perfection?
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Ghastly Robe

func.add: Whoooaaaa! You're a scary ghooooost! Boo!
func.rem: You are back among the living.

desc: Clutching darkness whispers from the very essence of this dire robe. A mantle of unfathomable shadow, only the brave dare wear it, for it is marked by the haunting touch of the grave. We don't know where it came from - only that it must have been incredibly, deeply dark.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Bonsai
desc: Carefully tended and artfully shaped, this miniature plant is a harmonious expression of art and nature. It also makes for very tasty - but very small - salad!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Acorn
desc: The tiny start of a mighty oak! Don't collect too many, or the squirrels will come for you.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Centerpiece
desc: A colorful collection of leaves, candles, and wood. No fall celebration is complete without a stylish centerpiece to get in the way of people trying to enjoy their meal.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Maple Leaf
desc: A lovely leaf, it's color burnt by the changing seasons. It's a sign of hockey, Canadian patriotism, and, most importantly... pancake syrup!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Dragon Scales
desc: Shimmering layers of reptillian armor fit for the mightiest of drakes. Surprisingly enough, they also make for a really nice wallpaper!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Koi Fish
desc: This majestic koi will instantly make any pond or fish tank at least 86% classier. Don't question it - it's science!

name: Leaves
desc: Piles of fall leaves are good for exactly two things: Jumping into them, and who cares? I'm gonna jump in some leaves!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Celestial Kaleidoscope
desc: Whirling mirrors of the finest crystal reveal a beautiful barrage of color and patterns. Just don't stare at them too long, or you'll start seeing psychedelic swirls everywhere! Ow, my eyes!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Harmonic Chimes
desc: These Chimes hum with crystal wisdom, bringing serenity to all who hear their gentle music...tough they sometimes play heavy metal for no apparent reason
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Hay
desc: Haaaaay! A big bale of harvest goodness, this is the perfect treat for a hungry horse. Just don't feed them too much. It makes them crazy.
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Pinecone
desc: The secret weapon of pine trees. Nothing says 'fall' like getting hit in the head with a big, pointy bundle of seeds! Ow!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Weather Machine - Autumn
desc: Rev this baby up and enter a world of fall delights! Rustling leaves, setting suns, and a brisk chill in the air await you - just punch to activate! This sensitive technology will not function when damaged.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Tea
desc: Steady your hands with a refreshing sip of herbal tea! Posh! Halves the chance of skill failure when performing surgeries! (Doesn't stack with other items that reduces skill failure chance)
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Tea Set
desc: Be careful! This upscale set of porcelain goodness is incredibly delicate. One wrong move, and you'll chip it and let all the tea ghosts out! They are a thing, you know.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Scarecrow Mask
desc: Act out your inner villain - or scare the bejeezus out of some birds - with this creepy harvest headgear. Who knew burlap and stitches could be so unsettling?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Rake
desc: Tear up some topsoil with this handy home implement. Can anything really be better than punching though?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Cloud Rabbit
desc: Bunny bunny bunny cloud cloud cloud bunny cloud bunny cloud bunny bunny cloud cloud
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Dryad
desc: This pint-sized woodland sprite will defend the beauty of nature - and you - with all her adorable might! Just don't eat salads around her - it's very insensitive.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

desc: Create your own place of peace with this tranquil block. This has been carefully crafted with only the most soothing grains of sand, and trust me, it takes FOREVER to pick out the right ones.

name: Harvest Scarf
desc: A whirling wisp of fabric to accent your perfect harvest style. Will also keep you warm with extra snuggly fibers. Seriously, this thing is, like, TEN times snuzzlier than the next leading scarf.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Soul Stone
desc: Unearthly life pulses within this strange stone! You think it might be a link to the great beyond... but what purpose could such ancient power have in the worlds of the living? No one knows..

name: Plasma Globe
desc: Beams of dancing light twist and twirl within this glassy orb, bringing out the mad scientist in everyone! Also makes your hair stand up, which is pretty cool.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Cloak of Falling Waters

func.add: Your back is a raging rapid!
func.rem: You are a lot more dry, and a lot less cool.

desc: Mystic whorls of water have been bound in shifting fabric to forge a cape fit for only the wettest, wildest Growtopians. Command one of the primeval elements through the Azure Gem of Waters pinned to this gorgeous cloak and use it to extinguish even the mightiest blazes. Or y'know, spray people with it. It's your cape.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Demon Megalodon

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

Fish Monster Mask
desc: Ew! This thing is frilly, wet, and slimy - most places won't want you around in it, except maybe those hipster fish restaurants. May I recommend the "Black Lagoon Risotto"?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Demented Cowl
desc: Make friends with the shadows in this crazed - yet cool - cowl of darkness! Looming darkness may give those who wear this creepy cloth a pass...
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Iron Maiden
desc: Ouch! This thing packs some seriously spiky nails. However tempting it may be, do NOT go inside!
Hardness: 15 Hits 12 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Looming Shadows
desc: Uh, Its just a trick of the light, right? Nothing to worry about, right? RIGHT?! Oh man you'd better move!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

desc: Dangling spooky bats on string. Don't worry, your fellow Growtopians will totally think they're the real deal. Keep those wigs covered!

Hardness: 15 Hits 12 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Headsman's Hood

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Doll Head Part
desc: Hmm, looks like part of a doll! I bet you could make a complete one if you found the other pieces.
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Doll Torso Part
desc: Hmm, looks like part of a doll! I bet you could make a complete one if you found the other pieces.

name: Doll Legs Part
desc: Hmm, looks like part of a doll! I bet you could make a complete one if you found the other pieces.

name: Pumpkin Candy
desc: Pumped full of seasonal goodness! For a tasty snack, take fresh pumpkin seeds, roast in the oven in a single layer at 300F until dry (about 50 minutes), then take them out, toss with melted butter, sugar, cinamon, and salt, and return to the oven at 350F until golden (about 12 more minutes). Growlicious!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Chi Harmonizer
desc: A tuning fork for the fundamental forces of nature. This strange device will broaden the spectrum of chi requirements for any crystal recipes you craft... but only once! Groovy.
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Harmonic Lock
desc: Forged from the finest, most calming and balanced materials in all the worlds, this lock's peerless powers will influence ANY crystal recipes you craft. Using it to lock a world will broaden the spectrum of chi requirements for crystal balancing within! Radical!
Hardness: 42 Hits 32 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Neon Gum

func.add: Dazzle your friends as super funky neon lines course across your skin.

desc: Take a piece and dazzle your friends as super funky neon lines course across your skin. Chew rapidly to get a Speed boost and surround yourself with glowing bubbles!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Neon Nerves
desc: Check it out, chummer! Slap this colour-shifting circuitry under your skin and dazzle those dataslaves with wired speed! The only thing they'll catch is a trail of arctic light as you leave them in the dust!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Static Hair
desc: A shocking style for sure, but there might be more to it than that! Maybe you should check to see if it reacts with any other electrical sources...
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Amethyst Choker
desc: Clasp your neck in this flawlessly cut piece of jewelwork, and be the envy of all.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Opal Block
desc: An enormous chunk of shimmering opal, resplendent in it's square-shaped majesty. You could never build a house out of opal in the real world, which is just one more reason why Growtopia is so much cooler.
Hardness: 15 Hits 12 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Kaleidoscopic Wallpaper
desc: Build with these chunks of psychedelic sweetness, and their shimmering patterns will forever delight visitors to your worlds. I wonder if they'd hypnotize people, too - just look at those colors...
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Demon Crystal
desc: Vile energies ripple across the surface of this twisted relic. Ancient tales tell of a demon trapped within a profane crystal - could this be it? And if so, what of the other legends, those that speak of a crown of stars stolen by the fiend? Could this be its prison? Could there be a way to pry the crown from its clutches?
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Celestial Lance

func.rem: Seriously? Are you joking? You're totally joking!

desc: Everyone's heard of crafting swords from fallen stars, but this incredible weapon is forged from the CONSTELLATIONS themselves, radiating with the might of the heavens. Vile corruption and ancient darkness are no match for the glory of this device, for it can banish them utterly.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Celestial Halo
desc: Ripped from the heavens, stolen by demons, and now bequeathed to you. This miraculous crown will make you as light as the feather itself - a fitting gift for one who would stand against the darkness.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Celestial Frame
desc: Let the twinkling majesty of the heavens enclose your artwork! Comes with a blank canvas inside if you don't have any art. Note: If your art is made of background blocks, you'll need to apply Block Glue to it to make the frame surround it!

name: Celestial Dust

name: Celestial Blade

name: Turkey Onesie Feet

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ice Crust Block

Hardness: 8 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 6 s of inactivity.

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Catfish Slippers

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Dogfish Slippers

name: Picasso Face

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Puffer Fish Block
desc: Puffer Fish expand when scared, and here in Growtopia, they're always terrified for some reason. Watch out for those spikes!

name: Queen Conch Shell

name: Radiation Block

name: Fancy Fish Wall Mount

name: Tiny Frozen Chunk

name: Small Frozen Chunk
desc: Oh no! The frigid waters froze your bait into a small chunk! Consume to get a Mega-Pellet Bait.

name: Large Frozen Chunk

name: Tiny Radioactive Bit

name: Small Radioactive Bit

name: MAGPLANT 5000
desc: Tired of picking up things with your puny human hands only to put them down later? With the awesome power of MAGNETS, these woes will be a thing of the past! GrowTech inc. proudly presents the MAGPLANT 5000, an all-in-one item-collecting and planting masterpiece. Simply target the machine to the seed or block of your choosing, and it will collect and store any that drop in your world! Only collects items from breaking blocks and harvesting!
Hardness: 42 Hits 32 Hits  | Restores after 1 s of inactivity.

name: MAGPLANT 5000 Remote

name: Cupid Leash

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: USMom's Talaria

func.rem: Your feet are back on the ground!

name: Golden Talaria

func.rem: Your feet are back on the ground!

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Heart Necklace

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Valentine's Dust

Drinks Hat

Once again, we reiterate that this is an illusion - Growtech accepts no responsibility for users getting stuck in tight spaces (or inability to use auras convincingly).
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Riding Fiesta Axolotl
desc: What's this now? The cute little Mexican critter is wearing a sombrero? Well, things just got a whole lot more adorable, didn't they?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Feather Headdress
desc: If you're the slightest bit ticklish, stay away from this flamboyant, feather-adorned headgear. If not, then wear it with grace and become the Tickle Master!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Fiesta Mariachi Guitar
desc: Bring the party everywhere you go. When you /dance with this, you can perform for your friends!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

func.add: Get 100 Gems for beating a Pet Trainer.

desc: One great guacamole! Will have you saying, "I don't give a guac!" as you and your pet charge into battle! Food Buff: 100 gems for every Pet Trainer defeated.
Hardness: 1 Hits1 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

desc: One grandly tasty guacamole! Will have you saying, "I don't give a guac!" as you and your pet charge into battle! Food Buff: 150 gems for every Pet Trainer defeated.

desc: One glamorously perfect guacamole! Will have you saying, "I don't give a guac!" as you and your pet charge into battle! Food Buff: 200 gems for every Pet Trainer defeated.
Hardness: 1 Hits1 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Growmoji Cactus
desc: Pop some spicey spikes into your chat with this cactus! Just consume it to add it to your available Growmojis!
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Pinata Lasso
desc: Make the Piñata Bash more fun than ever by snaring the Ultra Piñata with this lasso. It'll seriously reduce the speed it travels for 15 seconds!
Hardness: 3 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Bandolier
desc: The favored garb of a legendary outlaw, this is the perfect gear for rustling cattle, robbing trains and - surprisingly - afternoon tea. Who knew?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Dual Six-Shooters

func.add: You shoot bullets instead of punching!

desc: Did you shoot 11 bullets... or 12? Trick question: These guns never run out! Sure, NONE of Growtopia's guns ever run out, but these come loaded with extra grit and vigor! Yahoo!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Dark Spirit Board
desc: Able to commune with dark and devastating powers from beyond the veil, this board can rip answers from the other side in the hands of a talented medium! Requires 5 brave Growtopians to stand in a circle around the board in order to properly contact the Realms Beyond. Only the owner of a world can place this board for safety reasons. WARNING: Using this means meddling with incredibly strong powers that can damage - and may destroy - worlds! Be careful where you use it. Your bedroom may not be the best idea!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Spirit Board
desc: Tired of paying overpriced mediums and fortune tellers to chat up the dead? Don't throw your money away! Invest in a Spirit Board and start contacting ghosts on your own! It's like a seance in a box!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Spirit Guide
desc: This little ghost will guide you on your travels, and he’ll even reduce the chance of a Spirit Board breaking when summoning ghosts! Aww, isn’t that nice of him?
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ghost-Be-Gone
desc: A blast of ectoplasmic annihilation! Use this mighty mix to remove all ghosts from the world!
Hardness: 1 Hits1 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Dumpster
desc: Pretty standard place to put all your trash, but that's about it. At least it's not on fire.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 15 s of inactivity.

name: White Brick Wall
desc: Combines a fairly boring color with a moderately boring building material to create... a somewhat boring wall. Huzzah.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 15 s of inactivity.

name: Fuse Box
desc: Your standard wall, now with electrical wires and junctions and stuff! Everything's cooler when you stick a fuse box on it.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 15 s of inactivity.

name: Otherworldly Block
desc: This thing isn't from around here. I've looked at a lot of blocks, but not many that looked back! Especially from another world...
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 15 s of inactivity.

name: Otherworldly Warning Light
desc: Alert! Alert! This spiritually-attuned light will flash on if it detects otherworldly entities nearby! Use it to prepare yourself for an onslaught from the afterlife!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 15 s of inactivity.

name: Boss Goo
desc: Rare spectral ichor! You don't get this from just any ghost. I bet it could be turned into something useful... Warning: Is sure to overload any Spirit Storage Unit! Good news, though; The more ghosts you have in the SSU before you add this, the better your odds for something really good!

name: Mind-Ghost-In-A-Jar
desc: Spooky! This jar contains a ghost - a mental one! You can throw it to break the jar and unleash the ghost, or instead drop it gently in front of a Spirit Storage Unit, where you can keep the ghost for good!
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Ghost Trap
desc: Snags spirits in a snap! Place this trap down and it'll suck in a ghost that's above it. The Ghost Trap generates an enhanced field that is larger than a ghost jar, but you'll probably still need some friends with Neutron Guns to keep the ghost contained or it will escape! A trap takes 2 seconds to activate, and then only collects spirits for 5 seconds, so time it carefully!
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Containment Field Power Node
desc: Power this node with little ghosts to activate. Put four active nodes near each other to create a containment field that can weaken a Boss Ghost! Note: The Boss Ghost can only be damaged while weakened inside the field!
Hardness: 15 Hits 12 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Neutron Power Glove
desc: Summons deadly spectral energies to give you the awesome power to punch ghosts dead! Well, again. Actually, we’re not sure where they go... but they’re not happy about it!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: White Brick Pillar
desc: You'd think adding a pillar to a boring white wall made of boring white bricks would make it more exciting, but... turns out it's a boring pillar, too. Dang.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 15 s of inactivity.

name: Neutron Focus Core

func.rem: Now you are a wimp again.

desc: Insert this into your Neutron Pack to give it a little extra oomph. Will deal double damage for a short time before burning out, so use it wisely!
Hardness: 2 Hits 2 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Foil Hat
desc: Paranoid when there’s someone out there, inclined to meddle with your mind? Don this fancy little hat and fear no more! Its foily goodness will protect you from even the most powerful mind control!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Summer Event Player Medal: Gold
desc: Awarded for achieving FIRST PLACE in the Player Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this in your world, and congratulations!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 2 s of inactivity.

name: Summer Event Player Medal: Gold Seed
EctoJuicer
desc: Infuse your muscles with the unearthly might of the Other Side! This spectral potion gives you the strength to wring every last drop of ectoplasm from a defeated Boss Ghost, granting you an EXTRA Boss Goo after a successful banishing!

desc: The fearsome warriors of the Greezak Horde welcome you to the hunt! These leg plate are aerodynamic and whisper-quiet, perfect for a hunting party (or a late-night snack run.

Greezak Horde - Skull Necklace
desc: The fearsome warriors of the Greezak Horde welcome you to the hunt! This necklace of trophies was taken from a veteran Greezak, and chronicles the results of his many successful (and delicious) hunts.

name: Greezak Horde - Shoulder Cannon
desc: Lock onto your prey and fire! This incredibly deadly shoulder cannon is designed to leave a Greezak warrior's hands free so he can fight and fire at the same time! The plasma bolts it shoots are low-energy, so they don't ruin animal pelts.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: LordStar Environment Mask
desc: The mask of a daring outlaw king! Raid ancient alien treasures and splash your name across the cosmos from behind this fantastic mask! All will (probably) remember you!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Space Thruster Boost Boots
desc: Zip through space and hover like a champ with these high-tech boost boots! Thanks to a HyperTech dynamo core, these can keep you off the ground forever, meaning you'll never have dirty shoes again! Now THAT'S progress!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Alien Mind Protector
desc: Alien in your brain! Alien in your brain! Thankfully, this is one of the few times that's actually a good thing, because you're fortunate enough to have a Mind Protector along for the ride! This clever controller will keep your gray matter safe from those who might try to mess with your thoughts!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: MagTron LightCycle
desc: Flaring with HyperTech superluminal banding and an everlasting reactor, this bike is unstoppably cool AND eco-friendly. It'll never run out of juice, and as long as you're riding it, you'll never be out of style.
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Ferungi Ears
desc: A race of a galactic merchants and business dealers, the Ferungi love to chat. That's why theirs ears are so huge - they never want to miss a conversation (or a potential trade secret)!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Volcanix Ears
desc: Very pointy! And the pointier the ears, the wiser the Volcanix, as they say. The founding race of the Stellarix Union, the Volcanix are a deeply pragmatic and calculating people with long lifespans. These factors have led them to become distant, even detached from galactic affairs, which is why it's up to the Startopian Empire to keep the peace!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Startopian Empire - Force Shield & Phase Blaster

func.add: Shield ready and Phaser set to "punch"!

desc: The most advanced personal combat gear ever designed for Startopian Special Forces, this blaster/shield combination uses re-engineered HyperTech repulsor to deflect attacks and keep their wielder safe even as they unleash blazing lances of plasma on their foes! When activated, grants immunity to thrown consumables for 5 seconds (starts as soon as you get hit), followed by a 30-minute cooldown.

name: Startopian Empire - Force Shield & Phase Blaster Seed
Robot Legs
desc: Tired of using your boring human legs like a sucker? Well, fear not, because the advanced surgical teams of the Stellarix Union have crafted these incredible robot legs to take you to and fro without having to waste a single calorie! Powered by Stellithium X9 battery and guarenteed to work 2 billion steps or your buckazoids back, these legs will keep on walking after you drop!
Hardness: 0 Hits 0 Hits  | Restores after 0 s of inactivity.

name: Starship Floor Tile
desc: Welded durallium tiles to keep up with all manner of interstellar wear and tear. If you're going to be flying through a vacuum in a fragile metal box, you'd better have something solid underfoot.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Starship Wall
desc: Keep out the horrors of space with these welded durallium walls. A must-have for the discerning starship captain.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Starship Door
desc: When you have to enter a room on a spaceship, do you want it to be through lame door with HINGES, or whisper-smooth sliding metal panels? The choice is clear.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Starship Transporter
desc: A new Checkpoint for a new future! Take a walk by this device to save your bio-signatures in its transporter buffer! If you die, you'll respawn at the last Checkpoint you touched!
Hardness: 7 Hits 6 Hits  | Restores after 4 s of inactivity.

name: Starship Console Panel
desc: Make a few important adjustments to your starship systems with this easy-access console.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Starship Porthole
desc: Enjoy staring into the endless void of space but don't want to go for a spacewalk to see it? Pop a porthole into your starship and enjoy the view instead!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Starship Airlock
desc: A deadly dangerous vacuum lurks beyond the metal safety of your starship - so let's add a way to get to it quickly! This airlock is a one-way ticket into the void, so if it's open while you're nearby, watch your step!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Starship Deck Ladders
desc: A quick and easy way to get to higher places on your starship! Note that these ladders are based off the ancient GrowTech ladder technology, so you can still only go up, not down. But now you can do it in SPACE!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Looming Triffid
desc: The Triffid is the second-deadliest creature on Parblaax XII, capable of devouring a Greezak warrior whole in mere seconds! Don't step beneath it, or you'll find out first-hand just how quick they are!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Xenoid Acid Pool
desc: A seething pit of Xenoid poison, this caustic block will set anything that touches it ablaze, and is exactly the sort of thing that keeps the Xenoid from being invited to the nicer parties.
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Greezak Hive Floor
desc: Few Startopians have seen the inside of a Greezak Hive and lived, so whoever got you this floor block was either very brave or very lucky!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Greezak Hive Wall
desc: Few Startopians have seen the inside of a Greezak Hive and lived, so whoever got you this wall block was either very brave or very lucky!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: The Varlaak
desc: A toothy maw of ever-hungering destruction, the Varlaak is only too happy to eat anything that comes close. Terribly dangerous, but also an easy way to dispose of kitchen scraps and unwanted guests!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 3 s of inactivity.

name: Replicator
desc: HyperTech engineering at its finest, the Replicator uses chronoburners to help you prepare your food, granting a small chance to get a temporal COPY of whatever you create! That's two dishes for the price of one! Wow! Thanks HyperTech!
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Star Tool Droid
desc: A tireless forgebot, this droid works constantly, hoping to produce a useful Star Tool for its owner. Creating these advanced pieces of technology takes time, however, so you shouldn't expect a new tool any sooner than once every five days.
Hardness: 10 Hits 8 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Star Fuel
desc: While every starship uses Growtomic Energy to power its systems and engines, revving up its Emergency Warp requires something with a bit more kick! That's where Star Fuel comes in: Every time you escape a dangerous situation (or fail a mission), you'll use up Star Fuel to do it! Always make sure you have enough!
Hardness: 4 Hits 3 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Buckazoid
desc: The currency of the stars! This buckazoid is your reward for successfully completing a mission for the Startopian Empire. You can exchange buckazoids for rare interstellar prizes by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785! Double-tap this in your inventory to combine 100 of them into a Mega Buckazoid!

name: Imperial Starship Blast

Note: Comes with a full tank of gas, an Imperial Helm - Mk. I, Imperial Reactor - Mk. I and an Imperial Viewscreen - Mk. I, so you'll be all set for your adventure among the stars! Also comes with an assortment of space-age blocks!
Hardness: 6 Hits 5 Hits  | Restores after 5 s of inactivity.

name: Red Contact Lens
desc: Give your eyes an overhaul and get the red in with these pupil-painting lenses! You may need multiple lenses - and other colors- to achieve a desired effect.

name: Green Contact Lens
desc: Give your eyes an overhaul and go for the green by popping in these pupil-painting lenses! You may need multiple lenses - and other colors - to achieve a desired affect.

name: Blue Contact Lens
desc: Give your eyes an overhaul in a beautifully blue way with these handy pupil-painting lenses! You may need multiple lenses - and other colors - to achieve a desired affect.

name: Black Contact Lens
desc: Wrap your pupils in eban darkness with these bleakly black lenses. When your friends stare into your eyes, the void will stare back! You may need multiple lenses - and other colors - to achieve a desired effect.

name: Contact Lens Cleaning Solution
desc: Tired of your current pupil color? Give them a wash with this hygienic cleaning solution! Note: You might need more than on application to finish the job!

desc: My, what fine fashion you have! This hoodie will keep you warm and, more importantly, looking great in all kinds of weather!

name: Big Bad Blue Hoodie
desc: Time to huff, puff, and blue your hood down! This hoodie will keep you warm and, more importantly, looking great in all kinds of weather!

name: Punk Purple Hoodie
desc: Break out of the routine and set your own style as long as it's purple! This hoodie will keep you warm and, more importantly, looking great in all kinds of weather!

name: Dabstep Low Top Sneakers
desc: Light up every footfall and move to a better beat with these dabulous shoes! When you're wearing these, the world is your dance floor!

name: Horns of Infinity

func.add: The horns turned out to be finite!

desc: Ripped from the endless gulf between the stars, these twisted horns still carry a touch of hyperspace! They'll accelerate you into the great beyond, but just remember - when you stare into the void... the void stares back!

name: Rhinestone Evening Dress
desc: All eyes are on you when you stride into the ballroom in this vintage dress! It sparkles and shines like a constellation setting you among the stars!

name: Plaid Skirt
desc: Perfect plaid for the budding lady lumberjack in you!

name: Peplum Top
desc: A cute color for an even cuter Growtopian!

name: Stripy Jumpsuit
desc: They say stripes are slimming, but nobody ever mentioned how good they look on you!

name: French Maid's Dress
desc: Ooh la la! Grab your feather duster and put on your best French accent, because this dress is made to impress! Oui, mademoiselle!

name: Twintail Hair
desc: When one tail o' hair just won't do, try doubling up with these twins! Your locks never looked so good!

name: Braided Hair
desc: As bright, fresh, and braided as a fine pastry, this hair doesn't just look stylish - it also looks DELICIOUS.

name: Growmoji Face Mask
desc: When you're tired of using all those crazy facial muscles, this mask is here to help! Hide your tired human face with this reliable, totally-not-creepy one instead!

name: Pet Rock
desc: Brought to you by popular demand, meet the most playful, incredibly popular, and astonishingly amazing friend for all Growtopians... A ROCK! All sales final.

name: Mega Growtoken
desc: Now you're talking! This is worth 100 growtokens! Double-tap this in your inventory to break it back down into 100 growtokens. Spend them in the store on special items! Try dialing 12345 or 53785 on your Telephone for details!

name: Bubble Gun
desc: Pop! Pop! Bring a boatload of bubbles to any occasion with this poppin' fresh firearm!

name: Oink-Oink Nose
desc: Got a nose for food? Or is it truffles? Either way, for those who need to show the world their piggy powers, this nose knows best!

name: Sheet Music: Violin Note
desc: Maestro! This sheet will play a violin note for you, as along as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Violin
desc: Maestro! This sheet will play a violin note for you - a half-step higher note than Sheet Music: Violin Note - as along as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Flat Violin
desc: This sheet will play a violin note for you - a half-step lower note than Sheet Music: Violin Note - as along as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Bubblicious Hair
desc: Dying for that fresh-out-of-the-bubble-bath look? Well, die no more! Top your melon with these bodacious bubbles and LIVE! Whoever snagged this hairdo had to be quick so the bubbles wouldn't pop and super-chilly so they'd stay in place, all to bring it to you!

name: Fire Punk Hair
desc: Are you fed up with the status quo? Want to burn the system and start anew? Then start with your hair! This sizzling style will show you're not just a thorn in the system - you're making anarchy look GOOD. Whoever snagged this hairdo had to be quick so the flames wouldn't go out and super-hot so they'd stay bright, all to bring it to you!

name: Nightwings
desc: Wrap yourself in harrowing darkness and take to the skies! These wings are spun from Midnight shadows, harvested from those with a touch of the starry void in their souls - Dare you wear them?

name: Crystal Shard Necklace
desc: Shimmering crystals and gems to adorn only the fanciest of necks! Strangely magnetic, these crystals must amplify the personal pull of those who wear them! Careful, though - these shards are sharp!

name: Growmoji Party
desc: Slide a pizza slice into your chat! Mmm, just like mom used to make! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Pizza
desc: Don't be a party pooper - pop a party vibe into your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojs!
Hardness: 5 Hits 4 Hits  | Restores after 8 s of inactivity.

name: Anomalizing Reliable Trowel
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected blocks, and guaranteed to never break!

name: Anomalizing Pristine Trowel
