desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from MrSongo GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: MrSongo GT's Blue Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from MrSongo GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: MrSongo GT's Yellow Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from MrSongo GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: MrSongo GT's Ruby Block
desc: Considering the size, this is the most valuable ruby in existence. But it's only a video game. This is from MrSongo GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: OldGertie's Awesome Item-O-Matic
desc: An amazing item producing machine for an amazing pillar of the Growtopia community! This is OldGertie's personal machine, and a true one-of-a-kind find! WARNING! DO NOT BREAK! The Awesome Item-O-Matic will not return to your backpack if broken!

name: Mah-Kah-Ron Hat
desc: The subscriber item for March 2019, chosen by EloraFaline! So good-looking, you'd swear it's a deliciously crispy treat instead of a lovely hat - but don't eat it, because then you wouldn't have a hat, and you'd also have eaten a bunch of fabric, which would probably be bad.

name: 30-Day Premium Subscription Token
desc: Consume this for thirty full days of special treatment! You'll get access to unique skins, a chance of doubling any XP earned, 70 season tokens (as long as there's a seasonal clash running), and 4000 gems every day!

name: 1-Year Subscription Token
desc: Consume this for a full YEAR of special treatment! You'll get 70 season tokens (as long as there's a seasonal clash running), and 9600 gems, and 1 World Lock every day and a chance of doubling any XP earned, growtime reduction on all seeds planted and Exclusive Skins!

name: Holy Jeans
desc: Jam-packed with so much holy might, they're, uh... wait, are these just jeans with lots of holes in them? But... how'd they get so dang POWERFUL, then?

name: Buddy's Block Head

func.rem: Aw, no more bonus blocks from Buddy.

desc: The nicest block around - it's not just your friend... it's your buddy! Equip it and watch your hoard grow:.. Gives you a chance of dropping an additional block when breaking blocks!

name: Glowy Cape
desc: Bringing light to even the darkest places and dimmest worlds, this cape will surround its bearer with an astonishingly pure light!

name: Building Blocks Machine
desc: Eager to add some new building materials to your construction stockpile? Tired of collecting items from random worlds and weirdos? Well, pop this beauty into your world and it'll start cranking out awesome blocks in no time! Careful, though - blocks don't just come from nothing, and this machine will eventually run out of power once it makes a bunch! WARNING! DO NOT BREAK! The Building Blocks Machine will NOT return to your backpack once broken!

name: Used Building Blocks Machine
desc: This mighty machine has run out of fuel, and now lies dormant.

name: Creepy Baby Block
desc: Uh, so this is a block now. A... terrifying block. Whoever suggested this, I hope my nightmares were worth it.

name: Digital Dirt
desc: The most classic block of all, only this time it's made Out of hard light and trillions of lines of code! Whoa.

name: Granite Column
desc: Stately and strong, this column can be the cornerstone of an empire!

name: Clouds Wallpaper
desc: Who can be bothered to go OUTSIDE to look at clouds these days? Put up a few walls of these perfect clouds and enjoy them from the comfort of your own home!

name: Skull Wallpaper
desc: Metal. Show your friends and family it's not just a phase with the help of this highly spooky skull pattern!

name: Dinosaur Wallpaper
desc: Rar! Stay in the past with this prehistoric paper! If you close your eyes, you can almost hear their roars!

name: Lava Falls
desc: The only thing more dangerous than a pool of molten rock is a falling column of it! Watch out for splashes!

name: Clouds Background
desc: Behind every fluffy, beautiful cloud is... another fluffy, beautiful cloud! I mean, what else were you expecting? Weasels?

name: Dark Walnut Block
desc: Smells like mustaches, flannel, and fine watches.

name: Dark Walnut Wall
desc: If you need an interior that reminds you of classic, manly styles and rough-edged elegance, set this background up and get ready for the perfect setting to relax in your favorite overstuffed armchair.

name: Dark Walnut Ladders
desc:
A normal ladder will get you to the same place, sure, but it certainly won't do it with such well-crafted - and extra-safe - rungs. Every handhold will feel like shaking hands with a 
grizzled craftsman!

name: Rickety Ladders
desc: Uh, mind your step on these - these splintery, timeworn rungs don't look like they'll hold much weight!

name: Growmoji Smile Block
desc: Tired of Growmojis only showing UP in chat? Well, now you can use this to add a smile to your world!

name: Growmoji Wow Block
desc: Tired of Growmojis only showing up in chat? Well, now you can use this to add some 'wow' to your world!

name: Dark Aqua Wallpaper
desc: The color of deep ocean waters! Kinda creepy, like you're stuck inside an aquatic tank with no lights on...

name: Dark Yellow Wallpaper
desc: The color of fading beauty! Kinda creepy, like you're in the middle of a decaying field of flowers!

name: Dark Purple Wallpaper
desc: The color of a crumbling empire! Kinda creepy, like you're traveling through a transdimensional vortex!

name: Dark Orange Wallpaper
desc: The color of a forgotten dream! Kinda creepy, like you're trapped inside a rotten orange!

name: Dark Brown Wallpaper
desc: The color of old decay! Kinda creepy, like you're stuck down a toilet!

name: Dark Grey Wallpaper
desc: The color of winter skies! Kinda creepy, like you're traveling through a transdimensional vortex!

name: Water Dispenser
desc: Refreshing! Say, what do you call a water dispenser in a desert? ... ... A thirst-aid kit!

name: Waiting Room Chair
desc: Extremely comfy, which is good, because you're going to be waiting for a while!

name: Ceiling Fan
desc: Dusty with age and kind of creaky, but it still spins after all these years! That's one tough fan!

name: Starship Security Camera
desc: Keep track of invading aliens and lazy crewmembers with this state-of-the-art camera! This device will watch your world and keep a record of everybody who enters! You may have up to 8 of these in a world.

name: Starship Mess Hall Table
desc: The perfect place to eat space food! Try the kanzlok - I hear it's delicious.

name: Starship Mess Hall Stool
desc: The perfect place to sit as you enjoy a nice space lunch with your space friends! Location: Probably in space!

name: Sea Urchin
desc: Aquatic pointiness of the deep-sea variety.

name: Copper Block
desc: Highly conductive, and quite precious - don't leave this laying around at a construction site!

name: Sea Lantern
desc: Cutting through the murky depths with a fragile glow! This little light of mine, I'm gonna let it shine...

name: Bubble Block
desc: Someone managed to get these bubbles to stay in place, which is a neat trick. Very delicate, yet also oddly satisfying to pop!

name: Manhole Cover
desc: Keep dangerous tunnels into the underdark sealed shut with this mega-heavy manhole cover! There won't be any pedestrians falling in on its watch!

name: Dark Castle Stone
desc: A bleak stone for dark lord, this carefully-hewn block is designed to keep heroes from climbing up and foiling your villainous plans!

name: Dark Castle Stone Background
desc: Behind the walls of every impregnable stronghold lie... more stones!

name: Dark Castle Door
desc: Abandon hope, all ye who enter here! The Dark Lord is IN!

name: Dark Castle Turret
desc: The perfect place to send down hails of arrows on unsuspecting heroes!

name: Red Stuff
desc: Now stuff comes in red too! What stuff could it be?

name: White Stuff
desc: Now stuff comes in white too! This is some pure stuff!

name: Black Stuff
desc: Now stuff comes in black too! It is nothingness

name: Heavy Chains
desc: Perfect for heavy industry! Or, like, tying up giant wolves. It's your chain.

name: Doggy Block
desc: Having a ruff day? This block will be sure to brighten it!

name: Kitty Block
desc: Feeling traumeowtized? This block will be sure to brighten your day!

name: Dumb Billboard
desc: not used, it's just an icon.

name: Thingamabob
desc: I have no idea what this thing does. It's something electronic? Maybe?

name: Da Vinci Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Da Vinci actually thought he could fly with these. He was totally wrong - they only let you double jump and glide.

name: Genie's Lamp - Green
desc: Who needs wishes when you can GRANT them? This lamp will transform you into a glorious green genie of magic and mirth. Phenomenal cosmic power awaits!

name: Genie's Lamp - Yellow
desc: Who needs wishes when you can GRANT them? This lamp will transform you into a youthful yellow genie of magic and mirth. Phenomenal cosmic power awaits!

name: Genie's Lamp - Red
desc: Who needs wishes when you can GRANT them? This lamp will transform you into a resplendent red genie of magic and mirth. Phenomenal cosmic power awaits!

name: Genie's Lamp - Blue
desc: Who needs wishes when you can GRANT them? This lamp will transform you into a brilliant blue genie of magic and mirth. Phenomenal cosmic power awaits!

name: Spring Flinger Squirrel Mask
desc: Celebrate the season with the new Spring Flinger Style! This mask doesn't just give you the face of a cheeky squirrel - it also helps you stay twitchy on land AND tree alike! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...!

name: Ultra Spring Flinger Squirrel Suit
desc: Celebrate the season with the new ULTRA Spring Flinger Style! This suit doesn't just turn you into an ULTRA cheeky squirrel - it also gives you a new style that stays ULTRA twitchy on land AND tree alike! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both, and in such an ULTRA way! Go on, I'll wait...!

name: Ultra Spring Flinger Squirrel Suit Seed
Mud Puddle
desc: Ugh, what a mess of a mudhole! Try not to get stuck here - it'll be slow going with all this thick, gloppy mud!

name: Steampunk Wings
desc: Clattering gears and finely-tuned cogs whir and whiz as you don these brass and copper beauties! Thanks to the meticulous magic of steam and jewel precision of luxury mechanists, these wings are at home in the soot-streaked skies of any steampunk world!

name: Magic Magnet
desc: Tired of wading through clouds of items and loading up your inventory with random junk when all you want is a single thing? Just tune this magnet to the proper frequencies and it'll nab exactly what you're missing as you move past!

name: Legendary Comet Hair

func.rem: Your hair, what happened to your hair?

desc: The Night of the Comet is alive... in your HAIR! Roiling with color, every follicle of this otherworldly hair was chipped out of the cosmos, flowing and bubbling with all the energy of the great beyond!

name: Reg4shi's Archangel Wings
desc: He has intervened for the sake of Growtopians time and again, for he sees the potential for heroism, creativity and selflessness in each of us. He has even sacrificed his weekends to fight on our behalf. For that alone, we always have and always will believe in him.

name: Coati Scarf
desc: This little South American raccoon is full of mischief and curiosity, but right now, he needs a soft place to snuzzle up! Will you let him hop onto your shoulders and share some adorable warmth?

name: Fiesta Coati Scarf
desc: This little guy knows how to party! Full of spicy style and fearsome curiosity, there's nothing more rambunctious than a coati out on the town - and around your neck!

name: Riding Llama
desc: Careful! They may look fluffy and weird, but these guys spit. And bite. And talk about you behind your back. Llamas, right?

name: Pueblock
desc: Este es un bloque de construccion muy tradicional!

name: Pueblock Window
desc: Este es un bloque de ventana muy tradicional!

name: Pueblock Door
desc: Este es un bloque de puerta muy tradicional!

name: Pueblock Wallpaper
desc: Este es un fondo de pantalla muy tradicional!

name: Colored Corn
desc: Little-known fact about colored corn: It tastes nearly exactly like regular corn.

name: Saguaro Cactus
desc: A hardy cactus, these spiky boys can live over a hundred years and grow as tall as you can build them!

name: Scarfy-Scarf
desc: Whether you're rocketing down city streets on an apocalyptic adventure or simply trying to keep warm while looking good, this scarf won't let you down! Chosen by TraxyGT, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for April, 2019!

name: Wriggling Maggots
desc: Maggots are an important part of our ecosystem, helping to break down dead matter and recycle it for... oh, you want me to LOOK at them? No way! I'm out of here!

name: Bed Bugs
desc: Chittering, biting, and seemingly-indestructible, these creepy-crawlies prove that some nightmares are real!

name: Worm
desc: Part of a gigantic worm! How big can you grow it?

name: Brain Block
desc: Think you're smart? Just a single Brain Block has more thinkin' power than TEN normal Growtopians... and that's before you start adding more to it!

name: Insect Glue Wallpaper
desc: The only problem with laying down a sticky trap to catch bugs is that you wind up with a writhing wall of gross bugs. Ew.

name: Hairy Arm
desc: Ever wanted someone to give you a hand? How about a BIG one?

name: Hairy Leg
desc: Ever wanted a leg up on the competition? How about a BIG one?

name: Pillar of the Dead
desc: Y'know, as interior design choices go, there's something organic and wholesome about skulls - I mean, they were just going to waste away in the ground, weren't they? Now they can brighten up your solarium! Or, like, a Bastion of Eternal Evil. Either works.

name: Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Fleshy Eyed Wall
desc: It's hard to tell if this is a wall of flesh with eyes on it, or a wall of eyes with flesh on it, but either way, it's horrifying!

name: Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Fleshy Eyed Wall Seed
Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Fleshy Eye
desc: When a normal eye Just won't do, take the freak factor to the next, most googly-woogly power possible with these putrid peepers! Just be careful - they aren't your friends!

name: Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Fleshy Teeth
desc: When normal teeth just aren't terrifying enough, take the freak factor to the next, most googly-woogly power possible with these brutal biters! Just be careful - they aren't your friends!

name: Hairy Legs
desc: Who needs pants when you have all-natural heating for your legs?

name: Eyes on Stalks
desc: Alien eyes for your alien face, with alien lasers to destroy the human race!

name: Riding Poop
desc: Yes, it's real, and it moves just as quickly as you do after one too many fast food meals!

name: The Beast with a Thousand Eyes Mask
desc: Keep your eye on the prize - literally every prize - with this horrific headful of staring alien eyeballs!

name: The Beast with a Thousand Eyes Mask Seed
Puggly
desc: This dogbomination eats everything when your back is turned, and then horks it right back up when it has your attention! How cute! Wait, did I say cute? I meant BLEARGHGHGHGH!

name: The Fly
desc: A buzzing beast, engorged by science and merged with your poor head! How will you ever date again?

name: Horrid Snotty Face
desc: Just dripping with happiness, this is truly a face only a mother could love!

name: Extra Undead Arms
desc: Since when was two arms enough for you to get anything done? Let's stack on a few more and get this party started!

name: Riding 'roach
desc: Just a friendly cockroach you decided to befriend instead of squish! It'll take you wherever you like, provided there's some delicious rotting food for it to snack on along the way!

name: Undead Slippers
desc: Technically, all your shoes are dead. These just happen to be particularly obvious about it.

name: Giant Eye Head
desc: Give your friends an eyeful with this baleful, beady-eyed orb! As an added bonus, you can probably win every last staring contest now!

name: Bob The Gross Blob
desc: Not to be confused with Bob the Handsome Blob!

name: Fatberg Block
desc: Congealed oil, grease, hair, and other squishy unmentionables, pulled out of the nearest sewer and plonked right into your hands! Don't say we never gave you anything!

name: Flaming Pepper Gross Bean
desc: A freakishly spicy snack!

name: Rotten Egg Gross Bean

func.add: AAARGH! Why does it taste of green?

desc: A sulfurous eggy snack!

name: Dirt Gross Bean
desc: A gruesomely grainy snack!

name: Booger Gross Bean
desc: A disgustingly salty snack!

name: Barf Gross Bean
desc: A nauseatingly sweet snack!

name: Disgusting Mess Block
desc: If creating horrible piles of wretched misery was an art form, this would be a five-star effort! Unfortunately, its not, which just makes this an abomination.

name: Strawberry Slime Block
desc: Yuck, this compressed pink stuff is slippery and gross! Smells faintly of strawberries, though. Well... rotten strawberries.

name: Rotting Sea Goo
desc: Ugh! A Gross Mixer with the taste of salted stink and deepsea death.

name: Space Poop
desc: Ugh! A Gross Mixer with the taste of antigravity vomit and interstellar waste cyclers.

name: Burnt Slime
desc: Ugh! A Gross Mixer with the taste of uncleaned fryers and festering grease traps.

name: Putrid Gas
desc: Ugh! A Gross Mixer with the taste of medical mishaps and hospital dumpsters.

name: Festering Urchin & Poop Pie
desc: Gah! A stale crust is the least of your worries. Take a bite of this and you'll simultaneously wish you were drowning in an undersea cave AND suffocating in hard vacuum.

name: Putrid Gas Filled Blood Maggot Crepes
desc: Gah! Rubbery eggs are the least of your worries. Farty fumes welcome you to a bite that's equal parts old blood and bloated maggots.

name: Putrid Gas Filled Blood Maggot Crepes Seed
Alien Bloodied Brains Strudel
desc: Gah! Old dough is the least of your worries. Writhing alien brains scream as you bite into them, sending out jets of gray blood.

name: Rotting Fish Guts Club Sandwich
desc: Gah! Expired mayonnaise is the least of your worries. Fetid fish guts flop out between your fingers as you hold this horrific sandwich.

name: Rotting Fish Guts Club Sandwich Seed
Festering Fish Guts Taco
desc: Why. It's like you took all that's awful about fish guts - everything - and then jammed them into a taco to add a little crunch to the squish.

name: Alien Brains Strudel
desc: Why. This strudel is writhing with half-baked alien brains! They're trying to escape!

name: Maggot-Slathered Fish & Sticks
desc: Why. Because undercooked fish and moldy breading isn't awful enough, you've managed to top it with a slithering slurry of fresh maggots.

name: Blood Filled Crepes
desc: Why. These things are practically heaving with decomposing gas, ready to pop in a fountain of dirty blood the second you bite down!

name: Growmoji Ill
desc: Want to add some ill emotions to your chat? Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Webbed Hand
desc: A webbed hand for Fish-Squished!

name: Blob of Goop
desc: A blob of goop for Spaced-Faced!

name: Inflamed Nose
desc: Don't get too excited by the name - this nose doesn't shoot fire, unfortunately. It's just the sign of a sick Growtopian!

name: Dirt Grass Hair
desc: Wow, your hair looks like the grass on top of dirt!

name: Easter Crate
desc: Smash it for Easter treats!

name: Galactic Destructor - Green

func.add: Galactic Code THX1137... Destruction protocol: initiate!

desc: Stolen from an Imperial shipment and bearing Galactic Danger Code THX1136, this super-weapon has but one purpose: Total destruction! A galactic menace in giga-green, this monster of a weapon will take all of your strength to lift, and all of your courage to fire.

name: Galactic Destructor - Purple

func.add: Galactic Code THX1137... Destruction protocol: initiate!

desc: Stolen from an Imperial shipment and bearing Galactic Danger Code THX1136, this super-weapon has but one purpose: Total destruction! A galactic menace in pew-pew-purple, this monster of a weapon will take all of your strength to lift, and all of your courage to fire.

name: Galactic Destructor - Red

func.add: Galactic Code THX1137... Destruction protocol: initiate!

desc: Stolen from an Imperial shipment and bearing Galactic Danger Code THX1136, this super-weapon has but one purpose: Total destruction! A galactic menace in red-alert-red, this monster of a weapon will take all of your strength to lift, and all of your courage to fire.

name: Galactic Destructor - Blue

func.add: Galactic Code THX1137... Destruction protocol: initiate!

desc: Stolen from an Imperial shipment and bearing Galactic Danger Code THX1136, this super-weapon has but one purpose: Total destruction! A galactic menace in blaster-blue, this monster of a weapon will take all of your strength to lift, and all of your courage to fire.

name: Doctor's Blingin' Cross
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest -and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! It's said that those who wear the Cross of Bling will experience dramatically shorter lives, but they'll be full of adventure, right up to the end!

name: Doctor's Blingin' Cap
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest - and most stylish - doctor in al the worlds! The Cap of Bling is a treasured hallmark of doctorhood, as it protects patients from seeing your mussy bedhead and dandruff! They'll never know!

name: Doctor's Blingin' Mask
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest -and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! Because doctors encounter all manner of diseases, it's imperative that they keep from infecting their patients. The Mask of Bling is said to reduce the chances of contagion by 110%! Nobody is sure how that's mathematically possible, but they won't question it, either!

name: Doctor's Blingin' Top
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest -and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! The Top of Bling is specially-woven to protect its bearer from the slices and dices of errant scalpels and thrashing patients! You can never be too careful when battling the slow creep of entropy!

name: Doctor's Blingin' Pants
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest -and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! Fun fact: At least 83% of all infections start from dirty knees! Wearing pants as well-made and sterile as these drops that rate down to NOTHING, which just goes to show that you can be professional and look amazing at the same time.

name: Hands of the Void
desc: Deadly claws of chaos and rage, spun from the essence of haunted realms beyond the stars. Sometimes the void touches you, but with these, yours will be the touch of that darkness.

name: Feet of the Void
desc: Dire darkness wraps your feet, turning every step into footfall of doom. Flowers wither in your wake, small animals run screeching, and your shoes definitely will not fit anymore.

name: Gut Buster
desc: Looks terrifying, but this mess of guts is actually just the results of a stolen medical Train-E, some creative arts and crafts, and a whole lot of duct tape to stick it to your torso!

name: Stitchlips
desc: Tired of all that talking? Take matters into your own hands and slap some stitches on those loquacious lips! You'll be silenced in seconds!

name: Clockwork Fish
desc: A clanking, clattering fish of grumpy gears! Doesn't like much of anything, so this should be a real training challenge, but on the other hand, imagine the prestige of having trained a mecha-fish of your very own!

name: Clockwork Fish Leash
desc: This well-oiled fish has decided its grumpy days are behind it - it's decided to follow you around in all its clankering, over-geared beauty!

name: Clockwork Eyes
desc: Gear yourself up for success and stare down your rivals with these superb spinners! The only downside? They need a lot of oil to keep spinning!

name: Mean Wolf Block
desc: This wolf is none too happy about being stuck as a block, and he's going to take out all his anger on anyone who gets close!

name: Howly Hat
desc: Awooo! Tired of turning your head to the skies to howl at the moon on your own? Now this hat will do all your howling for you! Think of all the time you'll save!

name: Ecto-Lock
desc: A superbly spooky lock that not only locks an entire world, but also attracts other ghosts to join the party!

name: Steppin' Ghost
desc: Ghosts don't make for very reliable platforms, but thankfully it looks like this spirit is going to stick around!

name: Cupcake Hat
desc: Show everyone your love of baked delights by topping yourself with a giant treat of your very own! Looks good enough to eat!

name: Big Belly
desc: Looks like all that fine food has gotten the best of you! You should try to cut down on the caloric blocks and start punching more of them for exercise, but until then, this big 'ol belly is a sign of your sins.

name: Punchy Fist
desc: Produced with concentrated punching power, this block will give everyone who touches it a swift hit into the skies!

name: Gem Hair
desc: Hair spun from twinkling crystals and concentrated gems! It's worth? Incalculable. Its beauty? Inconceivable. Your look? Incredible.

name: Chicken Feet
desc: Ba-kaw! You've been afflicted by the infectious chickenfoot virus! Fortunately, the only real symptoms are having sweet chicken feet and an occasional taste for bugs.

name: Terrifying Toothface
desc: Yikes! This toothy maw has one too many chompers! Can you imagine the dentist bills? And all the toothpaste? Sheesh, this thing is scary in more ways than one!

name: Loving Halo
desc: A sign of a truly gracious and adoring soul. This halo marks you with love and adoration, healing you quickly with the power of the heart! Aww!

name: Chaos Corruption

func.rem: The darkness has left you! ...for now...

desc: Racing lines of chaos have consumed your blood, filling you with fiendish energy. While the corruption feeds on your spirit, you'll be faster, but at what cost?

name: Block o' Barf
desc: Clean up in Aisle 3! Can someone get a mop?

name: Wormtouch

func.rem: Your wormy arms have wiggled away!

desc: Wiggly Worms are the best diggers! So it makes sense replacing your arms with GIANT WORMS would give you impressive digging skills. 100% perfect, unquestionable, sense.

name: Snakewolf

func.rem: No longer slithering with the pack.

desc: Slithering with serpent speed, howling at the moon, and looking like a million world locks, this mythical snakewolf is your newest friend! Notes for care: Snakewolf likes rare steaks, lots of scratches, and destroying your enemies.

name: Ghostking's Glory

func.rem: The dead do not suffer the living to pass!

desc: All ghosts flock to the holder of the Ghostking's crown. Stolen from his empty throne on the Other Side, this spectral crown proclaims you the true ruler of all ghostkind! Unfortunately, that means you're about to make a lot of booful buddies! At least... until the Ghostking finds you...

name: The Fattenator
desc: Dang, you are HUGE. With thickness like this, nobody's going to have much luck pushing YOU around.

name: Med-A-Check
desc: Think you might have malady on your hands? Use the advanced tech of the Med-A-Check to scan your patient! Only has enough for one complete scan, but will tell you exactly what malady your patient has! Note: Will not be consumed if  its target has no malady.

name: Dummy Item for Surgical Maladies
desc: You shouldn't be able to read this, you sneaky person, you.

name: Dummy Item for Surgical Maladies Seed
Legendary Clash Key - Series 2
desc: A key to a mysterious treasure! This key is for Clash Series 2, running from Summer Clash 2019 through Spring Clash 2020. After three seasons, those who collect at least 10 of these keys will be able to open a special treasure chest. Make sure you have enough just one won't do it!

name: Darkening Hood
desc: Shrouding its bearer in stylish shadows, this hood is the perfect way to stay awesomely anonymous! Chosen by Placental, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for May, 2019!

name: Pineapple Checkpoint Totem
desc: Let the pineapples be your sweet salvation! Remember, if you die, you'll respawn at the last checkpoint you touched!

name: Grumpy Pet Pineapple
desc: This tiny terror hates feeling like the runt of the pineapple litter. He'll follow you around, but don't make jokes about his size! He's very upset about... well... everything!

name: Slippery Pineapple Squishers
desc: As everyone knows, pineapples are the fastest of the fruits. Now, thanks to advanced GrowTech Squishscience, we've managed to imbue the speedy juice of the pineapple into these hyper-advanced shoes. What? You say they're just hollowed-out pineapples? Don't be silly - if that were true, how could they make you move so quickly?

name: Pineapple Skin Shirt
desc: A tough skin for a tough Growtopian, both hiding a sweet, wonderful interior!

name: Howling Pineapple Crown
desc: YEAAAAAAAAAAAAH! This pineapple is down to terrorize the town! Perched on your head, it will scream its fruity head off at anyone who comes near! Why, you ask? What, do pineapples suddenly need REASONS to start yelling at people?

name: Dangerous Pineapple Juice Backpack
desc: This backpack is filled with swirling, deadly dangerous juice from only the most malicious of pineapples! With such feisty energy, you could certainly power something huge... like a Harvester!

name: Dangerous Pineapple

func.rem: The tragedy has come to an end!

desc: An all-new, all-deadly pineapple! Careful how you eat these - many have tried to tame the Dangerous Pineapple, and nearly all have met with a truly tragic fate...

name: Super Pineapple Party Crate
desc: The scent of pineapple is nearly overpowering! Smash this tasty crate for Super Pineapple Party goodies!

name: Pinedelier
desc: Crystal pineapples filled with enchanted pinelights for the classiest possible pineapple experience!

name: Looming Pineapple
desc: A demon-possessed pineapple, out for blood! Or maybe just hugs! Either way, its touch is deadly, so you'd better MOVE!

name: Prickly Pineapple
desc: This pineapple cannot make it clearer: It does NOT like you, or your friends, or anyone really, and it will SPIKE the next person who doesn't get that concept.

name: Vaccine Drop
desc: A piece of a true medical marvel, and perhaps your only hope of curing the deadliest of diseases! Collect enough of these precious drops and combine them into a final, super-effective form.

name: UV Vaccine
desc: This wonder of modern medicine is the Universal Vicious Vaccine, and your only hope against the most dangerous of maladies! Hold onto this as you operate, and be careful, because it'll get used whether you're successful or not!

name: Vile Vial - Chaos Infection
desc: Filled with the swirling essence of the Chaosbearer itself, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with a chaos infection! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Moldy Guts

func.add: You've been infected with moldy guts!
func.rem: You no longer have moldy guts!

desc: Filled with the grumbling grossness of internal ick, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Moldy Guts! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Brainworms
desc: Filled with wriggly parasitic woe, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Brainworms! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Lupus
desc: Filled with the howling madness at the heart of every Wolf World, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Lupus! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Ecto-Bones

func.rem: Your bones are no longer ectoplasmic!

desc: Filled with the chilling despair of the Other Side, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Ecto-Bones! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Fatty Liver

func.add: You've been infected with fatty liver!
func.rem: You no longer have fatty liver!

desc: Filled with the ultra-caloric output of only the most perfect cooking, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Fatty Liver! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Doctor's Blingin' Booties
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest - and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! Set with nonslip treads of solid gold, these blingtastic booties will help you keep your footing in even the most slippery of surgical scenarios!

name: Angel of Mercy's Wings
desc: You bear the wings of a true savior, a surgeon without peer who has saved countless lives in their pursuit of the greater good. All who can hear the beat of these magnificently medicinal wings will know that their salvation has arrived.

name: Caduceaxe
desc: Capable of extracting pure medical might from blocks, this caduceaxe is your ticket to vaccination victory! There's a chance it may break on vaccine extraction, but hey - it also has a chance of getting you more than a few fragments!

name: SurgWorld Blast
desc: Your gateway to a world of medical wonders! A SurgWorld is a top place of care and healing, with all kinds of interesting blocks, top chance of getting maladies while you work!

name: Train-E
desc: A prototype variant of the Surg-E, the surgical scenarios(and prizes) you can encounter on Train-E are limited, but it's the perfect way to learn Surgery!

name: Surgical Block
desc: Infused with medical goodness! Mmm! that's some healthy blocks!

name: Surgical Background
desc: A medical wonderland awaits!

name: Surgical Waste
desc: DANGER! No matter how healthy  and medicinal this waste looks, it's STILL LAVA, which means DO NOT TOUCH!

name: Aggregate Concrete
desc: Healthy rocks for a healthful world! I mean, don't EAT them or anything - they're just nice to have around.

name: Rotten Pineapple Block
desc: The problem with pineapple is it gets mushy when left in the sun for too long.

name: Sourloaf Pineapple Block
desc: All the goodness of a sugarloaf pineapple with a hint of sour tang, so many flavors exploding in your mouth.

name: Dangerous Pineapple Block
desc: Pineapples are usually quite spikey, but this one has extra spikes added just in case.

name: Dangerous Pineapple Fan Shirt
desc: Who doesn't pineapple GT even when it's dangerous to do so?

name: Nightking's Cape - Dark Red
desc: To defend the streets of a dark city, you'll need more than wits and skill - criminals need a symbol to fear, a sign of justice and vengeance alike, and without a righteously red cape like this, even the most amazing hero can't look the part. That, and its spring-loaded fabrics provide double-jump, because there's no harm in being practical while building your image!

name: Nightking's Cape - Dark Purple
desc: To defend the streets of a dark city, you'll need more than wits and skill - criminals need a symbol to fear, a sign of justice and vengeance alike, and without a powerfully purple cape like this, even the most amazing hero can't look the part. That, and its spring-loaded fabrics provide double-jump, because there's no harm in being practical while building your image!

name: Nightking's Cape - Black
desc: To defend the streets of a dark city, you'll need more than wits and skill - criminals need a symbol to fear, a sign of justice and vengeance alike, and without a brooding black cape like this, even the most amazing hero can't look the part. That, and its spring-loaded fabrics provide double-jump, because there's no harm in being practical while building your image!

name: Nightking's Cape - Midnight Blue
desc: To defend the streets of a dark city, you'll need more than wits and skill - criminals need a symbol to fear, a sign of justice and vengeance alike, and without a beautifully blue cape like this, even the most amazing hero can't look the part. That, and its spring-loaded fabrics provide double-jump, because there's no harm in being practical while building your image!

name: Executioner's Axe
desc: Finely honed for the perfect chop! Its blade might not go snicker-snack, but all the same, heads will roll! Chosen by rsrssh, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for June, 2019!

name: EzCookOven's Robotic Tentacles
desc: Robotic allies to launch you to and fro! These high-tech tentacles were first developed to handle hazardous GrowTech waste, but their engineers discovered it was WAY more fun to use them to jump around instead (they can also play a mean game of chess, but most owners are too busy jumping to try!) Sponsored by EzCookOven for completing all epic quests!

name: Phoenix Hair
desc: Infused with the powers of the Emperor Phoenix, this staggeringly rare hair will astonish all who view it as takes you to the skies! There are many beautiful hair in the worlds of Growtopia, but none are quite so impressively enflamed!

name: Pet Toucan
desc: Caw! This adorable avian ally likes tropical fruits, crunchy nuts, and keeping its beautiful beak sharp!

name: Polo Shirt - Blue
desc: It's summer time, so toss on a shirt that helps you beat the heat while lookingneat and fit! Now in burning sky blue!

name: Polo Shirt - Pink
desc: It's summer time, so toss on a shirt that helps you beat the heat while looking neat and fit! Now in poppin' iced drink pink!

name: Aloha Floral Shirt
desc: A Hawaiian style shirt straight out of the tropics to keep you cool and fantastically floral!

name: Aloha Floral Blouse
desc: A Hawaiian style blouse designed with a tropical touch to keep you cool and fantastically floral!

name: Chinos - Pastel Orange
desc: Summery pants that let you hit the streets with a breezy step and a touch of Low-key class! Now in outrageous vacation orange!

name: Chinos - Pastel Blue
desc: Summery pants that let you hit the streets with a breezy step and a toh oflow-key class! Now in beautiful sunshine blue!

name: Crab Claw & Shield
desc: Somewhere, there's a very sad, very unarmed crab out there. Don't feel bad, though - these were better off in your hands.

name: Dungeonist Crab Leash
desc: Once a many-limbed delver of dungeons, now a happy follower for you! Just... don't tell him how tasty he looks, okay? It makes him crabby.

name: Riding Flamingo
desc: This pink pal got tired of standing around and decided to leg it over to you! Fancy a flamingotastic ride?

name: Straw Fedora
desc: When you know you can rock a fedora like nobody's business but really want to hit the beach, it's time to embrace the ways of the straw hats!

name: Floppy Straw Sun Hat
desc: Too much sun eating away at your beachtime fun? Flop on a hat like this and you'll not only be cool and shady, but look good doing it!

name: Pet Turtle
desc: Are you turtley enough to join the Turtle Club? Maybe not, but with this guy at your side, they'll probably let you in anyway. It's all about who you know!

name: Shark Suit
desc: Ace any job interview in seconds with this swimmingly sharp ensemble! If I were hiring, I know I'd appreciate any candidates to come dressed in their sharky best!

name: Shark Head
desc: This piece of clothing really bites! But, like, in a good way. It's complicated. But also a shark, which is the more important part, really.

name: Munnin's Unity Wings
desc: A raven's resplendent wings for a resplendently regal individual! The skies are yours, wise one.

name: Bountiful Flowering Lattice
desc: Delicate flowers climb this lovely lattice, making it the perfect addition to any garden!

name: Bountiful Flowering Lattice Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Climbing Hydrangea Lattice
desc: These big poofs of flowers will brighten any room!

name: Bountiful Climbing Hydrangea Lattice Roots Seed
Bountiful Climbing Hydrangea Lattice Mature Roots
Bountiful Climbing Hydrangea Lattice Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Flowering Garland
desc: Chains of flowers to celebrate the day! You don't even need to have a special event in mind to enjoy these beauties.

name: Bountiful Flowering Garland Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Lattice Fence
desc: Put up a fine fence and hope some enterprising plants will grow on it for that perfect "lived-in" garden look!

name: Bountiful Lattice Fence Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple
desc: Coated in vines and creepers, these blocks come from long-lost civilization! Where could they have gone? How could such talented engineers and artists disappear without a trace...?

name: Bountiful Jungle Temple Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Background
desc: Behind every good temple is... a good temple background! Even overgrown by the unstoppable creep of nature, these walls carry a touch of ancient mystery...

name: Bountiful Jungle Temple Background Roots Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Background Mature Roots
Bountiful Jungle Temple Background Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Door
desc: Hollow bamboo stakes, carefully bound together, make for the perfect tropical backdrop!

name: Bountiful Jungle Temple Door Roots Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Door Mature Roots
Bountiful Jungle Temple Door Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Pillar
desc: A mighty pillar, seemingly none the worse for wear after centuries in the foreboding jungles of Growtopia!

name: Bountiful Jungle Temple Pillar Roots Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Pillar Mature Roots
Bountiful Jungle Temple Pillar Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Bamboo Background
desc: Hollow bamboo stakes, carefully bound together, make for the perfect tropical backdrop!

name: Bountiful Bamboo Background Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Bamboo Platform
desc: These platforms can take the weight of even the heftiest Growtopians! For a type of grass, bamboo is surprisingly strong, isn't it?

name: Bountiful Bamboo Platform Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Bamboo Ladder
desc: It might be a little makeshift, but this ladder will help you reach new heights, all the same!

name: Bountiful Bamboo Ladder Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Bamboo Spikes
desc: Ouch! These stakes prove that just because it's a plant, it doesn't mean it can't be sharpened and set up to stab ya!

name: Bountiful Bamboo Spikes Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful White Doll's Eyes
desc: Also known as white baneberry, this is a real plant! ...really creepy, too! I don't like how it always seems to be watching me...

name: Bountiful White Doll's Eyes Roots Seed
Bountiful White Doll's Eyes Mature Roots
Bountiful White Doll's Eyes Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Monkshood
desc: Also known as wolfsbane (which sounds waaaay cooler, come to think), these bright purple flowers look great, but they're quite poisonous, so don't start snacking!

name: Bountiful Corpse Flower
desc: It's actually a very pretty flower, despite the name - it just smells bad. Like, REALLY bad.

name: Bountiful Corpse Flower Mature Roots Seed
Bountiful Growtopian-Eating Looming Plant
desc: Tread lightly around these sleepy chompers! They're not as instantly deadly as the infamous Venus Guytrap, but they'll be just as happy to take a bite out of you if you stick around!

name: Bountiful Growtopian-Eating Looming Plant Roots Seed
Bountiful Growtopian-Eating Looming Plant Mature Roots
Bountiful Growtopian-Eating Looming Plant Mature Roots Seed
Porcelain Doll's Head
desc: So pristine and perfect, it's practically an antique! For proper use, make sure to stockpile several hundred of these identical rows and then leave them in your attic for guests to find years later. They'll love it.

name: Bamboo Pipe
desc: Maybe not so fancy as those hoity-toity hardwoods, but bamboobgs a kind of class all its own, wouldn't you say?

name: Flower Headband
desc: Flowers brighten up more than just rooms - they also look great in your hair, YOUR hair, specifically, I mean. They look like garbage in everyone else's.

name: Lattice Dress
desc: Think of how long the tireless seamstresses of GrowTech's fabric division had to spend sewing this dress! No wonder it looks so chic!

name: Serpent Headdress
desc: Feeling envious of Medusa? Top yourself with this headdress and get at least a little closer to her hissy hair!

name: Monk's Hood
desc: Pie Jesu Domine, dona eis requiem.

name: Bamboo Armor
desc: You might think it's funny, seeing a warrior come at you in clattering bamboo plate, but you won't be laughing when you get whacked by a bamboo sword!

name: Bamboo Sword
desc: Hollow, yet honed! Listen to the air howl as this blade whirls toward your foes!

name: Temple Robes
desc: Look, if you're going keep attending temple in a frog outfit, nobody's going to want to sit next to you. At least wear these so you can look the part!

name: Obsidian Axe
desc: Sure, obsidian is just volcanic glass, but cleave it just right, and you can get an edge that's sharper than any scalpel! Ouch!

name: Bountiful Blast
desc: Enter a world of fertile soil, cheerful sunshine and lush green hills, and bountiful new trees! This blast is your ticket to a different kind of farming!

name: Bountiful Flowering Lattice Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Climbing Hydrangea Lattice Root Cutting
Bountiful Climbing Hydrangea Lattice Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Flowering Garland Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Lattice Fence Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Background Root Cutting
Bountiful Jungle Temple Background Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Door Root Cutting
Bountiful Jungle Temple Door Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Jungle Temple Pillar Root Cutting
Bountiful Jungle Temple Pillar Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Bamboo Background Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Bamboo Platform Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Bamboo Ladder Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Bamboo Spikes Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful White Doll's Eyes Root Cutting
Bountiful White Doll's Eyes Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Corpse Flower Root Cutting Seed
Bountiful Growtopian-Eating Looming Plant Root Cutting
Bountiful Growtopian-Eating Looming Plant Root Cutting Seed
Fertile Soil Block
desc: Packed with nutrients and warmed by a kind sun, this soil is the perfect place for roots to grow!

name: Summer Clash Finale Ticket
desc: Beware! Using this ticket will send you off to a world of great dangers and riches! When you are there, you will have only 25 MINUTES before the power of this ticket diminishes and you are returned to the real world. Can you conquer the chaos of Summer Clash in time?

name: Mutated Virus
desc: Growtopia's seen many viruses, but never one so monstrously mutable! Watch out!

name: Mutated Bones
desc: What, you thought mutants had normal bones?

name: Neon Green Mutation Layer
desc: When something glows green, bubbles, and smells like burnt bowling balls, that usually means it's safe, right?

name: Horizontacles
desc: Writhing, horrible mutant tentacles that love lying flat! Like, all the time (they're very lazy).

name: Vertentacles
desc: Writhing, horrible mutant tentacles that love to reach for the sky! Maybe they're afraid of falling...?

name: Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Verdant Eyed Wall
desc: It's hard to tell if this is a wall of foliage with eyes on it, or a wall of eyes with foliage on it, but either way, it's horrifying!

name: Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Verdant Eyed Wall Seed
Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Verdant Eye
desc: When a normal eye just won't do, take the freak factor to the next, most googly-woogly power possible with these prickly peepers! Just be careful - they aren't your friends!

name: Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Verdant Teeth
desc: When normal teeth just wont do, take the freak factor to the next, most googly-woogly power possible with these brutal biters! Just be careful - they aren't your friends!

name: Cute Bulb Mask
desc: Aww! We're not sure what the heck this thing actually is, but it LOOKS adorable. I mean, at least until it starts firing lasers at you. Not sure how that works, either...

name: Riding Firefly

func.add: Look at the Glow... way you go Growtopians!

desc: Zips around with a glorious glow! Note: Rides on this buddy bug should be free, so if he asks you to pay, it's probably a farefly!

name: Slithering Serpent Hair

func.rem: There, there, my pretties - calm yourselves...

desc: Everyone thinks it's GREAT to have hair made of snakes, but nobody ever thinks about how many mice you have to feed them...

name: Astro Shades - Red
desc: Firing blasts of radical red light, these celestial-enhanced shades will light up your life, and like, anything else you look at with them! So try not to stare too long at valuable objects (or like, people)!

name: Astro Shades - Orange
desc: Firing blasts of mean orange beams, these celestial-enhanced shades will light up your life, and like, anything else you look at with them! So try not to stare too long at valuable objects (or like, people)!

name: Astro Shades - Purple
desc: Firing blasts of potent purple light, these celestial-enhanced shades will light up your life, and like, anything else you look at with them! So try not to stare too long at valuable objects (or like, people)!

name: Astro Shades - Green
desc: Firing blasts of mean green beams, these celestial-enhanced shades will light up your life, and like, anything else you look at with them! So try not to stare too long at valuable objects (or like, people)!

name: Black Shoes
desc: From the most formal of occasions to the swankiest of clubs (on the darkest of nights, of course), everyone needs a pair of black shoes! These are extra-special, however, because they're YOURS.

name: Growmoji Tongue Block
desc:
Tired of Growmojis only showing up in chat? Well, now you can use this to add
a little 'cheekiness' to your world!

name: TK69's Mystical Etherboard

func.add: Growboard? Keep it, I've got an Etherboard now!

desc: Crush the skies between dimensions and surf the riptides of eternity with this mystical - and highly mobile - etherboard! Unfortunately, it looks like its GrowTech Time Circuits have shortcircuited (their warranty is only good for 5,000 years or parsecs, whichever comes first), so while this'll give you a boost of speed, it won't take you through time anymore... Sponsored by TK69 for completing all epic quests!

name: Weather Machine - Stargazing
desc: Lose yourself in the vastness of the cosmos with this stellar star machine!

name: Rainbow Scarf
desc: A wonderful mix of colors for a wonderful neck!

name: Black Cat Ears
desc: They're so fuzzy! Top-tier scratchability and style, all in one double-pointed package.

name: Toucan's Bill
desc: Ever see a bird with a colorful nut-crackin' beak and get jealous you don't have one? Well now, toucan play at that game!

name: Chic White Dress
desc: Not just any white dress! If you couldn't already tell by how pretty this looks, we've carefully added the word 'chic' in the title to let everyone know the style here is off the charts!

name: Lace A-Line Dress
desc: Absolutely stunning! Oh, and MUCH nicer than those B- and C-Line dresses! Don't even get me started on the D-Lines... sheesh!

name: White Tuxedo
desc: When you want to stand out in a crowd of penguins (or investment bankers) without ruining the super-classy mood, try on this blight and beautiful tux!

name: Blue and Black Tuxedo
desc: Class up with the best kind of black-and-blue to get!

name: Samurai's Do Armor
desc: Carefully-crafted overlapping pieces of protection for an honor-bound warrior. Do or Do not - there is no try.

name: Samurai's Kabuto
desc: A stylized helm for an honor-bound warrior.

name: Samurai's Waraji

func.rem: Time for a soothing foot spa?

desc: Flexible footwear for an honor-bound warrior.

name: Samurai's Suneate & Leggings
desc: Protective leggings for an honor-bound warrior.

name: Valkyrie's Cuirass
desc: A plate of unbreakable steel fit for the unbreakable will of the valkyrie!

name: Valkyrie's Wings
desc: Flawless warrior wings for an unstoppable Chooser of the Slain!

name: Valkyrie's Helm
desc: A helm of unbreakable steel fit for the unbreakable will (and beautiful face) of the valkyrie!

name: Valkyrie's Sandals
desc: Nimble footwear for an agile Chooser of the Slain!

name: Map of Loki
desc: This map's letters are hard to see in the light of day, and even those you CAN make out seem to change from moment to moment...

name: Boy's School Uniform Shirt
desc: A nicely-starched shirt! Clean, sharp, and ready for an education (or general misbehavior, depending on the day)!

name: Boy's School Uniform Pants
desc: Carefully-creased pants! Clean, sharp, and ready for an education (or general misbehavior, depending on the day)!

name: Girls's School Uniform Shirt
desc: A nicely-starched shirt! Clean, sharp, and ready for an education (or general misbehavior, depending on the day)!

name: Girls's School Uniform Skirt
desc: A freshly-laundered skirt! Clean, sharp, and ready for an education (or general misbehavior, depending on the day)!

name: Safe Vault
desc: The safest place in all of Growtopia! Comes with a patented GrowTech InifiniLock and laser-guided satellite strikes to ensure ONLY YOU can retrieve its valuables!

name: Messy Braid
desc: You didn't have time to put this braid together, but who cares? You've got blocks to break and economies to alter!

name: Messy Bun
desc: You didn't have time to put this bun together, but who cares? You've got seeds to splice and economies to alter!

name: Long Full Bangs
desc: Way better than those Short Empty Bangs offered by other, lesser hairstylists.

name: Hipster Beard
desc: Embrace the hipster life! With this fancy facial hair, you won't be able to stop asking for artisanal coffee and single-origin beans!

name: Man Bun
desc: A bun of hair, but with an extra swirl of testosterone to make it extra-manly!

name: Bed Head
desc: WAKE UP! GET HARVESTING! START TRADING! What? NO, you don't have time to do your hair! Just GO GO GO! Growtopia waits for no-one, and certainly no hair!

name: Raccoon Leash
desc: Super-sneaky trash panda pet! Chitters and squeaks and loves treats (also, making a mess)!

name: Panda Leash
desc: A much more official panda than the raccoon, this stoic plant-muncher has just two requests: More bamboo, and MORE BAMBOO!

name: Weather Machine - Meteor Shower
desc: A skyful of streaking lights can be yours with this all-new (and all-stellar) weather machine! Quick! Make a wish!

name: Riding World Lock - Green Light
desc: Yahoo! Forget cars and dragons and sneakers and starships - when you want to see the worlds of Growtopia, only the world lock can take you anywhere! Hit the gas on this speedy security device and leave your friends in its glowing green wake!

name: Riding World Lock - Green Light Seed
Riding World Lock - Purple Light
desc: Yahoo! Forget cars and dragons and sneakers and starships - when you want to see the worlds of Growtopia, only the world lock can take you anywhere! Hit the gas on this speedy security device and leave your friends in its pulsing purple wake!

name: Riding World Lock - Purple Light Seed
Riding World Lock - White Light
desc: Yahoo! Forget cars and dragons and sneakers and starships - when you want to see the worlds of Growtopia, only the world lock can take you anywhere! Hit the gas on this speedy security device and leave your friends in its glowing white wake!

name: Riding World Lock - White Light Seed
Riding World Lock - Yellow Light
desc: Yahoo! Forget cars and dragons and sneakers and starships - when you want to see the worlds of Growtopia, only the world lock can take you anywhere! Hit the gas on this speedy security device and leave your friends in its glowing yellow wake!

name: Riding World Lock - Yellow Light Seed
Masquerade Ball Mask
desc: With this decorative mask, even the most average growtopian can be the Belle of the Ball! Chosen by Ch4knuGT, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for August, 2019!

name: Tea Basket

func.add: Straight to your backpack with the harvest.
func.rem: Back to picking up scraps from the ground.

desc: Toss this on and any items you collect from a fully-grown tree will fall directly into your inventory! A little flimsy, so it's likely to break after you've collected a lot of stuff, but no less useful for it!

name: Leaf Blower
desc: Tired of dealing with people? Wish they'd all just leaf you alone? Well, fire up this blower's GrowTech turbine and a storm of wind and fallen foliage will blast them into next year!

name: Scarecrow Pet
desc: This little guy's tired of frightening birds (that time a flock of ravens stole his hat was the last straw), so he's decided to join up with you and see if your adventures are his kind of field!

name: Mosquito King's Wings
desc: On one hand, these wings will make you royalty and you'll constantly be surrounded by your adoring subjects. On the other, those subjects will be mosquitoes, and mosquitoes are the worst.

name: Ladakh Mask
desc: Part of a cultural celebration of life, this mask isn't just a good-looking potential piece of your outfit! They're also used in a major dance festival in the Indian region of - you guessed it - Ladakh!

name: Ladakh Shirt
desc: Part of a cultural celebration of life, this shirt isn't just a good-looking potential piece of your outfit! It's also used in a major dance festival in the Indian region of - you guessed it - Ladakh!

name: Ladakh Pants
desc: Part of a cultural celebration of life, these pants aren't just a good-looking potential piece of your outfit! They're also used in a major dance festival in the Indian region of - you guessed it - Ladakh!

name: Ladakh Shoes
desc: Part of a cultural celebration of life, these shoes aren't just a good-looking potential piece of your outfit! They're also used in a major dance festival in the Indian region of - you guessed it - Ladakh!

name: Harvest Moon Charm
desc: Mystic moonlight seeps from this charm, tipping your fields toward balance. As a result, while you wear it, your crops will be blessed with a higher chance of dropping Balance Mooncakes during the harvest.

name: Chopping Wood Block
desc: Use this block to axe tree block a few questions! Questions like: What will you become after a good choppin'?!

name: Weeping Willow
desc: The trunk of a lovely willow tree! It may be weeping now, but think how happy it'll be once it's settled in your world!

name: Weeping Willow Branch
desc: The branches of a lovely willow tree! It may be weeping now, but just think how happy it'll be once it's settled in your world!

name: Weeping Willow Foliage
desc: Assorted swaying leaves for a lovely willow tree! It may be weeping now, but just think how happy it'll be once it's settled in your world!

name: Weeping Willow Streamers
desc: Long, delicate strands of leaves to hang from a lovely willow tree! It may be weeping now, but just think how happy it'll be once it's settled in your world!

name: Wood Chips
desc: Somethin' got chopped, and here's the result! Nice work!

name: Woven Wood Bolt
desc: All those wood chips made for terrible snacks, but with a little sew-how, you found a new purpose for them in this beautiful bolt! Now what can you make with THIS, I wonder...?

name: Broken Tea Basket
desc: Looks like this tea basket took on too many trees! Don't fret, though - maybe with a little work (and some more raw materials), you can fix it up!

name: Dual Crescent Blade

func.rem: Nice slicin' - now take a break!

desc: Forged in swirling desert sands, these ancient blades carry a hint of the siroccos in which they were made.

name: Sun Blade
desc: Bane of vampires and mole people, the glorious Sun Blade casts a brilliant glow when held aloft! As a side bonus, it also provides its wielder with their daily recommended dose of Vitamin D.

name: Storm Breaker
desc: As wielders of an ancient elemental power, those who hold this sky-shaking weapon will inspire awe in all who view them. Lo, the clouds shall part with a mighty crash of thunder, heralding your arrival!

name: Speeder
desc: Perfect for zipping around an endless desert under the baleful glare of twin suns!

name: Sniper Rifle

func.add: Scope up: It's time to go long!
func.rem: Scope down: Time to get close!

desc: Able to knock the wings off a fly at a thousand paces, this perfectly-calibrated rifle is an insect's greatest fear! Wait, you weren't planning on using it against anything else, were you??

name: Monster Truck
desc: Full of fangs, fuel, and positraction, this beastly truck proves you don't need horsepower - not when you have MONSTERPOWER!

name: Healing Tome

func.rem: No more grapefruit and health drinks, back to that unhealthy diet of yours.

desc: A floating book filled with healthy tips and lost surgical arts! It'll follow you wherever you go, bringing good health to all. Well, except goats - it HATES goats (we think one tried to eat it).

name: Ghost Mobile
desc: Haunted by the spirit of a legendary stunt driver, this car can go from zero to spectral in 0.6 seconds!

name: Ghost Rider Bike
desc: Pulled from the underworld and wrapped in the flames of damnation, this bike is one scorchin' hot ride! Ow! Better wear some thicker pants!

name: Spring-Loaded Fists
desc: Superb punching power - on springs! For those times when you REALLY want to punch someone and they're ALLL the way on the other side of the room!

name: Ring of Night

func.rem: Dark, darker, darker still! Your eyes fade to black.

desc: Binds its wielder to the darkness and makes them one with the night! You won't need the hated touch of light to illuminate the dark with this imposing artifact on your finger...

name: Fish Landing Platform
desc: A proper place to fish! Now you don't need to worry about someone splashing around in your favorite fishing spot - just stick this on top and prepare for a relaxing day of casts!

name: Fishing Stool
desc: The fish might be nibbling, but your dogs are barking! Take a load off while you reel in the next big catch!

name: Cooler Box
desc: Perfectly insulated to keep your treats fresh! Fill it with goodies and get ready for a day of sun and fun!

name: Bountiful Seed Pack
desc: Contains 5 randomly chosen bountiful seeds, including 1 rare bountiful seed! Use it on yourself to open it - who knows what you'll get?!

name: Steampunk Goggles
desc: Fogged with the heat of your latest madcap mechanical monstrosity and lined in soot, these goggles have seen you through more than one unplanned explosion!

name: Colored Round Glasses
desc: Viewing the past with colored glasses might not be a great idea, but the present? That just makes you look cool!

name: Ruined Bricks
desc: These bricks may have seen better days, but they can still build something beautiful!

name: Barbed Wire Barrier
desc: Keeping out zombies, insurance salesman, and angry cattle since the 1860s!

name: Sandbag Wall
desc: It might not be a great place to hang your flatscreen television, but when it comes to fortifications fast, you can't beat sand in bags!

name: Regal Stairs
desc: Ascend toward your royal chambers or descend in full view of your adoring nobility for the night's gala event - these stairs make you look good coming AND going!

name: Regal Bannister
desc: The perfect handhold to keep your regal butt from tumbling down!

name: Mahogany Frame
desc: Really gives your art the smoky, all-natural vibe of coffeehouses and rustic farmhouses!

name: Chimney
desc: Stop filling your house with smoke and give it somewhere else to go with this very tall and very classic fireplace accessory!

name: Grimstone Background
desc: These grimy, imposing walls have seen some dark stuff!

name: Black Leather Couch
desc: Very fancy and super-comfortable, but it squeaks like crazy if you even shift a millimeter!

name: Anubis Mask
desc: The face of an AncieNt goD, forgottEn beneath tRackless desert sands, has fallEn into youR hands! Imagine what the eyes behind this strange mask Once saw...

name: Anubis Seal
desc: Heavy plate to entomb the might of an ancient god! How could This Have found its way across thE tRackless wastes to yOu? from what dark dangers did it protect its former owner...?

name: Anubis Mail
desc: Overlapping plates and sunForged chain to proTect an ancient god! WHen did Anubis losE this? Or perhaps he Found something Even stronger...

name: Anubis Greaves
desc: Scoured by the desert sands, like a Jewel, these greaves cUT through towering dunes in the Service of Their enlgmatiC ownEr!

name: Anubis Boots
desc: Even strange And mystical godS of the ancient world Knew the benefit of good footwear. these boots can Help you defy the dEsert heat Without losing your cool!

name: Spirit of Anubis

func.add: You are one with the spirit of Anubis!

desc: Drawn back from the endless deserts of the after life, the power of Anubis flow through you! By combining his relics, you have summoned his spirit from across the gulf of time, and in thanks for freeing him from the embrace of the void, he has agreed to lend a portion of his might to you in your adventures

name: Cursed Spirit Pendant - Red
desc: Howling with gruesome red energy and generally bad vibes, this pendant was found locked in an iron trunk in the basement of a dark castle. THEN it was burried with its former owner (who died of mysterious causes) before being stolen by graverobbers. THEN it was sold to an evil general before being lost on a wartorn battlefield. AND THEN... it found its way to you. Quake in terror, mortal, for this is surely the most haunted object to be found in Growtopia... so far!

name: Cursed Spirit Pendant - Green
desc: Howling with gruesome green energy and generally bad vibes, this pendant was found locked in an iron trunk in the basement of a dark castle. THEN it was burried with its former owner (who died of mysterious causes) before being stolen by graverobbers. THEN it was sold to an evil general before being lost on a wartorn battlefield. AND THEN... it found its way to you. Quake in terror, mortal, for this is surely the most haunted object to be found in Growtopia... so far!

name: Cursed Spirit Pendant - Purple
desc: Howling with gruesome purple energy and generally bad vibes, this pendant was found locked in an iron trunk in the basement of a dark castle. THEN it was burried with its former owner (who died of mysterious causes) before being stolen by graverobbers. THEN it was sold to an evil general before being lost on a wartorn battlefield. AND THEN... it found its way to you. Quake in terror, mortal, for this is surely the most haunted object to be found in Growtopia... so far!

name: Cursed Spirit Pendant - Blue
desc: Howling with gruesome blue energy and generally bad vibes, this pendant was found locked in an iron trunk in the basement of a dark castle. THEN it was burried with its former owner (who died of mysterious causes) before being stolen by graverobbers. THEN it was sold to an evil general before being lost on a wartorn battlefield. AND THEN... it found its way to you. Quake in terror, mortal, for this is surely the most haunted object to be found in Growtopia... so far!

name: Superfly Hat
desc: The sweetest hat for the smoothest of Growtopians, this is what you should be slipping on when you want the coolest style possible! Chosen by FarmWizard, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for September, 2019!

name: Dark Ticket
desc: Beware! Consuming this will send you off to the terrifying Tomb of Growganoth! While you're there, you will have only 20 minutes before the darkness dissipates and returns you to the real world. Banish your items in Growganoth's Sacrifical Wells to earn Corruption Points and get spooktacular rewards at the Corruption Altar! Note: You will need boots for climbing and a source of light to overcome darkness!

name: Sacrificial Well
desc: No info.

name: Ultimate Corruption Altar
desc: Receive the just rewards of your dark sacrifices here!

name: Bone Fence
desc: Surround your house with clattering bones! Just be careful - your local Homeowners Association may not find it very humerus...

name: Bone Checkpoint
desc: Call the fallen back to reality with a bony checkpoint to remind them of their own mortality! Remember, if you die, you'll respawn at the last checkpoint you touched

name: Bone Platform
desc: Are you guests tired of standing on shaky ground? Well, they'll be shaking in their shoes when they step foot on these terrifying platforms!

name: Spooky Bunting
desc: Celebrate the spookiest of seasons with this ghastly new decoration!

name: Scythe of the Underworld

func.add: Consumed by the power of the Underworld!
func.rem: The scythe returns to its domain!

desc: Dripping with dark magic, the blade of this horrific scythe is capable of cutting through the veil of life and death itself! Wrenched into the mortal plane by dire sorcery, it's now free to wreck havoc among the living!

name: Tarantula Legs
desc: Skiter, skitter, goes the spider. Long legs and longer shadows reach out from their monstrous owner... you.

name: Horns of Growganoth
desc: The Dark One walks among us! You have been cursed (or blessed, depending on your level of evil) with the dire sign of Growganoth itself! These horns are a sure sign you've taken one step too far across the line between good and ghastly! Buff: Bonus 250 XP for consuming a Dark Ticket for the Tomb of Growganoth!

name: Supernaturally Speedy Black High Heels
desc: Super-fast and super-stylish, these heels will get you where you need to be in a flash! Only problem is that they're really, REALLY uncomfortable, especially once you hit Mach 2...

name: Supernaturally Speedy Black High Heels Seed
Spooky Bed
desc: Like a normal bed, only for creepy Victorian families with dark secrets!

name: Creepy Caged Doll
desc: There's a reason this doll's in a cage. Don't let it out.

name: Demon Cow Cube
desc: Phew! Good thing this beast's been trapped! If it weren't in a cube, it'd be trying to trample you with its unhallowed hooves!

name: Eldritch Flame Wall Torch
desc: Sinister light that's so spooky, you almost wish it were completely dark. Of course, that's where the REAL monsters lurk...

name: Dark Fairy Pendant

func.add: Get in with the wrong crowd!
func.rem: Back on the straight and narrow!

desc: This fairy used to be full of goodness, gumdrops, and light, but a few bad decisions, one too many hits of pixie dust, and hanging around with the wrong crowd led her down the path to darkness!

name: Totally Harmless Doll Head
desc: What's scarier? A totally harmless doll that stays in one place until you look away... or a Growtopian wearing its head?!

name: Totally Harmless Doll Shirt
desc: What's scarier? A totally harmless doll that stays in one place until you look away... or a Growtopian wearing its shirt?!

name: Totally Harmless Doll Pants
desc: What's scarier? A totally harmless doll that stays in one place until you look away...  or a Growtopian wearing its pants?!

name: Demon Night Stallion

func.rem: No more evil prancing for you!

desc: Now THIS is a horse that’ll make you say neigh! If you dare to ride it, make sure you have plenty of evil sugar cubes and cursed carrots to tempt it into not stomping you flat!

name: Cursed Katana

func.rem: Cast away, until it calls again...

desc: A once-honorable blade, this blade was renowned as a slayer of evil, but the void stares back, or so they say, and centuries of carnage have twisted it to the ways of darkness! Beware this blade, for those who wield it... are forever cursed!

name: Hilarious Honker

func.rem: Hello? Hey, where did you go!?

desc: Some people are scared of clowns, but who could be afraid of this cute little guy? Summoned by the whimsical toots of his magical horn, Binky is here to amuse and play!

name: Chimera's Call

func.rem: Hello? Hey, where did you go!?

desc: A bizarre creature out of the myth! The chimera may be a mash-up of many animals, but every last part is filled with an equal amount of friendship for you!

name: Rainbow Crystal Cloak

func.rem: I guess dreams only come true for others, not you.

desc: Rainbow cloth studded with shimmering crystals! The multicolored majesty of this cloak will carry you aloft, where all can gaze upon your prismatic wonder!

name: Claw Of Growganoth

func.rem: Oh, it won't be too happy about this!

desc: A creeping being from the darkest depths of the void! Summoned by the fractured claw of its master, is this monstrous thing truly a creation of Growganoth... or something darker?

name: Nano Nurse Bot

func.add: The Nano Nurse provides everything a surgeon needs.

desc: Filled with helpful nanobots to improve your surgery successes (and maybe keep you from losing an item or two)!

name: Battle Boots

func.add: You've got a trick or two in your boots.

desc: Stomp your foes... but not your wallet! These boots are made for victories, so put'em on and get to winning!

name: Alpha's Shawl
desc: For those who refuse to heed the call of the pack, this shawl will show everyone you'll never follow - only lead! AwooooOOOOOOoooo!

name: Mega-Hooky Vest

func.add: Patience pays off for those who fish.

desc: A big fish needs a bigger hook, and this vest has plenty to spare! Toss this on and cast off for a fishy victory!

name: Superb Chef's Super Spatula

func.add: Tiles look like really big flapjacks.

desc: Get your flip on! This spatula will flip any objects with a single slap! Use it on chairs, beds, and anything else you find facing the wrong way! Best of all, it's made of patented GrowTech spatulanium, guaranteed to stay firm even after a thousand slaps!

name: Slippery Chemical Coat
desc: Coated in frictionless chemicals! This coat is utterly spattered with the most nonstick, inertia-preserving, super-lubricated slip-n'-slide mix, so if you're wearing it, make sure you're not near anything sharp!

name: Uranium Chair
desc: Glowing with the radioactive power of the apocalypse! Take a seat, and even if you don't have any mutants to rule, you'll get a "healthy" green glow for your efforts!

name: Rocket-Powered Warhammer
desc: Forget using your puny human muscles to swing this hammer! it's so big and bashy, it uses ROCKET POWER to crack the skies and shatter the earth! Look out!

name: Tainted Cheese

func.rem: I guess cheddar will have to do.

desc: The rat summoned by this cheese is very friendly, but also very ill! Why would you want this plagued vermin for a pet? Well, getting a rare malady isn't always a bad thing, assuming you have a good doctor to help cure it!

name: Friendship Dragon Claw

func.add: It's me, Hugsy! Hugsy'll be your pal!

desc: There are many dragons out there - dragons of fire and disaster, dragons of home and hearth, and even dragons from beyond the stars - but NONE are so friendly as this one! Known as Hugalovensnugglor (Hugsy to his closest friends), this dragon is only too happy to shower the world (and you) with hearts!

name: Spectral Mantle
desc: Writhing chains from the Other Side! These spirit-forged links are meant to capture the most terrible of ghosts, but since you're not, y'know, DEAD, they just look very cool (and maybe a little creepy)

name: Challenge Ledger
desc: A monolith of knowledge for all aspiring challengers! This ledger will display Daily Guild Challenge points totals for all members of the guild to which you belong (if any). And hey, even if you don't have a guild (which could be weird, considering how you get this), it'll still show the leading guilds in the Daily Guild Challenge! Now that's value!

name: Captain's Log

func.add: Captains log: Today our mission begins.

desc: A high-tech diary to record your latest findings! The incredible efficiency possible through careful record-keeping may even give you a chance of not using up a Star Tool during a Star Mission! Wow!

name: Dark Doctor's Cloak

func.add: Hiding your contagions in your cloak.
func.rem: You'd better go fill your pockets with posies.

desc: Not all doctors are concerned with their patients! For some, like those who bear this dire cloak, they only live for the challenge of the most vicious of diseases, and wearing this cloak will increase their odds of getting them from Vile Vials! Yikes!

name: Loot Detector
desc: Perfect for treasure-seekers! This detector will increase your odds of finding maps and map fragments in Treasure Blasts, which is weird, considering they're not made of metal. Hey, how does this thing work, anyway?!

name: Ghostking's Command

func.rem: Run!!! Don't look back, just run.

desc: A rod of command stripped from the forces of the Other Side! This spectral scepter won't necessarily make ghosts any happier to see you, but it WILL decrease the odds that a Spirit Storage Unit will detonate at lower, less-lucrative levels in worlds you own!

name: Guild Challenge Crown
desc: Congratulations! Your guild was #1 in a Guild Daily Challenge! Show off your accomplishment with a shiny crown. Ooh, so shiny!

name: Cooking Recipe - Putrid Gas Filled Blood Maggot Crepes
desc:
To cook this recipe, you need the following:
Ingredients:
*Milk
*Rotten Egg
*Burnt Slime
*Putrid Gas

Seasoning:
*A pinch of Salt

Process: Add Milk and Rotten Egg to an oven on Low heat. While the Milk is still cold, add Burnt Slime. Add the seasonings and wait until perfectly cooked all the way through. Then add Putrid Gas and remove from the oven straight away.

Timings may vary so you need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - Putrid Gas Filled Blood Maggot Crepes Seed
Cooking Recipe - Alien Bloodied Brains Strudel
desc:
To cook this recipe you will need the following:

Ingredients:
* Space Poop
* Zombie Brain
* Slime
* Putrid Gas
* Acid to taste

Process: Add Space Poop to an oven on Low heat. While the Space Poop is still cold, add Zombie Brain. Before the Space Poop begins to cook, add Slime. Add the seasonings and wait until perfectly cooked all the way through. Then add Putrid Gas and remove from the oven straight away.

Timings may vary so you will need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - Alien Bloodied Brains Strudel Seed
Cooking Recipe - Rotting Fish Guts Club Sandwich
desc:
Ingredients:
* Rotting Sea Goo
* Fish Chunk
* Tomato
* Burnt Slime

Seasoning:
* A pinch of Salt
* Acid to taste

Process:
Add Rotting Sea Goo to an oven on Low heat. While the Rotting Sea Goo is still cold, add Fish Chunk
and then Tomato. Before the Fish Chunk begins to cook, add Burnt Slime. Add the seasonings and
wait until perfectly cooked all the way through before removing from the oven.

Timings may vary so you will need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - Rotting Fish Guts Club Sandwich Seed
Cooking Recipe - Festering Urchin & Poop Pie
desc:
Ingredients:
* Space Poop
* Gruel
* Rotting Sea Goo
* Sea Urchin

Seasoning:
* 3x Acid to taste

Process:
Add Space Poop to an oven on Low heat. Just before the Space Poop begins to cook, add Gruel.
While the Space Poop is underdone, add Rotting Sea Goo. While the Gruel is still cold, before it begins
to cook, add Sea Urchin. Add the seasonings and wait until perfectly cooked all the way through
before removing from the oven.

Timings may vary so you will need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - Festering Urchin & Poop Pie Seed
Dumb Tomb of Growganoth
