desc: You shouldn't be able to read this, you sneaky person, you.

name: Dumb Tomb of Growganoth Claimed Seed
Nightmare Teeny Devil Wings
desc: Now with extra nightmares to terrify you and everyone else! You wanna float?

name: Red Laser Scimitar

func.add: Feel the power of the dark side!

desc: Carve the very air itself with energy-edged annihilation! Designed to exacting standards by Growtech's Department of Slicing & Dicing, this blazing red blade will show your foes that when it comes to bleeding-edge weaponry, you can't beat an edge made of LASERS!

name: Green Laser Scimitar

func.add: Feel the power of the dark side!

desc: Carve the very air itself with energy-edged annihilation! Designed to exacting standards by Growtech's Department of Slicing & Dicing, this blazing green blade will show your foes that when it comes to bleeding-edge weaponry, you can't beat an edge made of LASERS!

name: Blue Laser Scimitar

func.add: Feel the power of the dark side!

desc: Carve the very air itself with energy-edged annihilation! Designed to exacting standards by Growtech's Department of Slicing & Dicing, this blazing blue blade will show your foes that when it comes to bleeding-edge weaponry, you can't beat an edge made of LASERS!

name: Purple Laser Scimitar

func.add: Feel the power of the dark side!

desc: Carve the very air itself with energy-edged annihilation! Designed to exacting standards by GrowTech's Department of Slicing & Dicing, this blazing purple blade will show your foes that when it comes to bleeding-edge weaponry, you can't beat an edge made of LASERS!

name: Wolfy Tank Top
desc: AwooOOOOooo! Lovers of lupine layers, take note: your fashion icon has arrived! Chosen by RDK, this howlingly handsome tank top is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for October, 2019!

name: Dinner Bell
desc: Let everyone know when dinner is ready! It's been proven by historians that all old-timey places had bells like these.

name: Hay Chair
desc: Feel like kicking up your feel after a long day of farming? This hay bale will cushion your weary bones and make a tasty snack for your animals!

name: Thanksgiving Frame
desc: Decorative and delightful, this certainly makes for festive frame-job in the Thanksgiving spirit!

name: Turkey Hat

func.add: This silly turkey has found a new home on your head.
func.rem: This takes hat hair to another level!

desc: Very few turkeys make for good headgear, and even fewer are stronger enough to lift a full-grown Growtopian, so count yourself lucky you've found this mighty beast!

name: Riding Bell

func.add: Celebrate the coming of the harvest in style.
func.rem: Your feet are back on solid ground.

desc: We truly live in a future our ancestors could only have dreamed of, a vast land of possibility where bells aren't just for announcing dinner or generating ambience, but where they come with plush seats and 500 horsepower, capable of carrying us to and fro, all thanks to GrowTech!

name: Dueling Star Fighter - Rebel Raider
desc: Splash your name across the stars in this high-flying, laser-firing, rebellion-building beauty of a star fighter! There's a cold and devious empire out there that needs toppling, and you're just the pilot to do it!

name: Dueling Star Fighter - Rebel Raider Seed
Dueling Star Fighter - Imperial Enforcer

func.add: I have you in my sights...

desc: Stand for the glory of the Emperor in this turbo-powered, rebel-crushing, empire-stabilizing stunner of a spacecraft! There's an ill-planned and dangerous rebellion out there that needs crushing, and you're just the pilot to do it!

name: Dueling Star Fighter - Imperial Enforcer Seed
Rebel Raider Droid
desc: Beep beep! Here to help keep your Raider in tip-top condition, this droid will never leave the rebellion in the lunch!

name: Imperial Enforcer Droid
desc: Boop boop! Here to help keep your Enforcer in optimally-mandated condition, this droid will never defy the will of the empire!

name: Defiant Jester's Mask
desc: Not all jesters are funny! This mask is for a court entertainer with deadly serious skills! Maybe they were a bodyguard for the King...? Chosen by inflames19, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for November, 2019!

name: Transmutabooth
desc: Behold this wondrous technological device from the innovative folks at GrowTech! The Transmutabooth allows you to transmute clothing items together to give them the visual look of another clothing item - so if you've ever wanted your Cyclopean Visor to look like Shades (while keeping its mod) now you can!

name: Armored WinterBot - Back
desc: One of the five legendary pieces of the great WinterBot, guardian of the Winter Fortress. Turns out its great for relieving back pain.

name: Armored WinterBot - Feet
desc: One of five legendary pieces of the great WinterBot, guardian of the Winter Fortress. You can't tell if you are running incredibly fast, or constantly sliding. Either way, these shoes make you faster.

name: Armored WinterBot - Fists
desc: One of the 5 legendary pieces of the great WinterBot, guardian of the Winter Fortress. Ice shards envelope your hand, punching with this might do some damage.

name: Armored WinterBot - Mail
desc: One of five legendary pieces of the great WinterBot, guardian of the Winter Fortress. I hope you're used to the cold, it's only getting colder from here. Perhaps this isn't the best thing to wear without a jacket.

name: Armored WinterBot - Greaves
desc: One of five legendary pieces of the great WinterBot, guardian of the Winter Fortress. Gives you an icy stance, not sure if it's the resolve of guarding the fortress for eternity or just that you've loss all feeling in your legs.

name: Frosty Wings
desc: These Frosty Wings are made out of ice so they can't fly, but perhaps if you try hard enough... Nope, you can double jump.

name: Riding Eagle Owl
desc: This strange little bird can't make up its mind if it's an eagle or an owl! Either way it can easily lift you into the air none the less.

name: Royal Winter Seal
desc: A sign of wintry royalty!

name: Elf Hoodie
desc: Just because you dress up like an elf doesn't mean you are one, but at least you shouldn't be getting any coal this year.

name: Cloak of Fire and Ice

func.add: Feel the heat, feel the chill!

desc: We had to add ice to the cape, otherwise it would have back-fired.

name: Cloak of Fire and Ice Seed
Yeti Leash
desc: This terrifying little beast of the arctic wastes, just wants a hug. Maybe it thinks you're its mommy with those big feet!

name: Hammer Of Winter
desc: It seems to be a stick with a huge ice block on the end. Whenever you swing this, the ice block flies off at incredible speeds. Bet it could do some serious damage.

name: Ice Throne of Winter
desc: Be the king or queen of your own kingdom, let's just hope it doesn't melt first.

name: Winterfest Checkpoint
desc: Seems like a normal checkpoint but somewhat colder. Allows you to respawn at the last checkpoint you touched!

name: Ice Sculptures
desc: How long did you spend cutting out that shape? You can use your chainsaw to change the design of the sculpture. How else are you supposed to do it?

name: Snowtopian
desc: Dress up your very own snowtopian with all your favorite clothes. Can't wear pants or shoes obviously!

name: Decorative Propane
desc: Great for roasting marshmallows after a long day in the safety of your home.

name: Tacky Holiday Hair
desc: You infused your hair with so much 'spirit of giving', it became a Giving Tree!

name: Cute Riding Polar Bear
desc: It's like a horse... except it's soft, fuzzy, large, and predatory. It possibly wants to eat you! It would never hurt you though, it's too adorable.

name: Winter Radiance Aura
desc: Cold seems to radiate from you, swirling into careless snowflakes. Somehow this grants you the ability to double jump, don't ask how.

name: Ancestral Orb of Time : Level 6 Seed
Legendary Clash Key & Finale Ticket
desc: One is for opening an end-of-year legendary prize, the other's for getting into a dangerous parkour world full of traps and treasures! We'll let you figure out which is which.

name: Legendary Clash Key & Finale Ticket Seed
Winter Clash Finale Ticket
desc: Beware! Using this ticket will send you off to a world of great dangers and riches! When you are there, you will have only 25 MINUTES before the power of this ticket diminishes and you are returned to the real world. Can you conquer the chaos of Winter Clash in time?

name: Legendary Clash Key & Finale Ticket
desc: One is for opening an end-of-year legendary prize, the other's for getting into a dangerous parkour world full of traps and treasures! We'll let you figure out which is which.

name: Legendary Clash Key & Finale Ticket Seed
Spring Clash Finale Ticket
desc: Beware! Using this ticket will send you off to a world of great dangers and riches! When you are there, you will have only 25 MINUTES before the power of this ticket diminshes and you are returned to the real world. Can you conquer the chaos of Spring Clash in time?

name: Dumb Pass Icon
desc: Display purposes only, it's just a dumb icon.

name: Winterfest Calendar - 2019
desc:
A wonderful Winterfest Calendar for 2019, jam-packed with joy and gifts to celebrate the holidays. Make sure to check back each day to get a new gift! ...or just wait and open them all in one go! Either way, it's a blast!
DO NOT BREAK! The Winterfest Calendar will not return to your backpack if broken!

name: Used Winterfest Calendar - 2019
desc: Winterfest 2019 was a bright and beautiful season, and this calendar marked the occasion with joys and gifts! Now that it's empty, you won't be getting anymore presents, but it can still be used as a lovely decoration.

name: Dummy Item for VIP Effect
desc: You shouldn't be able to read this, you sneaky person, you.

name: Dummy Item for VIP Effect Seed
Dummy Transmutation Icon
desc: No info.

name: Dummy Transmutation Temp Icon
desc: No info.

name: Balloon Target
desc: Hit to score points during the balloon warz.

name: Ancient Shards
desc: An artifact from a forgotten age, twinkling with strange energies! These shards will orbit their owner, infusing them with the power of a civilization long since past! Also, they'll twinkle with shifting iridescent light, which happens to make for a really sweet fashion statement.

name: Flower Pot
desc: This delicate little flower is just too precious to put down! Good thing it likes to be held by kind Growtopians like yourself! Chosen by DeusV, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for December, 2019!

name: Coin: 7th Anniversary Block
desc: SEVEN YEARS! They just keep coming! Copper is the traditional gift associated with 7th anniversaries, so as a thank you for your continued support, please join us in celebrating this monumental achievement with this beautiful coppery block.

name: Rave Haze Light
desc: Superb raves need superb lights, and these will have everyone proclaiming your scene hardcore to the max! Just... don't tell anyone these are old, repurposed Christmas lights. That might be awkward.

name: Rave Hall Wall
desc: Lead your eager ravers to the party with these rave-ready walls!

name: Rave Hall Floor
desc: This graffiti-covered floor is the perfect place to host a mod party and, of course, lose valuable objects.

name: Rave Stage
desc: A rave-light covered stage, perfect for aspiring Djs and house bands to blast their music at absurdly loud volumes!

name: Superstar Shades
desc: They say wisdom comes with age, but they didn't say anything about style like this! These are the shades of superstardom, reserved for the greatest of Growtopians! With these equipped, YOU will become the very definition of cool. As for wisdom, well... that's up to you.

name: Confetti Rocket Shoes
desc: Look, if sticking confetti-filled rockets to the bottom of shoes is crazy, then i don't want to be sane.

name: Euphoric Dragon
desc: Of all the many dragons you could encounter, this is perhaps the most dangerous... if you don't like FUN! Utterly uncompromising in its quest for the biggest and best parties, this dragon is all about a good time, and it's utterly thrilled to be at your side as you adventure into the wilds of Growtopia!

name: Party Bubble Blaster
desc: The ultimate in party contributions, this bubble blaster will turn any scene into a beautiful whirlwind of bubbly fun! Pop-pop!

name: Raver Hoodie
desc: Express your taste for neon-drenched fun with this psychedelically-colourful raver hoodie.

name: Raver Pants
desc: Dang! Those are some bright n' colourful pants, sure to help you stand out in any scene! (Well, aside from the raver scene - you'll blend right in with them!)

name: Raver Hair
desc: Amp up the party with this amped-up hairdo! Everyone's sure to be impressed, and if they're not, well they're probably deeply uncool, so who cares?

name: Anniversary Skyrocket
desc: Possibly the best way to celebrate our anniversary is by firing unstable gunpowder into the sky! Please aim away from faces, friends, small animals, large animals, and anything that could possibly burn. Like, ever.

name: 1-Day Free Subscription Token
desc: Consume this for one full day of special treatment! You'll get a chance of doubling any XP earned, 10 season tokens (as long as there's a seasonal clash running), and 500 gems!

name: DigiVend Machine
desc: Get with the times and go digital! This wired vending machine can connect its contents to Vending Hubs AND the multiversal economy, providing a unified shopping expert along with price checks to help you sell your goods! All that, and still no human-related hassie! Use your wrench on this to stock it with an item and set a price in World Locks. Other players buy from it! Only works in World-Locked worlds.

name: Vending Hub - Checkout Counter
desc: Your one-stop shop! This vending hub will connect and display (and let shoppers buy) the contents of ALL DigiVends in its row or column (wrench it to set the direction)! Wow! Now that's a shopping experiences we can all enjoy! Note: Only works in World-Locked worlds.

name: Draconic Claw
desc: Used as a symbol of strength and power in parts of China, the Feilong dragon is so powerful it doesn't even need wings to fly. Way to flex on those other dragons, dude. There are only 1000 in existence!

name: Black Friday 2019 Cart - Bronze
desc: You survived the Black Friday stampede. Show off this gilded shopping cart in recognition of your feat.

name: Black Friday 2019 Cart - Silver
desc: You survived the Black Friday stampede. Show off this gilded shopping cart in recognition of your feat!

name: Black Friday 2019 Cart - Gold
desc: You survived the Black Friday stampede. Show off this gilded shopping cart in recognition of your feat!

name: Jin Chan Leash
desc: This mythical creature is said to appear in the presence of good news or great fortune. Lucky you! Now that you have tied it to your wrist you should ALWAYS have good fortune... right? Punching with this equipped allows you to launch a devastating fireball at your foes. Make it burn!

name: Huli Jing Scarf
desc: According to legend, the Huli Jing can be a force of good or evil - and nothing in between. Let's hope you got the good one.

name: Year of The Rat Statue
desc: A statue of the zodiac rat! Growtopians born in the Year of the Rat are clever and quick thinkers.

name: Year of The Rat Statue Seed
Lucky Fortune Cookie
desc: A tasty treat with a touch of wisdom. Crack one open for instant enlightenment (and an extra lucky prizes)!

name: Year of the Rat Lucky Token
desc: Legend says these will link your world to the realm of the ancients, where great gods of chance watch over us. Perhaps if you add this to your world, they will bless you with a small piece of their vast fortunes...

name: Year of the Rat Lucky Token Seed
Red Coin Wallpaper
desc: Made from delicate paper, this wallpaper resembles a stylized coin.

name: Year of the Rat Mask
desc: The rat is the first of zodiac animals. According to myth, the Jade Emperors stated the order of the zodiac would be decided by a race. The rat was clever and tricked by the Ox into giving him a ride, then, at the finish line the rat jumped down and landed in front, becoming first. Limited only to Year of the Rat!

name: Year of the Rat Mask Seed
Emperor's Jacket
desc: One of traditions of Lunar New Year is to celebrate beginnings and a clean slate. Start off the New Year right with this traditionally-styled jacket! Comes in one color, red, which also happens to be the best color.

name: Dummy Item for Checkout Counter Dialog
desc: You shouldn't be able to read this, you sneaky person, you.

name: Dummy Item for Checkout Counter Dialog Seed
WOTD Trophy 2020
desc: Best of all possible trophies in 2020.

name: Euphoric Dragon Egg
desc: A dragon egg, touched by the essence of a euphoric party!

name: Hatching Euphoric Dragon Egg
desc: It's... it's hatching! There's something inside this egg, and it's coming out soon! Ooh, what could it be??

name: Brutal Hand Fans
desc: Conjure the force of hurricane through these deceptively dangerous fans. With one devastating flap, they'll channel your inner chi and send out a stunning strike. You wouldn't want to be on the other end of this!

name: Lovewillow
desc: With soft leaves and a softer heart, the lovewillow is the perfect plant for the lonely! It just wants someone to rest in its shade, and it would love for that kind person to be you!

name: Lovewillow's Lace
desc: A soothing mask of delicately-entwined lovewillow tendrils, this is a heartfelt gift from a very kind tree!

name: Surgical Love Mallet
desc: Used only in Surgery. When someone's heart is broken and needs an affectionate (and startling) jolt, only the best doctors turn to the hammering might of the Love Mallet! Paging Doctor Love!

name: Love Lips
desc: Wild smoochy colors for a wild smoochy face!

name: Charmer Smile
desc: Nobody can resist a winning smile! It's even better when it's actually attached to someone's face, though, so put this on and start winning hearts!

name: Beefy Biceps
desc: Swole as can be! These biceps are the sign of a true athlete, a dedicated fitness freak who keeps their body in tip-top shape! ...and now they're yours. Uh, where did you even get these?

name: Snuggly Kitty Scarf
desc: Full of love and fuzzy affection, this superb scarfcat has only one wish: to spend its days draped around your neck and absorbing as many snuzzles as possible! Mew!

name: Cloud Nine Cape

func.rem: Your feet are back on solid ground!

desc: Woven from the warmest, fluffiest clouds funneled down from the highest heights, this cape is light as can be softer than you can imagine. and all set to take you up, up, and away!

name: Golden Sunset Cape

func.rem: Your feet are back on solid ground!

desc: Practically glowing with the eye-popping colors of a perfect sunset, this once-cloudy cape has been transformed into a stunning piece of radiant cloth! Don this beauty, and everyone will treat you like a sky set ablaze with all of the majesty of a setting sun - they won't be able to look away!

name: Heartthrob Helm
desc: Armor of a valiant Knight of the Heart, this help keep your noggin safe from slashing steel and sorrowful heartbreak alike!

name: Golden Heartthrob Helm
desc: Only the elite Champions of Heart have a worn helm such as this! Polished to a brilliant shine, it's hard to tell if the helm is shimmering from the elegance of it's design or the incredible heart of it's bearer, but either way, all who look on it will be awed by its glory.

name: Lovely Dinner Light
desc: Table's set, dishes are ready, and smiles are sparkling - now you just need an atmospheric way to see it all! Set up this lovely light and enjoy a relaxingly, romantic mood at the flick of a switch!

name: Romantic Bushes
desc: When you absolutely need EVERY LAST THING to be romantic but don't have time to trim topiary your own, grab one of these bushes and set the scene in a flash!

name: Dating Dandy's Suit
desc: Hit the dating scene in style with this charismatic suit!

name: Dating Dandy's Hair
desc: Hit the dating scene in style with this slick and stupendous hair!

name: Dating Vixen's Dress
desc: Hit the dating scene in style with this irresistible dress!

name: Dating Vixen's Hair
desc: Hit the dating scene in style with this stunning hairstyle!

name: Datemaster's Rose
desc: Perfect for making your affectionate intentions known, this rose will let everyone know you're a date-goin' Growtopian without peer! Toss one now and get your dating done right.

name: Datemaster's Bling
desc: Forget putting a ring on it - toss a GIGANTIC ring AT it and they'll never forget you!

name: Datemaster's Heart Locket

func.add: Rise on the wings of love!

desc: All the secrets of the perfect date have been fused with the sparkling strength of a golden heart to create this nexus of affection! Be the quickest to anyone's heart when you don this delightful locket!

name: Angelic Counting Cloud
desc: Place three in a row and punch to let the angels do their thing. If you can get three in a row of the angelic number you may be rewarded by the angels themselves.

name: Medusa's Crown
desc: Crafted by the Great Gorgon herself, this incredible crown of magic and malice will strike fear into the hearts of all who look upon it. With the power of its gaze, you'll be able to turn your enemies (and hey, even your friends!) to stone! Note: The Curse of the Gorgon only works in worlds owned by you. Magic is weird like that.

name: Super Golden Booty Chest
desc: Smash it for Valentine's goodies! Has increased chances of getting super valuable rewards. Every year the Golden Heart Crystal is locked in time and remains constant, appearing at the same frequency throughout the ages, while new items change and fade with the passage of time.

name: Pink Teeny Angel Wings
desc: Even as tiny as they are, these cute pink wings allow you to jump in mid-air!

name: Walking Cane
desc: An exquisitely crafted walking cane made of the finest mahogany with gold trim. Great for peaceful walks in the garden or keeping you looking classy in your old age! Chosen by TBUO, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for January, 2020!

name: Magic Stones
desc: Carrying these magical stones will light up even the darkest areas, although, the magic seems unstable. These magic stones burn out at unpredictable moments so make sure to carry several.

name: Rune Carved Door
desc: Who knows what lurks inside?

name: Armored Riding Troll

func.rem: Back on your own two feet.

desc: A tamed monstrosity of the deep caverns of the world. Throws dirt at your foes and moves with surprising speed for its size.

name: Dwarven Beard
desc: The pride of all dwarves.

name: Dwarven Mining Helm
desc: Tired of carrying your candle in your hand? Some clever dwarf discovered you can stick it to your helm to free up your hands for digging.

name: Shield of Mining
desc: Protects from falling debris. Also quite handy in a fight.

name: Mining Explosives
desc: Use to blow apart even the most stuborn rocks. Great for mining deep ore deposits. Warning: stand back when using!

name: Strange Eyes
desc: Born from the inky black of the deep caves, these eyes look a little odd to anyone not familiar with the deep caverns.

name: Mining Pauldrons
desc: Protects from falling debris. Arm yourself for the dangers that lie in the deep places of the world.

name: Mining Chestplate
desc: Protects from falling debris. Arm yourself for the dangers that lie in the deep places of the world.

name: Mining Mech

func.add: Heigh-ho, Heigh-ho, it's off to work I go!
func.rem: Heigh-ho, Heigh-ho, it's home from I go!

desc: Forged from the magic ore of the caverns. It's magic drill will break through deep caverns with ease.

name: Lightning Gauntlets
desc: Stores magic energy and then releases it in a bolt of lightning from your fingertips. Like a sith lord but cooler.

name: Magic Infused Stone
desc: Deep stones infused with magic!

name: Magic Infused Stone Background
desc: Deep stones infused with magic!

name: Magic Infused Vein
desc: A vein of magic infused ore!

name: Pure Magic Ore
desc: A block of pure magic ore!

name: Dwarven Wall
desc: Block of stone carved by the ancient dwarves

name: Dwarven Background
desc: Walls covered in carvings from the ancient dwarves that mined the deep caverns of the world.

name: Dwarven Column
desc: Columns of stone carved from the surrounding rocks by the ancient dwarves.

name: Balrog Wings
desc: Born of fire and shadow. These wings burn but somehow are never consumed.

name: Balrog's Tail
desc: A sword forged from the tail of a mighty demon.

name: Angelic Heart Cloud
desc: Place three in a row and punch to let the angels do their thing. If you can get three in a row of the angelic number you may be rewarded by the angels themselves.

name: Magic Ore
desc: This raw ore, mined from deep within the Earth. Surely there's something you can do with it!

name: Magic Ingot
desc: You've managed to process this ore into a pure, shining ingot, just by tossing it into a fire!

name: Magic Armor Plate
desc: This armor plate is forged from refined Magic Ore, which makes it particularly attuned to magic.

name: Magic Armor Plate Design
desc: This paper details a method for forging a Magic Armor Plate. If you forge 100 Magic Ingots with this design in hand, you'll make a Magic Armor Plate. This consumes the design.

name: Galaxy Aura

func.add: The weight of the galaxy is on your shoulder!

desc: A swirling galaxy engulfs you, pulling everything you touch towards you (well only growtopians!).

name: Radiant Doom Staff
desc: A floating staff radiating with dark energy and deep dread! For some reason it seems to like you and will do what you say (for now). It'll follow you wherever you go, and strike fear in the hearts of your enemies. Best not to make it angry though.

name: Increase Backpack
desc: BUY MORE BACKPACK SPACE

name: Shamrock Shades
desc: Rock some shamrock shades!

name: Irish Top Hat
desc: A lovely top of the morning top hat! Only found in Blarney 1 and 4.

name: Green Trenchcoat
desc: It's Green... it's a coat, its an awesome Green Trenchcoat! Note: this is a "chest item", like a necklace, so you can wear any shirts and back items you want underneath it.

name: Slithering Slippers

func.add: I decided to go for a little run.
func.rem: I'm pretty tired... I think I'll go home now.

desc: Slippers that slither with snakes!

name: Shamrock Wings
desc: Shamrocks give you wings!

name: Giant Falling Shamrock
desc: Shamrocks are lucky.... lucky it doesn't fall like a rock! Hold the jump button while falling to a cushion your fail. Only found in Blarney 5, 7 and 9.

name: Dala Horsie

func.add: Rollin' around at the speed of....

desc: Get rocking and rolling on this speedy horse!

name: Money Aura
desc: Money can't buy you everything but it sure looks cool swirling around you!

name: Pooka Hood
desc: Look like a proper pooka with a pooka hood!

name: King Cobra Chair
desc: A cobra chair fit for a king and a cobra and you!

name: Mobility Scooter
desc: Get around with the latest and greatest in Mobility Scooters. Chosen by Kulchvyach, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for March, 2020!

name: Cooking Recipe - Chocolate Easter Bilby
desc:
Apparently many people can't seem to tell the difference between this cute little marsupial mouse and a rabbit so if you try to cook one without this recipe you will end up with a chocolate bunny instead. To cook this recipe you will need the following: 

You must hold this recipe in your hand. 
Ingredients:
* Easter Egg - Growtopia
* Baking Chocolate
* Chocolate Sprinkles Block
* Marshmallow Seasoning
* Sugar

Process: Add Easter Egg - Growtopia to an oven on Low heat. While the Easter Egg Growtopia is still cold, add Baking Chocolate. Add the seasonings and wait until cooked all the way through. Then add Chocolate Sprinkles Block and Marshmallow and remove from the oven when perfectly cooked. 

Timings may vary so you will need to experiment.

However it repels Peace, Harmony, Prosperity and Longevity Mooncakes making them less likely to be found when harvesting trees.

desc: Ever get the feeling you're being watched? Some say this portrait is cursed and some don't stay in it's prescence long enough to form any opinion! It's certainly spooky though!

name: Shady Sales Shades
desc: Super Pumpkin Party ready shades! Perfect for any Halloween party or any other occasion actually!

name: Twisted Windows
desc: Perfect for the debonair haunted mansion owner!

name: Twisted Roof
desc: A twisted gothic roof! I guess it's perfect for all your twisted gothic building needs then!

name: Twisted Wood Planks
desc: Twisted and wooden and plank like! Perfect for when you need a twisted wooden plank!

name: Twisted Mansion Door
desc: Carved from cursed stone! Some say if you listen in the dead of night you can hear a heartbeat as if it were alive! Like any door, but spooky, you can wrench it to set the destination.

name: Creepy Baby Suit
desc: If you ever need to dress as a creepy baby then you're in luck! This item is perfect for all occasion's.

name: Demogorgon Mask
desc: Perfect Spelunking while looking a bit scary at the same time! Light up the darkest in spooky style.

name: Morbid Hand
desc: Be careful where you step! You just don't know who you might wake from their eternal slumber !

name: Cloak of Equilibrium

func.add: Onwards to the sun and... and moon!

desc: A perfectly balanced cloak! Half infused with power by the sun and half by the moon!

name: Infested Hair
desc: Eugh! Time to buy some new shampoo! Infested and probably rather also rather smelly... perfect for Halloween!

name: Lost Startopian Helmet
desc: Perfect for celebrating the spooky season while also commanding a spaceship!

name: Frankenstein's Monster Mask
desc: Scare the villagers away with this perfectly spooky mask! Slightly reduces items required for Farmer Role quests!

name: Trawlerman's Friend
desc: Not to everyone’s taste that’s for sure! This ”yummy” treat gets bites twice as often.

name: Fossilized Spirit Block
desc: A block that only a true ghost hunter and see clearly!

name: Druid's Crown
desc: A dark, dark crown for a dark, dark Druid! For when you are in one of those, "leave me alone" moods!

name: Druid's Mask
desc: A dark, dark mask for a dark, dark Druid! For when you are in one of those, "leave me alone" moods!

name: Druid's Robes
desc: A dark, dark robe for a dark, dark Druid! For when you are in one of those, "leave me alone" moods!

name: Mooncake Bundle
desc: A lovely assortment of delicious Mooncakes straight from the oven!

name: Cyber Punk Mask
desc: A futuristic Cyber Punk mask, perfect for wearing everyday! Chosen by macmacxd22, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for September, 2020!

name: Reanimated Howly Hat
desc: Awooo! The mad scientists at Growtech have reanimated this beast! It's pretty angry what with having to be carried around on your head all day long!

name: Twisted Wooden Block
desc: Twisted and wooden and blocky! Perfect for a haunted house.

name: Zombie Horse
desc: A zombified flaming horse to terrorize the town with! With hooves of flame, this fiery steed is perfect for the spooky season!

name: Superpower - Defeated
desc: You lose in a superpower card PVP battle. Take some time to rest before trying another fight.

name: Fluff
desc: Lovely hat fluff! For making a special hat.

name: Brim
desc: Lovely hat Brim! For making a special hat.

name: Frosting
desc: Lovely hat Frosting! For making a special hat.

name: Celestial Dragon Charm

func.add: The essence of the sun, moon and stars; I command you!

desc: An ancient and valuable charm, passed between Dragons and their masters for as long as time remembers. Wearing it will invoke the spirit and power of the revered Celestial Dragon! A Dragon of legend who had the power to control the sun, the moon, and the stars!

name: Riding RV

func.rem: Oh no, you've got a flat tire!

desc: A rapid, revving, recreation vehicle! Sit atop this automotive icon cruise from coast to coast in comfort and style!

name: Ultra Sportsball Bat
desc: A bat with some serious power! Imagine the scene... it's the last ball of the game. A Growtopian steps up to bat... what's that? It's an enormous floating shiny metal bat! He hits a HOME RUN and sends the ball into ORBIT and wins the game!

name: American Sports Ball Jersey
desc: Call the plays, be the Quarterback, get involved in some serious contact sport with this Jersey! Earn some Quarterback's money with this equipped. You are the MVP, maybe even the GOAT... but not the Llama!

name: Dining Table
desc: Grab your friends, grab some tasty food and drinks and sit down with your friends together at this infinitely extendable table! Perfect for when your extended Growtopia family comes to visit!

name: Presidential Beard
desc: A truly presidential piece of facial hair! This beard has passed more bills than someone passing by the world's largest gathering of people named William!

name: Pigeon
desc: Used as spies during times of conflict, this humble Pigeon is ready to watch over your worlds! It's much less messy than a real Pigeon as well!

name: All You Can Eat Bib
desc: Did somebody say FOOD FIGHT?! It's an "all you can eat" and also an "all you can throw" bib! It automatically cleans itself too. So, it's very eco-friendly!

name: All You Can Eat Bib Seed
Thanksgiving Dinner Fishing Rod
desc: A rod of such great finery!

name: Turkey Fish
desc: Is it a Turkey? Is it a fish? Some even say it's a Zebra! Grow only knows what it really is! It looks quite poisonous but also like you want to pet it... probably best to leave it be though!

name: Sweet Potato
desc: It's a Potato but it's soooooo much sweeter, kinda!

name: Sweet Potato Tots

func.add: Now we are cooking on gas!

desc: It's like a Tater Tot but err, sweeter I guess! Eating this would probably inspire you to cook a lil' bit better!

name: Sweet Potato Mash
desc: Whizzed up Sweet Potato. Smooth and lump free, just how we like it!

name: Crown of Enlightenment
desc: A copper crown, turned green with time! Symbolizes liberty and enlightenment... also looks awesome! Feels like it's part of a set somehow?

name: Dress of Enlightenment
desc: A copper dress, turned green with time! Symbolizes liberty and enlightenment... also looks awesome! Feels like it's part of a set somehow?

name: Torch of Enlightenment
desc: A copper torch turned green with time! Symbolizes liberty and enlightenment... also, basically, a cool flame thrower! Feels like it's part of a set somehow?

name: Eagle Statue
desc: A proud looking Eagle Statue! This eagle is very much not bald! Look at its fluffy little feathered face!

name: Presidential Wig
desc: Very much a wig for big wigs! Imagine running a country wearing this? I think the people would laugh and make lots of jokes on the internet about you!

name: Burger Suit
desc: If you've ever had the burning desire to dress as a juicy, flamed grilled burger, dripping in the perfect combination of ketchup, mustard, crispy lettuce and a lightly toasted bun... then this is for you! Now I'm hungry!

name: Weather Machine - Celebrity Hills
desc: It's Thanksgiving in Growtopia! Celebrate in Celebrity Hills where dreams are made! This weather machine will let everyone know how glamorous you are!

name: JackBowe's Koala
desc: They are very cute until they get angry! This little furry guy stands as tribute to all of those who lost their lives in Australian Wild Fires. They will always be remembered.

name: Growch Bod
desc: A perfect replica of Growch's beautiful Bod!

name: Turkey Sucker
desc: GrowTech's latest innovation in Turkey capture, containment and cooking! Use the suction beam to collect and cook Turkeys. WARNING: This item is still experimental, so, it can break. Although, when it does, sometimes you get something special.

name: Organic Turkey
desc: So fat, so tender, so expensive!!

name: Neon Oni Mask
desc: Keep safe with this stylish face mask. Chosen by AppleJuz, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for October, 2020!

name: Thanksgiving Turkey Dinner - Bronze
desc: You indulged in one of the year's mightiest meals and came away with this fine reward (and maybe a tummyache)! Show off this bronzed Thanksgiving turkey leg in recognition of your feat!

name: Thanksgiving Turkey Dinner - Silver
desc: You indulged in one of the year's mightiest meals and came away with this fine reward (and maybe a tummyache)! Show off this silvered Thanksgiving turkey leg in recognition of your feat!

name: Thanksgiving Turkey Dinner - Gold
desc: You indulged in one of the year's mightiest meals and came away with this fine reward (and maybe a tummyache)! Show off this gilded Thanksgiving turkey leg in recognition of your feat!

name: Black Friday Cart - Bronze
desc: You survived the Black Friday stampede. Show off this bronzed shopping cart in recognition of your feat.

name: Black Friday Cart - Silver
desc: You survived the Black Friday stampede. Show off this silvered shopping cart in recognition of your feat.

name: Black Friday Cart - Gold
desc: You survived the Black Friday stampede. Show off this gilded shopping cart in recognition of your feat.

name: Cyber Monday Tablet - Bronze
desc: You got high-tech and value-conscious on the best Monday of the year! Show off this bronzed tablet in recognition of your feat!

name: Cyber Monday Tablet - Silver
desc: You got high-tech and value-conscious on the best Monday of the year! Show off this silvered tablet in recognition of your feat!

name: Cyber Monday Tablet - Gold
desc: You got high-tech and value-conscious on the best Monday of the year! Show off this gilded tablet in recognition of your feat!

name: Spooky Window
desc: Perfectly scary windows... some say on the darkest nights spooky figures appear for the blink of an eye! Are you brave to punch it and turn on the lights?

name: Turkey Feather
desc: A Turkey Feather, thats about it really. Not really too useful on it's own.

name: Organic Turkey Feather
desc: An Organic Turkey Feather, that's about it really. Not really too useful on it's own.

name: Spooky Rags
desc: Some very spooky rags, looks like they might be useful for something though.

name: Spooky Box
desc: A very spooky box, looks like it might be useful for something though.

name: Spooky Gift
desc: A very spooky gift, looks like it might be useful for something though.

name: Dark King's Offering
desc: An offering fit for a king or a demon!

name: Shadow Crown

func.add: May you have the blackest of Fridays!

desc: A Black Friday exclusive Crown! Some kind of evil dark spirit must have infested this crown... on the upside, it does look awesome and it gives you some special powers.

name: Matrix Aura
desc: A Black Friday exclusive aura! Numbers falling, time collapsing into itself, just another day in Growtopia then!

name: Black Balrog's Tail
desc: A sword forged from the tail of a mighty demon... only this version is a Black Friday exclusive!

name: Black Burning Eyes

func.add: Your eyes are quite warm and really dark!

desc: Need some eyedrops for those? This is a Black Friday exclusive version!

name: Black Egg Champion Cape

func.add: Flutter through the sky with a smile... only darker!

desc: First chauffeurs, now flying cape services? Is there anything these chicks can't do? This is a Black Friday exclusive version.

name: Tie Dye Hoodie
desc: A Black Friday exclusive hoodie! Looks really comfortable, prefect for lounging around and grabbing a bargain in the sales

name: Black Neon Hightops
desc: A Black Friday exclusive pair of hightops! Black and neon is pretty much the perfect combo isn't it?

name: Vortex Shirt
desc: A Black Friday exclusive shirt! If you've ever wanted a shirt with a sort of vortex effect on it, then you're in luck!

name: Slouch Beanie
desc: A Black Friday exclusive beanie! it's like a regular beanie but too big, so it slouches at the back... or maybe that's how you wanted it?

name: Gradient Trenchcoat
desc: A Black Friday exclusive trenchcoat! A couture trench coat, perfect for the catwalk or walking a cat! Look stylish all the time, everytime!

name: Gift of Growganoth
desc: For giving Growganoth a few gems, it has rewarded you with vast power beyond imagining! Or, perhaps, a random Halloween item. Opening this is equivalent to feeding an item of rarity 75 into the Maw of Growganoth. What you will get is random, so don't open this unless you're ready to be surprised!

name: Swordfish Sword
desc: If you're angling for a sharp pointy fish to use as a sword, then, this is the one for you! The only thing mightier is the Penfish!

name: Jet Ski Chariot
desc: For when you really want to show off! Skim across land and sea, performing tricks and stunts to amaze onlookers!

name: Water Gun Hat
desc: Two water pistols mounted to each side of this hat, will provide more than enough water power to cool off anyone or anything!

name: Cashback Coupon
desc: A Black Friday Cashback Coupon! Exclusive just for Black Friday... and Saturday! Filled with gems or the chance at a Black Friday Black Box!

name: Black Friday Black Box
desc: A Black Friday Gift awaits you! It's what Black Friday is all about!

name: Christmas Tree Sword
desc: Oh Christmas tree, oh Christmas tree, how deadly are thy branches!

name: Sledding Penguin
desc: The ultimate in giant Penguin transportation!

name: Staff of Deepest Winter
desc: Wow this staff is cold! Made of deepest, most wintry snow, and sprinkled with a little Winter magic.

name: Krampus Crampons
desc: Some Crampons which are so cold they even freeze acid... a bit!

name: Legendary Lock
desc: A lock of legend! A new world awaits those who use it! Placing the lock will change the weather to something, well, legendary!

name: Diamond Dust
desc: This locket filled with Diamond dust has the power to transform all who wear it! Tradable since April 25th, 2021.

name: Sleepy Santa Hat
desc: An olden days hat for sleeping, because, for some reason you wore a hat to bed back then!

name: Light Up Antlers
desc: Rudolph the red nosed reindeer might have had a very shiny nose, but you've got light up antlers... so you win!

name: Growch's Nose
desc: A perfect replica of Growch's nose! Well, it would be a bit mean if it was his real one, wouldn't it!

name: Light Up Pants
desc: Party Pants! These flash, flashing, pants are perfect for a Winterfest party!

name: Nick's Belly
desc: Someone's been eating all the mince pies! Who? You!

name: Rift Cape

func.add: A rift in time, here I come!

desc: Rip a hole in the fabric of reality with this amazing Cape! Create two unique looks and use a rift in time and space to change between them. Wrench yourself to customize the Cape. This item is available to buy for 2 days only and then will become available from a new Winterfest system afterwards. To avoid refund fraud, this item has been made untradeable until May 1st, 2021.

name: Mystic Snow Fox
desc: There are many tales about this many tailed fox! Wearing the tail allows you to change your form into that of the mystic fox of legend itself!

name: Water Balloon Bandolier
desc: Wear your balloons with pride! Show your fellow Growtopians your love of Balloon Warz and indeed, water balloons!

name: Team Tied Jersey - Punch
desc: Wear your team colors proudly with this snazzy Jersey.

name: Team Tied Jersey - Grow
desc: Wear your team colors proudly with this snazzy Jersey.

name: Team Tied Jersey - Build
desc: Wear your team colors proudly with this snazzy Jersey.

name: Dungarees
desc: I'm sure you'll agree that these are a wonderful pair of Dungarees, Chosen by Nabsplays, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for November, 2020!

name: Snow Leopard Shawl

func.add: Move with the speed and grace of a Snow Leopard!
func.rem: Move as slowly as a lazy Growtopian!

desc: Made of the finest Faux Snow Leopard Fur. This Shawl is infused with the spirit of a mighty Snow Leopard!

name: Winter Swept Hair
desc: Wherever you go, you'll always be rocking the windswept look!

name: Winter Light Launcher
desc: Get ready to spread some winter cheer! You'll be spreading cheer and lights with some vigor with this launcher equipped! Perfect for last minute decorations!

name: Gavle Goat
desc: A traditional Christmas display in Sweden and equally at home in Growtopia! Punch to light up even the coldest winter nights.

name: Winterfest Calendar - 2020
desc:
A wonderful Winterfest Calendar for 2020, jam-packed with joy and gifts to celebrate the holidays. Make sure to check back each day to get a new gift! ...or just wait and open them all in one go! Either way, it's a blast!
DO NOT BREAK! The Winterfest Calendar will not return to your backpack if broken!

name: Used Winterfest Calendar - 2020
desc: Winterfest 2020 was a bright and beautiful season, and this calendar marked the occasion with joys and gifts! Now that it's empty, you won't be getting anymore presents, but it can still be used as a lovely decoration.

name: Diamond Builders Bonanza
desc: This is much easier than owning a diamond mine if you want those ultra shiny Diamond Blocks! Careful, though - blocks don't just come from nothing, and this machine will eventually run out of power once it makes a bunch! WARNING! DO NOT BREAK! The Diamond Builders Bonanza will NOT return to your backpack if broken!

name: Used Diamond Builders Bonanza
desc: This mighty machine has run out of fuel, and now lies dormant.

name: Diamond Dog
desc: This is one luxury Pooch! Although not overly fluffy, it more than makes up for it with its diamond shine!

name: Mystic Transform Crystal
desc: Use this magical crystal on yourself to change your form and embody the Mystic Snow Fox!

name: Diamond Brick Background
desc: Perfect for every Growtopians statement home! Imagine how much these would cost in the real world!

name: Message in a Diamond Bottle
desc: You'd be really lucky if you found one of these washed up on the beach!

name: Message in a Diamond Bottle Seed
Diamond Pineapple
desc: If Pineapples used to be a way of showing off how rich you were, then this is ultimate show off Pineapple!

name: Diamond Life Ring
desc: A life ring made of diamond probably isn’t really very effective, but looks lovely hung on the wall!

name: Diamond Castle Stone
desc: Diamond, it’s perfect for building a castle with. It is one of the toughest materials known to man... also really shiny!

name: Diamond Castle Stone Background
desc: Diamond, it’s perfect for building a castle with. It is one of the toughest materials known to man... also really shiny!

name: Diamond Castle Turret
desc: Diamond, it’s perfect for building a castle with. It is one of the toughest materials known to man... also really shiny!

name: Diamond Manor House
desc: If you’re looking to build an entire manor house made of diamonds, this is for you!

name: Diamond Manor House Background
desc: If you’re looking to build an entire manor house made of diamonds... this is the one for you!

name: Diamond Regal Stairs
desc: The most regal of all Stairs... also made of Diamond.

name: Diamond Regal Bannister
desc: The most regal of all regal Bannisters... also made of Diamond!

name: Diamond Fiesta Block
desc: Perfect for a Diamond Fiesta!

name: Diamond Dolphin
desc: No summer holiday is complete without a dip in the water with an inflatable Diamond Dolphin! Ok, so that’s probably not true in real life but in Growtopia everything is possible!

name: Diamond Mondrian Block
desc: A bright blocky and very shiney tableau.

name: Snowy Tree Block
desc: A block to remind you of long walks in the snow and all the trees to hide behind when snowball fighting!

name: Snowy Fence
desc: A snowy fence, perfect for keeping unwanted visitors away while also looking pretty and wintry.

name: Ultra Performance Enhancing Hot Cocoa
desc: Enhances the performance of the 'Balloon-Frosting War Gloves' by increasing the points gained for every hit. Lasts for 15 minutes but doesn't stack with the bonus points granted by a Power Play.

name: Ultra Performance Enhancing Hot Cocoa Seed
Radical Rollers
desc: Get radical! These light up roller skates put the party in every step you take and add the disco to every move you make! Great for a /dance.

name: Walktopian
desc: Listen to some banging tunes while you walk... man!

name: Crown of the Cosmos
desc: This crown allows you to harness the power of the Cosmos! Putting you right at the center of everything!

name: Candy Cane Scythe
desc: Probably the deadliest Candy Cane ever made! Fling some festive cheer and razor sharp candy... what better way to celebrate the Holidays!

name: Snow Aura

func.add: Snow is falling but you’re jumping!

desc: Your very own personal cloud! Take Winter with you, wherever you go. If you wait long enough, you might even see a snowman.

name: Neon Tree Aura
desc: Get the Winterfest Party started with the Neon Tree Aura! Perfect for a night out on the frozen tiles.

name: Zamgrowni

func.rem: You can walk faster than that thing!

desc: To be Frank, this ice resurfacing machine has a cool name! Although, this one doesn't resurface ice, it does harvest trees!

name: Spruce Goose

func.add: The Goose is on the loose!

desc: Nothing like a spruce green goose to get you in the holiday mood! Honk! Honk!

name: Winterfest Lantern
desc: A festive lantern to brighten even the darkest winter night!

name: Gingerbread Sweater
desc: Kind of ugly. Kind of cool. Made of gingerbread... and wool.

name: Giant Red Bow
desc: If you have a massive present that needs a finishing touch, then, this is perfect!

name: Open Present Block
desc: A memory of an awesome gift!

name: Giant Festival Lantern
desc: Celebrate the Winter season festivals with this lantern!

name: Windup Musical Box
desc: A nostalgic musical box... almost a little creepy somehow though!

name: Gingerbread Man Onesie
desc: A one stop shop for looking a bit like a Gingerbread Man... if that's what you want!

name: Gingerbread Man Mask
desc: Weird, creepy and slightly sinister! It's perfect to wear with a Gingerbread Man Onesie!

name: Winter Colonel Beard
desc: Perfect for wearing when creating a secret mix of winter herbs and spices!

name: Electric Guitar

func.add: You're too busy rocking to punch anybody!

desc: You can't punch while holding this, you're too busy ROCKING OUT! Punch anywhere to play music. If you punch to your left or right, you can bend the note higher or lower. Punch in your own column to play the same notes that Sheet Music: Electric Guitar Note plays.

name: Sheet Music: Electric Guitar
desc: Ready to rock out! This sheet will play a Electrical Guitar note for you as long as you aren't in a range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Electric Guitar
desc: This sheet will play A Electric Guitar note for you - a half-step higher note than Sheet Music: Electric Guitar - as long as you aren't  in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Electric Guitar Seed
Sheet Music: Flat Electric Guitar
desc: This sheet will play a Electric Guitar note for you - a half-step lower note than Sheet Music: Electric Guitar - as long as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Flat Electric Guitar Seed
Confetti Jump Pack
desc: This retro jump pack will propel you to euphoric heights!

name: Special Winter Wish
desc: A stocking filled with all your winter wishes and maybe even more!!

name: Winter Wish
desc: A stocking filled with all your winter wishes and maybe more!

name: Winter Wish Wand
desc: This magical wand will make your Winterfest extra special by adding wishes to your Winter Wish List Progress!

name: Playful Pitchfork
desc: Be careful who you poke with it! Chosen by ReddMA, this is the Monthly Subscriber's item for December, 2020.

name: 8th Anniversary Block
desc: EIGHT YEARS! They just keep coming! We are going full on eight'ies this year. So, as a thank you for your continued support, please join us in celebrating this monumental achievement with this beautiful 80's block!

name: Roobux Cube
desc: Roobux, the 80s sensation, still going strong today! This one is easier to complete though!

name: Retro Jacket
desc: Retro chic goodness! Denim will never go out of fashion!

name: Retro Leg Warmers
desc: Good for partying and keeping your legs warm at the same time!

name: Black Display Shelf
desc: Made of the finest, imitation, Black Ash! Why not display your favourite items on them? They can hold four items to display.

name: Retro Tape Block
desc: The perfect tape, never gets tangled in the machine. You can stand on this one without it breaking as well!

name: Retro Record Block
desc: The perfect vinyl record, never scratches! Pretend to be a rockstar and hang loads of them up to impress your friends.

name: Retro Pattern Block
desc: If you're after for 1980's style for building, then this is the block for you!

name: Retro Pattern Background
desc: If you're after for some 1980's style for building backgrounds with, then this is the background for you!

name: Rainbow Tutu
desc: Choo Choo! With this Tutu you can board to party train to Disco Town! Calling at Party Central, Dancefloor Downs and Diva District!

name: White Suit Jacket
desc: Strut your stuff in this 1980's inspired look: The perfect day/night combination!

name: Tetra T-Shirt
desc: The most stylish and disco-like of fish make for the perfect T-shirt!

name: Retro Computer
desc: An icon of technology! It may not be able to play Growtopia but it does save your progress! Boot up some retro tech!

name: Rave Safe Mask
desc: Rave long, rave hard, rave safe!

name: Rollback Plaque VIII
desc: You were there, man. You were THERE when time rolled backwards, and all the fruits of your labors turned to dust in your dry, bitter fist. December 2020!

name: WOTD Trophy 2021
desc: Best of all possible trophies in 2021.

name: Draconic Soul Aura

func.add: The flames and your soul combine!

desc: The flames of a Draconic presence imbue you with power! The flames burn into your very soul, you are starting to become one with the Draconic kind! There are only 900 in existence!

name: Mystic Battle Lance
desc: A traditional and ancient weapon. Cast of molten steel, this fiery lance, from a fiery furnace, wreaks fiery fury with every attack! There are only 500 in existence!

name: Year of the Ox Mask
desc: The ox is the second of the zodiac animals. Limited only to the year of the ox! Myth has it, that the order of the Zodiac Animals, was determined by a race. The mighty ox, adept on land, and water, was leading until a sneaky rat jumped on it's back as they crossed the line, unfairly, winning the race!

name: Year of the Ox Mask Seed
Year of The Ox Statue
desc: A statue of the zodiac ox! Growtopians born in the Year of the Ox are strong, reliable, fair and conscientious.

name: Year of The Ox Statue Seed
Dynasty Vase
desc: The ancient mystics at Growtech designed this many moons ago. Recently discovered, it's proving quite useful ! Unfortunately, those pesky untradeable items can't be placed here! Note: Only World Lock owners can use this item.

name: Oxen Battle Helm
desc: Strong, hardy and reliable! This item has all the attributes of those who are born under the sign of the Zodiac Ox!

name: Oxen Battle Shirt
desc: Strong, hardy and reliable! This item has all the attributes of those who are born under the sign of the Zodiac Ox!

name: Oxen Battle Pants
desc: Strong, hardy and reliable! This item has all the attributes of those who are born under the sign of the Zodiac Ox!

name: Oxen Battle Boots
desc: Strong, hardy and reliable! This item has all the attributes of those who are born under the sign of the Zodiac Ox!

name: Golden Ox Pendant
desc: A mystic golden charm. Both ancient and ageless, this is said to instill the work ethic of the Ox in whoever should wear it!

name: Great Wall of Growtopia
desc: This is a really great wall isn't it? Good for keeping pesky Growtopians and to the same degree, in! Visible from space, if internet rumors are to believed!

name: Terracotta Growtopian
desc: Build your own Growtopian Terracotta Army! Something makes me think these guys come to life when you're not looking. Creepy.

name: 2014 - Zodiac Year of the Horse
desc: A very special year was the Year of the Horse! Growtopians born in this year as said to be warm-hearted, enthusiastic, and positive. The horse can be seen as the symbol of independence and freedom! Harvesting Fortune Cookie & Lucky Fortune Cookie trees with this item equipped gives a chance of twice the yield.

name: 2014 - Zodiac Year of the Horse Seed
2015 - Zodiac Year of the Goat
desc: Growtopians born in the Year of the Goat are be believed to be gentle, mild-mannered, shy, stable, sympathetic, and amicable. They are said to have delicate thoughts, strong creativity, and perseverance! Harvesting Fortune Cookie & Lucky Fortune Cookie trees with this item equipped gives a chance of twice the yield.

name: 2015 - Zodiac Year of the Goat Seed
2016 - Zodiac Year of the Monkey
desc: Growtopians born in the Year of the Monkey have magnetic personalities and are witty and intelegent! They can also be mischievous and are masters of the practical joke! Cheeky Monkey! Harvesting Fortune Cookie & Lucky Fortune Cookie trees with this item equipped gives a chance of twice the yield.

name: 2016 - Zodiac Year of the Monkey Seed
2017 - Zodiac Year of the Rooster
desc: Growtopians born in the Year of the Rooster are observant and hardworking. They are resourceful, courageous, and talented. Harvesting Fortune Cookie & Lucky Fortune Cookie trees with this item equipped gives a chance of twice the yield.

name: 2017 - Zodiac Year of the Rooster Seed
2018 - Zodiac Year of the Dog
desc: Growtopians born in the Year of the Dog are loyal and honest, amiable and kind, cautious and prudent. They have a strong sense of loyalty and sincerity. Harvesting Fortune Cookie & Lucky Fortune Cookie trees with this item equipped gives a chance of twice the yield.

name: 2018 - Zodiac Year of the Dog Seed
2019 - Zodiac Year of the Pig
desc: Growtopians born in the Year of the Pig are diligent, compassionate, and realistic! They devote energy to achieving goals and like to see things through to completion. Harvesting Fortune Cookie & Lucky Fortune Cookie trees with this item equipped gives a chance of twice the yield.

name: 2019 - Zodiac Year of the Pig Seed
2020 - Zodiac Year of the Rat
desc: Growtopians born in the Year of the Rat are clever and quick thinkers! They can be strong-willed, and ambitious as well. Harvesting Fortune Cookie & Lucky Fortune Cookie trees with this item equipped gives a chance of twice the yield.

name: 2020 - Zodiac Year of the Rat Seed

name: Cooking Recipe - Homemade Fish Taco
desc:
To cook this recipe you will need the following:

Ingredients:
* Tomato
* Onion
* Dough
* Fish Chunk
* Lettuce

Seasoning:
* Salt
* Pepper

Process:
*Add Tomato, Onion, and Dough to an oven on Low heat. While the Dough is still hot, add Fish Chunk. Add the seasonings and wait until cooked all the way through. When fully cooked, add Lettuce and immediately remove from the oven.

Timings may vary so you will need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - Homemade Fish Taco Seed
Cooking Recipe - Apple Strudel
desc:
To Cook this recipe you will need the following:


Ingredients:
* Honey
* Apple
* Dough
* Egg


Seasoning:
* Sugar
* Sugar
* Salt


Process:
Add Honey and Apple to an oven on Low Heat. While the Apple is still cold, add Dough and Egg. Add the seasonings and wait until cooked all the way through. Remove from the oven when perfectly cooked.

Timing may vary so you will need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - Berry Crepes
desc:
To Cook this recipe you will need the following:


Ingredients:
* Flour
* Egg
* Milk
* Blueberry


Seasoning:
* Sugar
* Sugar


Process:

Add Flour and Egg to an oven on Low Heat. While the Egg is still cold, add Milk. When the Egg is mostly cooked, add Blueberry. Add the seasonings and wait until cooked all the way through. Remove from the oven when perfectly cooked.


Timings may vary so you will need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - BBQ Bacon Burger
desc:
To Cook this recipe you will need the following:
 

Ingredients:
* Ground Beef
* Baking Chocolate
* Dough
* Bacon
* Tomato
* Lettuce


Seasoning:

* Salt
* Pepper
* Sugar


Process:

Add Ground Beef to an oven on Low Heat. While the Ground Beef is still cold, add Dough and shortly after add the Bacon. Add the seasonings and wait until cooked all the way through. Then add Tomato and wait until perfectly cooked. When fully cooked, Add Lettuce and immediately remove from the oven.


Timings may vary so you will need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - BBQ Bacon Burger Seed
Cooking Recipe - Beer-Battered Fish And Chips
desc:
To Cook this recipe you will need the following:


Ingredients:
* Flour
* Green Beer
* Potato
* Fish Chunk


Seasoning:
* Salt
* Pepper


Process:
Add Flour, Green Beer and Potato to an oven on Low Heat. When the Flour is almost done, add Fish Chunk. Add the seasonings and wait until cooked all the way through. Remove from the oven when perfectly cooked.


Timing may vary so you will need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - Beer-Battered Fish And Chips Seed
Cooking Recipe - Arroz Con Pollo
desc:
To Cook this recipe you will need the following:


Ingredients:
* Rice
* Chicken Meat
* Onion
* Tomato


Seasoning:
* Salt
* Pepper
* Pepper


Process:
Add Rice to an oven on Low Heat. While the Rice is still cold, add Chicken Meat and Onion. Add the seasonings and wait until cooked all the way through. Then add Tomato and remove from the oven once perfectly cooked.


Timing may vary so you will need to experiment.

name: Cooking Recipe - Arroz Con Pollo Seed

name: Phoenix Armor

func.rem: No more flame in your set!

desc: This armor has risen from the ashes of a fallen empire. Only 500 of them in existence in all of Growtopia!

name: War Seahorse
desc: The secret of how these war seahorses are trained is only known to Neptunes personal master of seahorse! No you can't have one.

name: Neptune's Chariot

func.rem: Your feet are back on dry land!

desc: The mighty chariot of Neptune, pulled by the great war seahorses of the deep. Only 500 of them in existence in all of Growtopia!

name: Dark Assassin's Vest
desc: A dark vest indeed. It's so dark you have to have lights on the closet to find it.

name: Dark Assassin's Cape
desc: A fine cape, or is it a cloak? Great for an assassin or anyone wanting to look edgy and cool at the same time.

name: Dark Assassin's Trousers
desc: So dark, if you go out at night people might think your leg are invisible.

name: Dark Assassin's Armguards
desc: Some very very sharp armguards indeed! Never be without a knife again. Perfect for carving meat at a family meal or fighting off Templars.

name: Pegasus Shirt
desc: A feathery shirt! Horse feathers are becoming quite the, in fashion, item. Sustainable and flight worthy.

name: Pegasus Pants
desc: Thankfully, these are lined, otherwise, it might be a little bit spikey!

name: Pegasus Pauldrons
desc: Feathers on your shoulder! Now you're talking, haule couture, straight from the Catwalk to Growtopia!

name: Pegasus Shoes

func.add: With the wind beneath your winged shoes

desc: Why would a Pegasus need shoes? Don't they have hooves? Oh well, best not to think about it and just enjoy some feather embossed shoes

name: Pegasus Crown
desc: For proper, Pegasus, royalty only... oh and you!

name: Pegasus Block
desc: A fantastically, feathery foreground block!

name: Pegasus Block BG
desc: A boomingly brilliant feathery background block!

name: Pegasus Chest
desc: What might be inside, my fair feathered friend? Use it on yourself to find out!

name: Summer Artifact Chest
desc: An artifact from the past dug up in the sand. Smash it for a change of ancient Phoenix items from the past! Phoenix items will only be available to claim from this item during SummerFest.

name: Ultra Red Phoenix Fragment
desc: A fragment of pure red light, crystallized into a block.

name: Ultra Blue Neptune Fragment
desc: A fragment of pure blue light, crystallized into a block.

name: Ultra White Fragment
desc: A fragment of pure white light, crystallized into a block.

name: Hydro Cannon
desc: Water is, one of tue most powerful forces there is. Now you can have that power strapped directly to your back.

name: Summer Glider

func.add: Glide through the air with the greatest of ease!

desc: Everyone loves drones. So why not strap a few straight onto your shoulders and glide trough the air. Can't actually carry the full weight of a growtopian so it's not much good for flying.

name: Ultraviolet Aura

func.add: Rising with the light of the aura.

desc: The Growtopian Eye has evolved to see more of the light spectrum than some creatures, which allows them to see this beautiful Ultraviolet Aura. Warning: Ultraviolet Radiation is the what causes sunburn. Prolonged exposure is not advised and don't forget to wear your hat and sunscreen.

name: Super Duper Ice Cream Scooper

func.add: Ice cream! Ice cream! Come get your ice cream.
func.rem: The Ice Cream man is gone.

desc: Ice cream! Ice cream! Come and get your ice cream. Best served straight to your face, directly from these super duper scoopers.

name: Super Duper Ice Cream Scooper Seed
Tropical Bar
desc: A tropical bar fully stocked with all the latest and greatest mocktails and juices.

name: Tropical Bar Stool
desc: Sit down and relax at your favorite summer bar.

name: Thermometer
desc: This thermometer uses some mercury and a little glass tube that measures the temperature. Gotta love science. Punch to check the current temperature.

name: Kiss the Cook Apron
desc: Show your love to the one cooking all that wonderful food on the barbecue!

name: Lobster Onesie Hood
desc: Dress up as everyone's favorite ocean Crustacean.

desc: Dress up as everyone's favorite ocean Crustacean.

desc: Dress up as everyone's favorite ocean Crustacean.

name: Coconut Mocktail

desc: A key to a mysterious treasure! This key is for Clash Series 4, running from Summer Clash 2021 through Spring Clash 2022. After three seasons, those who collect at least 10 of these keys will be able to open a special treasure chest. Make sure you have enough - just one won't do it!

name: Ambu-Lance
desc: A Mecha Med Ambu-Lance weapon! This is the sort of weapon that screams... EMERGENCY!! COMING TROUGH!!

name: Cute Mutant Wonky
desc: One of the cutest mutants ever! There are 3 to find and if you're reading this, you've found at least one! Well done!

desc: One of the cutest mutants ever! There are 3 to find and if you're reading this, you've found at least one! Well done!

desc: Imbued with the soul of the Dragon dispatched by Beowulf himself. Handle with care and hope that Beowulf doesn't want it back any time soon!

name: Beowulf's Pants
desc: This is not actually Beowulf's pants. It's a perfect replica made in modern fabrics and sporting a comfy yet refined style. Perfect for both the office and cave.

name: Beowulf's Shirt
desc: This is not actually Beowulf's Shirt. It's a perfect replica made in modern fabrics and sporting a comfy yet refined style. Perfect for both the office and cave.

desc: Dress as your favorite, super cute, mutant pet! It's not Gross Out; it's Cute Out!

desc: Dress as your favorite, super cute, mutant pet! It's not Gross Out; it's Cute Out!

Crystal Crown
desc: A crown of pure crystal. The power of the crystalline spirit courses through your very being and gives you unimaginable power!

name: Sonic Buster Katana

func.add: Slashing at the speed of sound!

desc: Slash your way to victory and cut through time itself! Also...Sheath it on your back when you're not fighting to leave your hands free. Handy!

name: Primordial Jade Lance
desc: An ancient and mysterious lance. The gem at its point is said to focus light to deadly effect! Why don't you try it and see?

name: Purple Shore Crab Leash
desc: This crab is self assured on the shore, for sure!

name: Crawdad Leash
desc: Like a lobster buy waaaay more Crawdaddy like!

name: Lobster Leash
desc: A lobster pet, what's not to like. Imagine walking down the street with a snapping lobster on your leash!

name: Hermit Crab Leash
desc: This guy's a little shy but they seem to like you!

name: Alaskan King Crab Leash
desc: You must be royally happy to have trained this King Crab! Although does Alaska actually have a king?

name: Noodle Bowl Hat
desc: A fine bowl of steaming hot noodles to wear on your head. Caution though, these are delicious so everyone might want a slurp from it!

name: Samille's Soul Abductor
desc: A cool dark flame licks at your ankles. Symbols rise as your realize you have the power to abduct souls... or is it you that's been abducted! Sponsored by Samille.

name: Mystery Portal
desc: Where will you be transported to? Who knows? It's a mystery. Wrench this to choose up to 5 destinations to randomly send players.

name: Friends Entrance
desc: Wrench this Entrance to give access to your entire friends list in one go!

name: Legendary Destroyer
desc: Step up and aboard the Legendary Destroyer and command the ultimate machine. Your legendary status is assured when you pilot this magnificent mech!

name: Legendary Owl
desc: An Owl, truly, of legend! The stories of this mythical guardian are as old as time itself. Your bravery and effort have been rewarded in the most legendary way!

name: Purple Shore Crab Headband
desc: You "shore" look good in these!

name: Crawdad Shoes
desc: Looking good Daddio! Made from 100% synthetic Crawdad

name: Lobster Shoes
desc: Cause a lob-stir when you walk through town in these stunning shoes! Made from 100% synthetic lobster

name: Hermit Crab Helmet
desc: A great helmet to hide in when you're feeling a little crabby!

name: Alaskan King Crab Crown
desc: Look as cool as an Alaskan winter in this Crown!

name: Anime Action Hair
desc: Lights, camera, ANIME ACTION HAIR! Feel the power from root to tip every time you punch!

name: Growmoji Chest
desc: A chest filled with some classic Growmoji's. These Growmoji's were previously only available with the monthly packs.

name: Zodiac Ring

name: Gem Mask
desc: This is a gem of a Gem Mask! Chosen by koreaTOFU, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for July, 2021!

name: Finger Gun
desc: To wield the finger gun, you must first become the gun. Old Growtopian Proverb

name: Rainbow Shoes

func.rem: Wait, where's the pot of gold?

desc: If you want shoes that look like when light from the sun is scattered by water droplets then today, my friend, is your lucky day!

name: Seafoam Scarf
desc: The wind isn't pushing you back, the scarf is just flowing in style!

name: Riding Cloud
desc: Bringing the sky to the ground!

name: Smoke Machine

name: Buzz Cut Hair
desc: Wait a minute, did you get a new haircut?

name: Undercut Hair
desc: A classic hairstyle to show your athletic side!

name: Neat Bun Hair
desc: The fashion trend that everyone's talking about!

name: Curly Hair
desc: Not everyone has straight hair, some of us have curly!

name: Buddy Balloon

name: Cartoon Glove Hat Red
desc: Pop this on your head to show your support for the red team!

name: Cartoon Glove Hat Blue
desc: Everyone knows that blue is the best color, it's been proven by science!

name: Digital Sign
desc: Catch the attention of your friends with the sign that's probably using a whole lot of electricity!

name: Wearable Ostrich
desc: Matches any clothing!

name: I love Dirt Shirt
desc: Some people like things to be clean, you're not one of them are you?

name: Conveyor Block
desc: Keep moving forward... or back, your choice really!

name: Happy Block
desc: Bring a bit of joy to your world!

name: Posh Portrait
desc: A fancy portrait only for the most fabulous!

name: Growsec Mask
desc: Bring disorder to wherever you go with a glowing smile!

name: Pet Sock Hood
desc: Put this mask on to let your pet sock know you're always there for him!

name: Futuristic Sunglasses
desc: Rock these shades brought to you from decades into the future!

name: Ophthalmologist Glasses
desc: These glasses you wear at the doctor's which look ten times better than the one's you buy after!

name: Silver-framed Sunglasses
desc: Show that you're a star with these all new shades brought to you from the 80's!

name: Green Leaf Crown
desc: Be officially crowned King or Queen of your world!

name: Quicksand Block
desc: Try not to get stuck here - it'll be slow going!

name: Indonesian Skirt
desc: A skirt made out of the best fabric in Indonesia!

name: Indonesian Blouse
desc: A blouse made out of the best fabric in Indonesia!

name: Indonesian Headdress
desc: A luxurious headdress originating from Indonesia!

name: Moyaimorph
desc: Blend in with heads of Easter Island with this large costume!

name: Moyaimorph Mask
desc: It's like a hockey mask but ten times heavier!

name: Fade Hair
desc: Modern day fashion requires modern day hairstyles.

name: Safety First Hair
desc: The kind of hairstyle that ends up in a yearbook photo.

name: Weekend Raver Hair
desc: A unique hairstyle for a unique person.

name: Old Rocker Hair
desc: Rock On! Rock this classic hairstyle to show you're a real fan of music!

name: Locke's Megaphone
desc: This handy device will let you broadcast a message to ALL of Growtopia at once! You must have Advanced Account Protection enabled in order to use this item.

name: Ouroboros Charm
desc: The endless loop of life and death, personified and celebrated. Is it a charm or is it a curse?

name: Magic Infused Blade Design
desc: This paper details a method for forging a Magic Infused Blade. If you forge 100 Magic Ingots with this design in hand, you'll make a Magic Infused Blade. This consumes the design.

name: Magic Infused Blade
desc: This is a a lovingly crafted sword blade infused with magical energy. If only you had the rest of the pieces to make a full sword!

name: Fall Wings
desc: Not only do these wings let you fly, but you can also fire feathers made out of leaves from your wings!

name: Seed Gatling Gun
desc: Shoot sunflower seeds out of this all new Gatling gun!

name: Harvest Hood-ini
desc: Does this hood disappear, well its all about misdirection!

name: Crystal of Hoa
desc: Use this crystal to plant flowers wherever you go... for a short period of time!

name: Poppin' Corn Hat
desc: A cob of corn on your head! You can almost smell the buttery goodness!

name: Staff of S'mores
desc: Use the unconventional staff to "fire" delicious warm s'mores!

name: Harvest Jade Hat
desc: An enchanted hat embedded with jade gems that enables it to be used as a weapon!

name: Firewood Cradle
desc: All it takes to set up a campfire is to place down one of these cradles and punch it to light it up!

name: Masculine Sunflower Hair
desc: This colorful hairstyle will help you stand out from the crowd.

name: Feminine Sunflower Hair
desc: A sunflower ponytail? Impossible!

name: Masculine Sunflower Shirt
desc: Sunflower petals as shoulder pads, 'nough said!

name: Feminine Sunflower Shirt
desc: A shirt that includes a sunflower bow tie!

name: Sunflower Pants
desc: These pants will make you feel like you're walking on sunshine!

name: Sunflower Dress
desc: A dress themed after the best type of flower!

name: Sunflower Ladder
desc: So this is how Jack felt when he climbed up the beanstalk!

name: Whoopie Pie Block
desc: Jump on this block to go even higher... whoopie!

name: Sunflower Pinwheel
desc: A sunflower-themed pinwheel.

name: Sleepy Bear Suit
desc: A suit that would probably help you with hibernating through the winter!

name: Sleepy Bear Hood
desc: Trick people into think you're asleep with this mask!

name: Rice Crop Block
desc: Build your own farmland with these crops of rice!

name: Rice Crop Wallpaper
desc: Plant fields of rice crops behind you!

name: Dewi Sri Statue
desc: A statue made in honor of Dewi Sri.

name: Stingray Hat
desc: A cute Stingray for your head. Chosen by SolaBowe, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for August, 2021!

name: Paper Wasp Pet
desc: Folded and creased to paper perfection. This wasp packs a very unique sting in its tail.

name: Unity Mooncake
desc: This pastry is filled with a sweet bean paste. "Unity" is imprinted on the top in ancient Growtopian script. Mix this with other Mooncakes in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to create special Harvest Festival items.

name: Wyvern Wings
desc: Not only can you jump to the heavens with these luxurious wings... you can also walk with them! To avoid refund fraud, this item has been made untradeable until February 17th, 2022.

name: Robot Lord Cape
desc: The famous cape of the Robot Lord, whether its just walking or punching, see why this cape is considered the most powerful by many!

name: Lightning Umbrella
desc: Use this super charged umbrella to fire lightning out of its tip!

name: Lucid Wings
desc: These are a pair of wings you would only see in your (lucid) dreams!

name: Purple Scarf
desc: A stylish scarf for an exclusive set of people! Chosen by xArskax, this is the Monthly Subscriber's item for September, 2021!

name: Sakura's Revenge

func.add: Pink and black never look back!

desc: Use these blades of fury to cut through your opponents!

name: Neon Party Cape
desc: Be the life of the party with this cape!

name: Sacred Scarf
desc: The sacred materials used to make this intricately woven scarf have been passed down for generations.

name: Royal Grow Pass Token
desc: Consume to earn exclusive Royal Rewards as your level up you Grow Pass as well as unlocking all daily bonuses and exclusive Royal Perks including double Grow Pass Points and the ability to claim 5,500 gems per day for the entire month. Upon consuming you will instantly receive 300 Free points towards your pass progress as well as 4,000 gems for every day that has passed since the start of the season.

name: Clam Cruiser

func.add: Ahoy! A cruisin' we shall go!

desc: Traverse the land in effortless glory with this carapace carriage.

name: Royal Clam Cruiser

func.add: Ahoy! A cruisin' we shall go!

desc: Traverse the land in effortless glory with this carapace carriage! Wave at your loyal subjects as you sit atop this regal version!

name: Trick or Treat Troll

func.rem: Back on your own two feet.

desc: Ride aboard this hungry troll, some say he is made out of candy!

name: Spider Sniper
desc: Trap your foes with this all new weapon made as a result of science experimenting with spiders.

name: Cauldron Cannon

func.rem: The charm is firm and good!

desc: There's something brewing in the cauldron, something evil!

name: Skull of Burning Horrors
desc: Wow this staff is hot! Made from the deepest, most molten lava, and cursed with a little evil magic.

name: Waay Chivo Skull
desc: The very essence of a Legendary Mayan Beast! The literal translation is Sorcerer-Goat but Waay Chivo is waaaaay scarier!

name: Demonic Soul Aura
desc: The flames of a Demonic presence imbue you with power! The flames scorch into your very soul, you are starting to become one with the Demonic kind! There are only 500 in existence!

name: Pharaoh's Pendant
desc: Once worn by an ancient Pharaoh, this pendant holds the souls of undead mummies. Unleash their wrath!

name: Ferryman of the Underworld

func.add: Come sail away to the after party!

name: Familiar Hat

name: Zombie Hand Chair
desc: Tired of running? Take a break with the help of this undead hand!
