desc: Corrupted by the spells of an evil witch, the castle walls are cracked with a purple glow of an unknown substance. Be cautious!

name: Corrupted Castle Roof
desc: Corrupted by the spells of an evil witch, the roof of the castle is cracked with a purple glow of an unknown substance. Be cautious!

name: Corrupted Castle Door
desc: Corrupted by the spells of an evil witch, the entrance to the castle is cracked with a purple glow of an unknown substance. Be cautious!

name: Shady Bangs
desc: With hair like that, people are definitely going to think you're up to something...

name: Emo Hair
desc: It's not a phase!

name: Halloween Lantern
desc: Turn on the lights to keep those monsters out!

name: Gargoyle Mask
desc: Ward off evil with the mask of these ancient guardians!

name: Organ Piano
desc: If there was one instrument that's known to give people the chills, its this one!

name: Angry Block
desc: Bring a bit of hatred to your world but not too much!!

name: Star Aura
desc: Wear the Star Emblem proudly like the infamous Captain Puerto Rico. No one ever understood why Americans find him so patriotic.

name: Turkey Float

name: Ameri-car
desc: Roll, or hover, down the streets with this American automobile packed with stars and stripes!

name: Super Slapshot Stick

desc: A fancy hat made for fans of singing!

desc: A fancy shirt made for fans of singing!

name: Black Bow of the Rainbow
desc: The most rainbow'y rainbow bow of all the rainbows bows ever created by the rainbow bowyer... Now in Black! If you like rainbows, but tend to be a bit edgy, then this bow is the rainbow for you!

name: Black Bow of the Rainbow Seed
Black Radical Rollers
desc: Get radical! These light up roller skates, now in black, put the party in every step you take and add the monochrome to every move you make! Great for a /dance.

name: Matrix Visor

func.add: Wow! That's a lot of numbers

desc: Why zap with a regular old visor when you can zap them with code. Use the power of letters and numbers to defeat your enemies!

name: Shadow Cubes Aura
desc: A powerful energy was put into these cubes allowing them to move by themselves!

name: Vortex Sunglasses
desc: Rock some Vortex Sunglasses!

name: Black Neon Hoodie
desc: A Black Friday exclusive hoodie! Black and neon is pretty much the perfect combo isn't it?

name: Vortex Block
desc: A vortex trapped inside a block.

name: Growtopian Bean
desc: Heard this is a pretty popular fashion sense nowadays!

name: Varsity Jacket
desc: The perfect jacket to walk around campus with. Whether its to show that you're part of the sports team or let people know where you studied, this is the look for you.

name: Alien Landing Pod
desc: A landing pod of unknown origin, looks harmless enough. What surprises are inside?

name: Alien Scanner
desc: The latest in Alien Scanning Technology from the world renowned Growtech Labs. Wear this item when Harvesting Trees for a chance to find an Alien Landing Pod or other Alien Block. The item is highly experimental and will break when it does find a Landing Pod or Alien Block.

name: Space Station Sign
desc: No matter how advanced a species is, they all require signs. Nobody knows everything!

name: Geometric Bench
desc: Aliens have cooler versions of everything... including benches!

name: Subway Sign
desc: Lets people know where the trains are at!

name: Subway Stairs
desc: Takes you places!

name: Subway Wall
desc: The interior of a subway station is always fascinating, you never know what you'd find!

name: Street Sidewalk
desc: Make your way downtown!

name: Storm Drain Cover
desc: What lies deep beneath these sewers? Guess we'll never know.

name: Techno Grass
desc: A type of grass from an unknown planet, very techno indeed!

name: Space Conveyor Block
desc: Don't run on a Space Conveyor. Stay safe, slow down!

name: Greetings Earthlings Sign
desc: How nice, the aliens decided to set up signs greeting us!

name: Takeaway Joint
desc: Stop by this fast food place!

name: Takeaway Joint Roof
desc: This bright rooftop will let you know that food is here!

name: Street Clock
desc: It's time! Well this clock is broken, so it's always a time!

name: Smiling Mask
desc: Like a happy vigilante mask but you can't see anything when you wear it! Chosen by Gladehart, this is the Monthly Subscriber's item for October, 2021!

name: Digital Bow
desc: Get with the glitch! A digital bow for the digital age!

name: Mystic Bow
desc: A magical bow forged from mystical artifacts of unknown origin.

name: Royal Mystic Bow
desc: A magical bow forged from mystical artifacts of unknown origin.

name: City Bench
desc: A bench found in cities!

desc: A shirt that'll help you sneak on board a spaceship!

name: Space Stowaway Pants
desc: Pants that'll help you sneak on board a spaceship!

desc: A chilling mask that'll leave you cold.

desc: Dashing through the snow, barking as we go, this sledge is pulled by diamond dogs, and anything but slow!

name: Santa's Super Sack
desc: Spread joy with this bag of never ending present!

desc: A cool pair of wings! Made of the deepest, most wintry snow and sprinkled with a little Winter magic!

name: Ice Dragon Scythe

func.add: Nothing will stand in my way!
func.rem: The scythe returns to its velvet case.

desc: Release the wrath of the Ice Dragon with this enchanted Scythe.

name: Aura Antlers
desc: A pair of enchanted antlers that glow as you punch! To avoid refund fraud, this item has been made untradeable until May 1st, 2022.

name: Candy Cane Cruiser
desc: A candy cane hoverboard that'll help you get around this holiday season!

name: Diamond Warrior Pauldrons
desc: What might be inside, my fair feathered friend? Use it on yourself to find out!

name: Winterfest Calendar - 2021
desc: A wonderful Winterfest Calendar for 2021, jam-packed with joy and gifts to celebrate the holidays. Make sure to check back each day to get a new gift! ...or just wait and open them all in one go! Either way, it's a blast! DO NOT BREAK! The Winterfest Calendar will not return to your backpack if broken!

name: Used Winterfest Calendar - 2021
desc: Winterfest 2021 was a bright and beautiful season, and this calendar marked the occasion with joys and gifts! Now that it's empty, you won't be getting anymore presents, but it can still be used as a lovely decoration.

name: Black Friday Black Box Xtreme
desc: An Xtreme Black Friday Gift awaits you! It's what Black Friday is all about!

name: Black Friday Black Box Xtreme Seed
